title: Refurbished rooms are A+!
text:
No idea how many stays we are at now - 30?  Was back this last weekend, and when we walked in we were greeted with hugs. It truly is home. Jo and John take great care of everyone. 

But I want to post about the refurbished rooms.  They are brilliant. Excellent design smart lighting, clean lines. A great improvement on already excellent rooms. I want the hotel picture that adorns the wall …. hint, hint. 

See you all in July! - Chris and Kathryn

title: Great Stay and had a great experience!
text:
I really enjoyed my recent stay at The Bryant Park Hotel! I was greeted so warmly by Jo (Josephine "Jo" Kinsella) the Guest Relations Manager at the front desk. After a long trip in it was nice to be welcomed and feel taken care of - she took time to find me a great room with a spectacular view of Bryant Park and the buildings surrounding it. The floor to ceiling windows capture amazing views of the city and create a special experience. I loved the room - bed was super comfortable, bathroom was huge and well equipped.  Due to some renovations the door to the outdoor space wasn't available but overall the renovation work did not detract from my stay experience. 

I had breakfast and lunch at Koi at the hotel and enjoyed both meals. Everyone took great care of me. 

I saw Jo again at checkout and she checked in with me to make sure my experience was great. It was nice to have her as a friendly connection at the property! 

I highly recommend the hotel. Great location if you want to see two of the places I was going to - The New York Public Library and The Morgan Library. I will definitely stay there again.

title: Wonderful amazing vacation AGAIN in the Bryant Park Hotel- number 1 hotel in NY
text:
From the bottom of our hearts, we would like to thank the Bryant Park hotel team for the wonderful hospitality. 
This is not our first time in New York and not our first time in the Bryant Park hotel. Bryant Park is our first choice in New York, the best hotel, the best environment, the best wonderful amenities, the best service and the winning staff. This time we arrived in New York with the whole family. 

Our engagement with Bryant Park hotel began before we even arrived. The hotel staff wanted to know everything about our preferences in order to get the best out of their side for a wonderful vacation. We stayed in the DLV room (deluxe room with a view) and the junior suite. Both rooms have spectacular views of Bryant Park and the public library. Everything is clean and absolutely perfect. The Bryant Park staff were super supportive and helpful with all of our needs. 
We would like to thank Julio, Jo, John, Chris, Shannen (and sorry if I missed anyone) for the best amazing stay. 

A big thank and special appreciation to Julio. Thanks to your kindness, high level of service, human relations, professionalism and smile, you made our vacation unforgettable. For us you are like the Bryant Park Hotel – ALWAYS number 1. 

We are looking forward to our next vacation in New York at the Bryant Park Hotel. 
Thanks. With love, the Farhi family

title: Wonderful New (to me) Find
text: Coming to NY for decades, this was our first time staying at The Bryant Park Hotel, and it was a treat. Every interaction (on the phone, email, and then in person) was pleasant, friendly, and helpful. We were celebrating my mom's birthday, and they upgraded our room and surprised us with proseco and a balloon.  Location is excellent- close to so much.  Would have liked to have had a refrigerator in the room. Facing the park is a little noisy, but NY is noisy, and they provide earplugs and a sound machine.  Will definitely look to stay here again.

title: Exceptional and Friendly
text:
My partner and I came here last month based purely on the reviews I read and after doing plenty of research for our NYC stay of 4 nights.
What we found was the highlight of our month long trip around the world.
We stayed in a junior suite on the 12th floor and the level of floor was perfect to get a Birds Eye view of the park from above.
The room itself was newly renovated and a pure joy to stay in. The cleanliness of the room was exceptional and the attention to detail was obvious.
We could not fault the room at all.
A small breakfast of coffee and muffins is supplied each morning from about 7am which we took advantage of daily and it quickly became our morning routine. It was also an opportunity to meet and rub shoulders from other guests from all over the world.
Our first night saw us at the bar on site and we enjoyed a few drinks on a Friday night listening to the resident DJ.
Our last night, we ate at the Asian restaurant on site and it was sublime and the staff attentive and friendly.
The staff at this hotel is why they are #1 on Tripadvisor (along with everything else) but it is the front of house that drives a hotel and John is a delight to meet and engage with.
The GM here has the perfect balance of staff that compliments the hotel perfectly.
Siobhan (GM) is to be congratulated and admired by her peers for what she has created, nurtured and developed. 
It’s such a pity i live in Sydney which is an eternity away otherwise I’d find an excuse to stay here every month. But I will be back to NYC one day and this hotel is the reason why.
Well done team.

title: Magical Place!
text: The Bryant Park Hotel was an amazing experience. It made our stay in New York so special. The staff made us feel welcome at all times. Cheers especially to Jo Kinsella - always ready with her warm smile and practical info about a city she truly loves. 100% recommend the Bryant Park Hotel - fond memories forever.

title: Great NYC Trip!
text: The Bryant Park couldn't have been more welcoming, attentive, and convenient for my New York trip.  Rooms were impeccable with some of the softest pillows ever experienced.  While there, hope you get to meet Josephine "Jo" Kinsella.  Wonderful engagement with a lovely accent.

title: Perfect Way to Stay in NYC
text:
This gorgeous former Radiator Building was a stunning way to start our trip to New York and is perfectly situated right in the heart of NYC yet with the lush greenery of Bryant Park surrounding it. 
From the moment we checked in we were treated beautifully by Guest Relations Manager Jo Kinsella - who could not have done more to make us feel more welcomed with her friendly, professional and helpful approach. 
Before and throughout our stay, nothing was too much trouble - and the morning coffee and muffins were also very tasty and welcomed. 
We had a drink in the Celon bar and a meal in Koi - both of which are highly recommended. 
If you want a luxury hotel (but without being pretentious) in the heart of NYC then I can't recommend the Bryant Park highly enough.

title: Highly recommended
text: This charming hotel offers outstanding service, impeccably clean and serene rooms that are surprisingly spacious, especially by New York standards. I highly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel.

title: Mother/daughter birthday trip
text: We have visited NYC for many years and stayed in a variety of hotels. This time I chose the Bryant Park Hotel to celebrate my daughter's birthday for our mother/daughter trip. I couldn't have made a better choice. Our stay was incredible! From the moment we walked in to the moment we checked out, we were treated as if we were the most important people there. Upon check in, Jo greeted us as if we were best friends. She was delightful and entertaining and super helpful. Scott was at check in as well and was so attentive to our needs. Thru booking, I had mentioned it was my daughter's birthday which both Jo and Scott acknowledged. Even better - when we returned to our room after going out for the afternoon, they had a beautifully handwritten birthday message with a balloon and 2 cupcakes from Magnolia Bakery. Such a simple gesture with an incredible impact. The room was very nice and clean. Good size for NYC. The bathroom was incredible too. The bed was a queen (I prob should have booked 2 beds) so it was a little tight for us but not horrible. We visited the Celon lounge for a drink the first night. Super cool place in the lower level of the hotel.  And the location of the Bryant Park Hotel is just perfect. Right across the street from Bryant Park. We had breakfast, snacks, cocktails at the park throughout our visit. Easy walk to many areas. We would definitely stay here again...and again.

title: Great Midtown Hotel
text:
We just returned from a whirlwind trip to New York City, where we stayed for five nights at the Bryant Park Hotel.  From the welcome at reception to encounters with bell staff/concierge and housekeeping, all of the staff were friendly, professional and extremely helpful. (Special shoutout to Jo at the front desk. who gave us lots of tips and was a pleasure to talk to.) Our room was beautiful, a junior suite with wood floors, king bed (good mattress), huge bathroom with separate tub and shower, and lovely views of Bryant Park.  (Only drawback for some might be that the rooms on the front facing the park also get quite a bit of street noise, but the noise canceling machine helped a lot, and the views are great.)
If you're in New York for theater and want a midtown location, you can't beat the Bryant Park, and we would definitely return.

title: A 5-star Experience
text: Lovely hotel with excellent service, clean, quiet rooms which are spacious — especially for New York — and a location that can’t be beat. Bryant Park is a treasure, and directly across the street, and the theatre district is just a short walk. Highly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel.

title: A great stay!
text: We had a great six night stay in one of the junior suites.  The room was huge, especially the bathroom, which is really a stand-out in NYC.  The housekeepers were great and left our room looking spotless everyday.  The first night of our stay we had some light coming into our room from one of the neighboring buildings.  A staff member  arrived within 20 minutes and delivered two eyes masks.  The next morning we had a note on the door from the GM offering us another room, then they followed up with a phone call.  We opted to stay put because the room had a gorgeous view and the eye masks solves the issue. You couldn’t ask for more attentive service.   There were some really nice touches too,  like a heater in the bathroom, a noise machine and iced lemon water at the elevator entrance.  The location is central and close to everything.  I would defintely stay again.

title: Great stay
text: We stayed in a newly renovated junior suite. First occupants since renovation. The room was clean and spacious and the bed was incredibly comfortable. The bathroom was roomy and the rain shower had good water pressure. Jo at the front desk was warm and accommodating and made sure our stay was fantastic. We thank you Jo for your kindness warmth and hospitality and for a little history of the building. We will be back and we hope Jo is there to greet us.

title: Great mid-town location and even better staff
text: We booked a block of rooms for an extended business engagement with various people coming in and out of NYC on different days. The hotel was very accommodating with our room requests. The staff was excellent - particularly Ray at concierge and Jo Kinsella at the front desk. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Great location and highly recommend for business traveler
text: great location, across from Bryant Park and good restaurants nearby.  Highly recommend if visiting Times Square and if you are on a business trip.  Shout out to Larry the house man at front door for taking care of me during the trip.  Only drawback for me is that the hotel bar isnt as ‘lively’ as others I’ve been to during the work week but still a nice place to unwind after a day at the office.

title: Perfection!  Location - Value - Friendly Staff - Safety - Convenience
text: OMG!  As close to perfection as we've experienced in ANY hotel.  Besides the aesthetically pleasing exterior of the building and the perfect location for exploring all of Manhattan, next to public transportation, walking distance to top attractions and food.  Our stay started with a warm welcome from the front desk staff, AND THEN...when we entered our room we discovered balloons, a chilled bottle of Prosecco, and a HAND WRITTEN NOTE (thanks JO!) acknowledging the reason for our celebratory visit to NYC.  Each day we were greeted with smiles and offers of assistance and we came and went.  We HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Bryant Park Hotel and will definitely stay here on our next trip to "The Big Apple."

title: 5 star experience
text: Wow! What a phenomenal hotel right on Bryant Park. Recently renovated with beautiful, modern rooms. The hotel speaks for itself but the hospitality made our stay so special. Jo, at the front desk was especially kind and hospitable. She was always eager to help and made us feel like we were her only customers. If you are looking for a 5 star experience right on Bryant Park…this is your place!

title: Awesome Hotel - with a park!
text:
Awesome hotel conveniently located next to Bryant Park and close, but not too close to all the Midtown attractions. They provide complimentary coffee and muffins in the morning, great start to kick off your day enjoying those and the first sunlight at Bryant Park.

Front desk staff Josephine and John were exceptional and housekeeping also truly wonderful.

title: Wonderful experience -- highly recommend!!!
text: My daughter and I spent a delightful weekend at the Bryant Park Hotel.  The location is perfect for walking to many of the great NYC spots, and there are plenty of wonderful places to eat and explore right on the park.   We particularly loved the hotel staff, especially Jo, who went to great lengths to make my daughter feel special on her birthday!   I would recommend this hotel to anyone coming to explore NYC!

title: My favorite NYC hotel (still)
text: Another fabulous stay at the Bryant Park Hotel.  The staff from reservations to baggage check to front desk could not have been more helpful.  They remembered information from my last stay and had a tea kettle waiting in my room.  Each person I encountered was friendly and welcoming.  The rooms are large, enormous by NYC standards and quiet - little street noise, no hallway noise.  They're in the midst of room renovations and I can't wait to see what how they'll turn out.  I'll certainly stay here any time I visit NYC.

title: Great value, great location, great quality
text:
We had a wonderful time in NYC and this hotel is just terrific. The location is amazing-great view of Bryant Park, steps to the subway stop and within walking distance of many great attractions, shops, restaurants, etc.  The rooms are spacious and the bathroom is very big. Extremely clean, pleasant staff and nice details (pillows, bed, towels, etc) The manager Siobhan is extremely easy to communicate with and very helpful. Overall a great value without compromising on quality.

This was our second stay and I'm sure we will be back in the future.

title: Worth every dollar!
text:
Such a wonderful place! 
Staff was amazingly welcoming and kindhearted. 
We stayed at a junior executive suite overlooking Bryant Park and had all the service we could ask for. And then some. 
Expensive but worth every nickel and dime. Our warmest recommendations ❤️

title: Many Reasons Why The Bryant Park is Consistently Number One on Trip Advisor
text: Stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for 4 nights in December and there is not one reason why it is number 1 on Trip Advisor out of 499 hotels in NYC but several reasons. First is the  staff who are the most genuine. Always happy to help. Starting with John Castillo and his amazing front desk staff, especially Jo and Shannon. The bellmen Ray, Dominic and Ronan are always on top of it as well. (It was fun to learn that several of the staff live where I grew up in Woodside Queens). Second, the building is a marvel in itself. from the Black and Gold Gothic Facade to it's history. Third is location, can't beat it. Far enough away from the craziness that NYC can become but close enough to all the action and a subway station on the corner. Centrally located in midtown very easy to get downtown or uptown. The rooms are large, functional and very comfortable with lots of windows even in the large bathroom. We had a Park View corner room and it had 5 large windows, 3 in the bedroom and 2 in the bathroom. with only 128 rooms and 2 quick elevators it was always quick to get to the room and back to the lobby even with being on the 16th floor. I will say the rooms are in need of an update and my understanding is that is in process. It's not that they are shabby or anything and all the furniture is well maintained and in good shape as is everything else in the room, just the style is dated. Celon bar in the basement is very special and a must try. Ambience, staff and drinks all shine here. Koi restaurant is good and once again the staff, ambience and service all shine here. Food is very good but not great.  It can get very noisy inside so keep that in mind if you need to have an important conversion at dinner. Room rates are some of the best you'll find in NYC given the location of the hotel  and size of the rooms compared to many other surrounding hotels in the area. The free coffee and muffins in the lobby are a nice touch and the coffee is top shelf. I will be retuning to the Bryant Park hotel in May for my second stay and very much looking forward to it.

title: Convenient location & excellent customer service
text: I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel last month and was blown away by the friendly and helpful concierge. My room was not ready yet since I arrived early in the morning and they were able to hold my bags and allowed me to freshen up in the rest room. I forgot a sweatshirt in the gym and Jo, the concierge, sent me an email and offered to mail it back to me. Beside the excellent customer service the location was very convenient if you are visiting Midtown/Times Square. I had dinner with colleagues at Koi restaurant in the same building and the sushi was delicious. I highly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel and would stay again!

title: The splurge was absolutely worth it!
text: The Junior King Suite was a perfect choice for my family getaway.  Spacious, very tidy, and comfortable, it offered a great home base for our three day adventure in the city.  Our suite overlooked the beautiful Bryant Park.  The staff was attentive.  The elevators were wonderfully quick.  The hotel has a beautiful lower level bar, where we enjoyed a cocktail at the end of the day.  Our Junior Suite included a large bathroom that had both a deep soaking tub and separate shower. The bed was very comfortable. The hotel accommodated our request for a microwave and a hotpot. There were free muffins and coffee in the morning at the hotel, or there were other very delicious breakfast spots on or near the block.   There is a subway stop at the end of the block. This was a splurge for me, yet the value for the money seemed very worth the memories.  I would stay here again.

title: Customer for Life
text:
I recently visited New York City for the first time recently on a business trip, not knowing much about the city I was pointed to The Bryant Park Hotel for my stay. I can not stress enough how amazing and fulfilling my experience was with the hotel.

I was met by Jo Kinsella at the front desk and immediately knew I was in good hands. The service went above and beyond and The Bryant Park Hotel now has a customer for life.

title: Quiet, friendly and comfortable  luxury.
text: I have wanted to stay at the Bryant Park Hotel for years but never had the chance. In March of 2024 that chance came and it did exceeded my expectations.  Genuinely friendly and helpful staff.  The room was large and very comfortable and the bed was superb. One of the quietest hotel rooms I have ever stayed in.  The location is outstanding on Bryant Park with the 7BDMF trains only 100 feet away.  Close to 42nd street tourist mob scenes yet quiet and removed if you don't want that. Definitely will return.

title: A wonderful place to stay.
text: Our stay at the Bryant Park Hotel was at the end of a two week trip to the US and it rounded off our holiday perfectly. The room was comfortable, the staff were attentive and courteous, and Jo on the front desk was outstanding in making us feel welcome. The hotel is perfectly located for seeing this part of the city and we had an excellent day before heading off to JFK. Thank you for a most enjoyable stay!

title: Big rooms and wonderful staff!
text:
BPH has some of the biggest hotel rooms in NYC which is great when staing in the city for extended periods of time. The folks working at the hotel are wonderful, kind and helpful. I stay here every time I get a chance!

Special shoutout to Jo at the front-desk who is just wonderful and was really helpful during checkout.

title: Anniversary night out
text: We had an amazing time from the beginning of our stay until the end. Stephanie was so nice and since it was our anniversary they upgraded our room to a junior sweet. Then when we entered the room we found a nice bottle of prosecco and chocolates. All the rooms at this hotel are very nice in size and roomy. They even have large bathtubs that 2 can fit into. The view of the park is very nice to look at.

title: Our NYC Home
text:
Bryant Park Hotel has become Our Home Away from Home. We have stayed at the property consistently since our daughter started NYU in 2020. It never disappoints. The location, the rooms, and the staff all make our visits easy and comfortable.

HUGE shout out to Jo, the Guest Service Agent who went above and beyond during our latest trip. Jo made us feel like our visit was Important and truly made us feel like we had returned home. She learned about why we were in NYC and remembered everything we shared with her. She kept in touch throughout our stay and even celebrated our daughter running the half marathon. She made an already Special time even more Special. We Appreciated her so much and Enjoyed getting to know her. Bryant Park Hotel has a good one in Jo.

title: Best first-time stay in New York
text: Most magical first-time visit to NYC, made even more wonderful by the lovely hosts of the Bryant Park Hotel. The view of the park is amazing, the location is great. We stayed in the standard room which was quite small but still comfortable, we received room service on our first night after a 12 hour journey, the food was mediocre for the cost however the service was excellent as the restaurant staff were able to modify my requested order to be vegan. The hotel staff were so welcoming and helpful, I had a package ordered to the hotel to take back to the UK and the staff were able to receive this for me and have it delivered to the room. I hope I can return to New York soon, we will absolutely stay at the Bryant Park Hotel again.

title: Great staff and very responsive. Easy checkin and lots of amenities. Will definitely return
text: Great Staff - very welcoming and responsive. Easy check-in and lots of amenities. Great location in NYC. Always had information about restaurants and events in the city. Definitely return to stay at the Bryant Pork Hotel. Rooms and suites very spacious. But, most importantly - really great staff

title: Truly Amazing!
text: My daughter and I stayed at The Bryant Park Hotel for her birthday. This was our second stay, and I will not even consider any other hotel in NYC moving forward. From the moment we walked in we were warmly greeted and made to feel our experience was their top priority. The check-in procedure included a conversation about our plans for the day. Rain was expected so we were offered umbrellas which came in handy. Furthermore, all of the employees that were in the lobby greeted us and made conversation. I mentioned we were hoping for a nice view of the park, and they really went over the top with that request. Coming back at the end of a very rainy day, Veronica asked if we would like a tea and kettle sent to our room. We went up to our room and found that the staff had signed a birthday card for my daughter and delivered cupcakes. My daughter and I had a very special time enjoying our tea and cupcakes while looking out at an amazing view. The service we received by Veronica and the whole team was unlike any other hotel stay I have ever had. Thank you to all of you for such a memorable experience. We will see in May for our next visit!

title: Exceptional service!
text:
Before we arrived I got an email asking about our stay and if there was a special event. 
It was a birthday celebration trip for my mother.  Jo greeted us and realized I booked just a standard room which was too small for my mom and I with just a small fee she upgraded our room. Jo has the best customer service I have ever received traveling anywhere! 
She made my mom feel so special.  They delivered a bottle of Prosecco and cupcakes to the room with a hand written card. I can say enough fabulous things about this beautiful historic hotel right across the street from
Bryant park.  Exceptional !

title: Wonderful hospitality
text: I traveled my son. ,Jo at the front desk ,is lovely . She  settled my son is his room while I worked . The staff arranged a quiet place for me to work while we waited for our room. I wake up early and the front desk arranged for a coffee machine in my room. It was the personal touch .

title: Highly recommend, with a great staff, especially Jo!!
text: It was our second stay at the Bryant Park Hotel for our anniversary. Both times Jo checked us in. What a wonderful human being she is! So professional and personable. All of your staff are so helpful and fantastic but, Jo is a gem! We were so sad to leave, but made sure we didn’t leave without saying goodbye to Jo! We will always recommend the Bryant Park Hotel to anyone looking for a place to stay in the city! We hope to be back soon!

title: The outstanding Bryant Park Hotel !!
text: We had such a great experience, just an excellent hotel and staff!! I brought my wife to NYC for our anniversary, her birthday and her first time to New York City. John is so great, very patient with all my questions and so helpful recommending restaurants, tours and arranging transportation and extras! Our room overlooked Bryant Park with both shower and large tub! It made for a wonderful weekend together!! My sincere thanks to John and the staff for their excellence!!

title: Fabulous hotel and staff
text: Stayed here for 6 nights, can’t rate it high enough. Beautiful hotel in the best location!! Staff were incredible, from the moment we arrived Dwight went above and beyond to make our stay great, he is a real asset to the hotel,  Dwight and John on the front desk recommended the best diners and restaurants, and were always happy to help in anyway they could. Jo on the last day was helpful too. So central and easy access to everywhere. Times Square, Empire State, Fifth Avenue all within a short walk. Stunning room and views, so comfortable. Bathroom had huge tub to relax in after a hard days site seeing. Don’t even think of going anywhere else, they made our stay wonderful.

title: Great hotel, amazing service!
text:
Lovely hotel in a great location - easy access for lots of retail therapy and sightseeing, but also very good for business.  Rooms are modern, clean, comfortable and relatively spacious.  Free coffee and muffins offered downstairs in the mornings.  Lovely Bar downstairs with some great cocktails.  For me, the best thing about this place that makes it stand out, and the reason I’m a repeat customer is the personal customer service.  In particular, Jo Kinsella at front desk is amazing.  She is so welcoming and helpful, I thought she owned the place … maybe she does - could be undercover boss :)

Jo was welcoming from the moment we arrived and kept up the VIP service throughout our stay.  Thank you!

title: Great stay. Go Josephine!
text:
Great room and location. Josephine on the front desk was really welcoming and energetic.

The beds were comfy and pillows were soft.

The bar downstairs was lively, great cocktails and super fun stay! Would highly recommend the hotel and NYC

title: Fabuleux séjour au Bryant Park Hotel
text:
Nous avons passé une semaine avec ma fille adolescente dans la suite junior du 8eme étage avec des vues incroyables sur le Bryant Park, la New York Public Library, le Summit et les buildings de midtown. 
L'hôtel est idéalement placé pour un séjour touristique. Il permet de se déplacer vers les sites principaux très facilement a pied ou a métro.
Le + pour un séjour en famille: un whole foods market a 2mn et les lignes de métro principales. En hiver une super patinoire au pied de l'Hôtel!
Le personnel de l'hôtel a été très agréable et très prévenant pour que notre séjour soit parfait. Nous remercions notamment Joséphine, Dominic et Scott. 
La chambre était parfaitement propre et a été extrêmement bien entretenue pendant tout notre séjour. La salle de bains est très agréable et permet de se relaxer après de longues marches. La literie est parfaite. Nous avons bénéficier d'un coin séjour et d'un coin bureau très pratiques.
Le +: Une vue Whaou sur le parc, un large coffre  fort permettant de placer facilement ordinateurs et tablettes et des glaçons dispo en chambre a l'heure de l'apéro! 
Le +++:L'hôtel propose gracieusement (et oui! et a NY c'est pas courant...) du café et des muffins délicieux le matin dans le hall ainsi qu'une délicieuse fontaine d'eau citronnée toute la journée.

title: Best Hotel ever
text: This hotel has to be your base in NYC. Fantastic location, gorgeous rooms and exceptional value for money. However, the jewel in the crown is the staff.  Big shout out to Jo and Veronica at reception.  Warm, friendly and nothing too much trouble.  It is the likes of Jo and Veronica who turn good to great.

title: Recommended 1000%- An oasis in the middle of Manhattan
text:
This was my 2nd time and I'd definitely go back 10.000 more times to that hotel- it's a boutique feeling in the middle of chaotic traffic of Manhattan- most of hotels I've been to in the city are NOISY- this was so different, and so much better that decided to go back.
Story gets better when my room was cold and the treat I received + the change of the room was OMG, out of this world and the team behind it absolutely outstanding- I'd recommend this 100.000 times
Ah forgot to share, how much I sneeze with dust, this hotel has no carpets in the room (apart from a small one on the central table) my allergy is 0 when I'm there!!
Staff are phenomenal and they deserve all the good stuff in this world!!

title: Repeat guest
text: The Bryant Park Hotel has now become our go-to place to stay in NYC.  It's literally steps from everything, but feels hidden behind its historic facade.  The rooms are large.  The morning coffee and muffins are great.  We've never had to wait for an elevator.  But it's the warmth and genuineness of the staff that makes it such a gem.  Jo in particular has taken great care of us our last two stays.  We'll be back.

title: Excelente localização, staff educados em especial John Rey, muffim e café pela manhã, banheiro com banheira. Melhorar decoração
text: Avaliando no geral achei excelente. Apenas o quarto que ficamos ( 1005) merecia uma decoração melhor. Porém a cama muito confortável, bons travesseiros e banheiro de bom tamanho com banheira. Muffim e café oferecido pela manhã. Vale conhecer.

title: Fantastic stay in Manhattan
text:
One of the best hotel stays ever anywhere.  We went to NYC to celebrate our son's engagement and booked 3 rooms.  We had to make a few changes and the hotel team was very flexible with these changes.  The concierge, Dominic was very helpful with some bookings we asked him to make (e.g. limos, taxis...).  The front desk team were all very helpful and friendly.  Great location beside Bryant Park, short walk to Times Square....  The best hotel stay I have had in NYC .  We will be back and bring others.
They went out of their way to acknowledge our celebration.

title: Perfect stay for my business trip.
text:
Rated excellent because:

1. Team were very friendly and accommodating and made a point to actually engage in conversation and learn my name.  
2. Spacious and quiet room with large bath - had both a shower and separate tub.     Well appointed and clean.   Thoughtful details like white noise machine and earplugs although I didn’t need them. 
3. Great bar and restaurant.  
4. Properly equipped fitness center 
5. Convenient location.  
6. Clean.  
7.  Complimentary muffins and coffee in morning.

title: Wonderful Weekend
text:
Wow wow wow what a fantastic weekend we had with you, and that was only the alf of it!! Now i'm not normally one to write reviews, but the fact I am is the least I can do to show our gratitude to you all for the truly memorable experience that we had here. The whole team are like one close happy family, and they made my family feel so special and like part of this family!!!  Cannot thank you all enough. We've never been to a hotel with such a lovely warmth and atmosphere. From the moment we arrived last Thursday until the minute we left on Monday, we were looked after amazingly. We were greeted on arrival with a warm welcome from Jo and the team plus a bottle of fizz to help us settle in. Jo goes above and beyond and is a true professional but with such a friendly manner on a personal level. In some hotels, although treated well, you get the feeling that you are a commodity. The team here a different, they really made us feel so genuinely welcome, and the chats we had in the lobby each day were an absolute pleasure. The emails we received from Jo and Veronica, once we returned home, were a touch of class and showed how truly thoughtful and caring they are. Thank you all so much for such a memorable and beautiful stay. We can't wait to return!!!  

Oh yes, and as for the actual hotel, it was perfect!

title: Siempre excelente
text: Es nuestra segunda estadía en el hotel y la experiencia fue perfecta. Todos los empleados del hotel son excelentes y nos hicieron sentir como en casa, especialmente Verónica que nos esperaba con una sorpresa en la habitación por nuestro aniversario. Está lleno de detalles que hacen de este hotel una opción increíble: desde la habitación amplia y su comodidad, la ubicación frente a Bryant Park, café por la mañana o agua saborizada por la tarde. Es una gran elección para descubrir Nueva York, esperamos volver pronto.

title: Perfect Wedding Weekend
text: I cannot say enough great things about BPH! We got married across the street at Bryant Park Grille and BPH was where we and our guests stayed for the weekend. The entire staff went out of their way to make sure everyone had an amazing wedding weekend. The ENTIRE staff at the hotel was remarkably helpful, friendly, and accommodating. So many of our guests made a point to tell us how wonderful the hotel and the staff was throughout the weekend. From the ladies getting ready in the bridal suite in the morning, to the breakfast on Sunday, everything the staff of the BPH did was truly unbelievable. The rooms are beautiful, comfortable, and spacious, and they include so many nice touches. BPH was so great and made our weekend even more special than we could've imagined.

title: Great hotel for a romantic getaway or family vacation!
text:
We are so excited to return this weekend for our second stay at the Bryant Park Hotel, after staying in November of 2022. I forgot to post a review back then, but our upcoming stay reminded me that our experience the last time needed a shout-out. We had two adjoining suites for our family of 5 and a friend and the view overlooking the winter market and ice skating at Bryant Park was so fun! The rooms were large and well-appointed, especially for NYC standards. The location is perfect, you can walk anywhere in midtown and it's easy to get car service right outside the hotel doors. My husband and I enjoyed a lovely dinner at the sushi restaurant in the lobby.  

The reason I'm writing this review is because of the staff who made our stay extra special. Our curious 7-year-old got into a discussion with Jo about where the luggage is stored downstairs (we stored our luggage on check-out day to go explore the city a bit longer before our departure). She was so engaging and taught him how to be a bellman! When we returned for our luggage she presented him with a little certificate. It was such a memorable experience he still keeps it in his room and talks about the hotel to this day. Not only is the hotel great for families, my husband and I are excited to come for a quick getaway for just the two of us.

title: Jo far exceeds expectations.
text: Born and bred in NYC — to say my expectations are high would be an understatement. Jo at BPH doesn’t disappoint. From the moment you walk in, Jo greets you with a warm welcome and always has your best interest in mind. Make sure you ask her to share her tin whistle stories :).

title: First Class Service and Excellent Room
text:
I was treated like royalty from the moment I drove up at night in a rental vehicle stuffed with personal belongings for my move from North Carolina to Manhattan. Dominik led the team (including Julio and Josh) that cheerfully and quickly unloaded everything, taking most of it to a storage room where it remained for two days (very few hotels offer such a service). Scott at the front desk also gave me a warm welcome and checked me in quickly. Dominik and crew then took the overnight luggage upstairs to my room. And, oh my, what a room! The view of Bryant Park (from the three tall windows of the upper floor corner room) all lit up for the Christmas season was stunning! And the bathroom with full tub, large shower, and two more large windows was amazing too. The bed was super comfortable with excellent quality linens. And nice soft, thick towels were plenteous.

Upon departure two days later, Ronan and John loaded up a large SUV with all my belongings from the storage room and the hotel room for the short trip to my newly-acquired apartment a few blocks away. Oh, and Jo did the check-out at the front desk with a great combination of friendliness and style, sending me off with warm well-wishes.

title: Another Great Stay at Bryant Park Hotel
text: When we go to NYC we always stay at The Bryant Park Hotel.  We have been staying at The Bryant Park Hotel since 2010 when visiting NYC.  We were there in October 2023.  This was our first visit back to NYC and The Bryant Park Hotel since 2020.  As usual The Bryant Park Hotel did not disappoint.  It is a wonderful hotel - fabulous location and very warm and welcoming staff. Jo Kinsella and the team were super helpful and went above and beyond!   Jo took great care of us.  We had a lovely upgraded suite overlooking Bryant Park!   It was a beautiful room!  The bathrooms at The Bryant Park Hotel are the best!  Very spacious!  It was a great stay and we can’t wait to return.

title: Great Experience
text: Me and my girlfriend stayed Bryant Park few weeks ago. I can’t express how much fun we had at Celon, ambience music drinks that Gokan made for us was incredible. He is a very skillful manager and he stepped in behind the bar and created best drinks(Old Fashion) we ever had. His crew is very friendly and kind. We loved the place and definetly coming back next year. 10 out of 10.

title: Spacious and well-designed suites
text: I had the special privilege of getting to stay in one of the newly renovated suites. There will be more of those to come soon as I was told. It was the best hotel room I've seen in all of New York City. It was so inviting, serene, relaxing, and notably large (It was the largest type they have, with a separate room for the living/dining space). The front desk staff made sure to ask me at check in to provide them with my feedback and then they were sincerely interest in my perspectives as I checked out. Jo was especially friendly and helpful upon check out. Other notable things about this hotel: the staff are all very helpful, the location is excellent, the elevators are fast, and the coffee in the morning is strong.

title: Bryant Park hotel
text:
Stayed at the Bryant Park hotel for a business trip. The location was perfect and central to the business area. Josephine was brilliant on reception and no ask was too much.

The rooms were nice, big and modern and the bathroom offered separate bath and shower which all look quite new.

title: Great Hotel !
text:
Great Hotel, perfect location, amazing restaurants and services.  Very helpful staff ! 

I booked around 20 room for business. Everything was great. 

From the booking to the checkout, everyone was very helpful. All our need were met.

We had a great time!

title: What a find for NYC!  Loved this hotel.
text: Loved this hotel for NYC.  Great location right across from Bryant park which has a skate rink and Christmas market.  Close to everything but not right in the mix of times square or the busier/tourist areas.  Close to Grand Central and the Library.  Our room was on a high floor and we were free upgraded to a sweet so we had a huge room with a living room, kitchenette and 2 baths for the price of a regular room.  The gym is small but great. The restaurant is good and the basement bar was very cool and great.  Couldn't say enough about this hotel.  Very cool exterior, staff were great.  Totally recommend it.

title: Wonderful hotel, great location !
text:
We had a great one night stay in January.  We got there a bit early and staff, especially Jo, were very kind and accommodating while we waited for our room.  They were all very attentive and helpful throughout our stay.  
The hotel's location is fantastic, with some wonderful dining places very nearby.  Rooms were really nice, especially by NYC standards - fantastic bathrooms !!
This will become our regular NYC hotel.

title: A wonderful wedding weekend
text: I arranged a block of rooms at this hotel for my wedding at the Bryant Park Grill. We had a wonderful time. It was super convenient for guests to go across the street to the venue. Veronica and other staff were professional and helpful. I enjoyed the bridal suite. We got some great shots. The view was beautiful.

title: Brilliant hotel in the centre of everything
text:
I cannot praise this hotel highly enough. We were celebrating our wedding anniversary and we’re made to feel incredibly special. All the staff were amazing but I have to say Josephine Kinsella on reception made the trip especially memorable. 
The room was spacious snd super clean. We never had to ask for anything- we even had extra amenities left in our room as I knew we were arriving late and needed extra hangers. A lovely bottle of fizz was left for us to celebrate with too! 
We will definitely be back

title: Brilliant and unexpected surprise
text: What a surprise. Along the past four decades, I have stayed at most the New City Hotels that can easily be named, from the now gone Plaza to the Soho Grand to the St. Regis. The Bryant Park was such a wonderful surprise: fantastic location, and what a room a had. Flawless service, with a shout out to Josephine at the front desk. Will return soon.

title: Excellent hotel
text: My husband and I had a wonderful stay at Bryant Park Hotel. All the staff were so friendly, efficient, and helpful. A special thanks to Jo at reception who went out of her way to look after us with recommendations for excursions and organizing a kettle and teabags in our room.  Nothing was too much trouble. The room was clean, spacious and a pleasure to come home to each day. The position was so central. The extra touches like cold water in the foyer were much appreciated. I highly recommend.

title: Excellent Hospitality
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is my favorite place to stay in NYC. It has easy access to the park, a great hotel bar and large rooms (for New York). The thing that separates it the most is the staff, particularly Jo at the front desk. I arrived early and was on an important call. She wrote down any questions on a paper as to not interrupt my call, walked me to the elevator and pushed the button. Inside my key was a nice (and funny) note welcoming me. People like her is what separates good hotels from the great ones!

title: Top notch and amazing customer care experience
text: After complaining about the temperature and noise of the room, The whole team made our stay extremely exciting, as they did care about our complaints and found new rooms which 100% fitted to our expectations and above. The team made a brilliant job and we felt like being treated as "special guests" who came here for many years already, like friends. Best experience in Hotel I ever made. Thank you Siobhan (Veronica for taking care of the rooms, James and Sisi for one of the best Amaretto Sour in town),  you can be proud of your team. Can't wait to stay here again next time.

title: A hidden gem of a place
text: The entire experience was amazing. The room was cozy and the staff was extremely accommodating and knew us by first name !  The club Celon was also an excellent experience .  Will definitely  stay here when I return to NYC!

title: Great last minute booking
text: Great experience. Appreciate service by Z (Zaaul) who greeted me and my taxi and helped me with my bag. The service was excellent and the location is perfect right across from Bryant Park. I’d definitely stay here again and if for longer I’d pay for a more luxurious room with a view.

title: CUSTOMER SERVICE AT IT'S FINEST
text: Exceptional Customer Service leaders are what Jo and Veronica bring to the Bryant Park Hotel.  The atmosphere is friendly and welcoming with a touch of always making you feel at home in one of the world's largest cities.  Highly recommend this property - attached bar and restaurant with beautiful Bryant Park just outside the door.

title: Fantastic client happy hour event. Great atmosphere and service
text: I had a great experience hosting my customers for a happy hour at the Celon in Bryant Park Hotel. Alex Cintron hosted us all the way leading up to the event and the night of. She was attentive and proactive to all our needs from start to finish. I'll definitely be back with other customers in the future.

title: Excellent Stay
text: All of the staff was welcoming and very willing to help and answer questions. Jo at the front desk was especially kind and helpful when my stay had to be extended multiple times. She worked to give me a room upgrade. The rooms are very clean and comfortable and, for me, the location is perfect.

title: Broadway Anniversary Trip!
text: We loved our stay at Bryant Park Hotel - the front desk team who helped us was amazing the entire time and Jo was incredible. She was so kind and helped us with our double booked stay. The hotel is beautiful, and the rooms are so spacious and bright, which is was a huge plus for New York. Everything was very clean. We only gave it 1 star less than 5 because the bed was not super comfortable. If you like firm beds, you will be at home here! Overall we would definitely stay again!

title: Another great stay at the Bryant Park Hotel!
text:
The Bryant Park Hotel is our “go to” hotel when vacationing in New York.
The warm staff, perfect location and the large tasteful rooms make staying at this iconic hotel a special experience.  We are also most appreciative of the kind personal hospitality extended to us by the gracious Guest Service Agent, Jo Kinsella. She’s great!

title: Great experience!
text: This hotel is just terrific. I can’t wait to return. The location is fabulous and the staff there are very friendly, accommodating and helpful. I loved the spacious and well appointed room and bath Really top notch.

title: Overrated
text:
This is definitely not worty as nr 1 ranked hotel in NY.
Its a very good location though. Pretty large room & bathroom. Free coffee & muffins in the morning. Minibar with good selection.
Servicefriendly staff. But the hotel is not very good maintained. Its screaming for renovation. Rooms, elevators, gym & public spaces.
Cold floor on bathroom & very low pressure on the water. Takes minutes to wait for warm water. 1100 dollars for 3 nights are decent in NY, but i would find another hotel next time. Weak 4

title: Great hotel for a New York City break
text:
This is a beautiful hotel located just off 5th avenue and in the heart of midtown New York. On arrival we are treated very well by Jo Kinsella on the desk who made us feel very welcome and helped resolve  any small issues we had.
The hotel bar is very nicely set up and the restaurant had good quality food

title: Try another hotel that has heat in the bathroom and is quieter to sleep
text: Check-in was quick and efficient.  Room is small, sparse and feels like a college dormitory room.  There are few amenities.  For example, there is no coffee maker or hot water pot.  The room can be noisy when trying to sleep as nearby there were loud parties playing music.  The bathroom size was adequate but was freezing as the heat did not work.  In the morning, opposite the elevators is coffee and tea as well as mass produced muffins that were practically half baked.  Would I stay here again?  Probably not.  Would I recommend it to others?  Probably not.

title: Posizione eccellente e ottimo servizio
text: Posizione da 10 , servizio alla reception con personale super gentile e disponibile …..hall veramente bruttina e triste !!!! Camera piccola ma con tutto ciò che serve , dal frigo bar super rifornito ad ogni cosa possa tornare utile 😀bagno molto grande . Letto piccolo ma molto molto comodo , pulizia della camera ottima e super efficiente ! Purtroppo la camera è davvero rumorosa ( il fatto che senza chiederlo sul comodino trovi i tappi x le orecchie la dice lunga ) Affaccio su Bryant Park e comodissimo a locali x colazione , pranzo e cena ! Ci siamo trovati bene ma il rumore è veramente tanto ! Costo per niente economico !!! Graxie allo staff super carino !!!!

title: Perfect 2 Night Stay in NY!
text: My husband and I just returned from a two night stay at the Bryant Park.  Everything was fantastic from the upgraded room, to Josephine at the front desk, to the young man who always helps us with our bags (sorry I do not know his name).  The hotel is perfectly located so we could walk to museums and Broadway.  It was so much fun to watch the ice skaters from our windows on the 22nd floor!  The service is so consistently good that this has become the only place we stay when we come to N.Y.

title: Pure Magic
text: The Bryant Park Hotel was magic. I have never stayed at such a property with such an amazing staff and I have stayed in a lot of places in New York. John and Z were amazing, welcoming, attentive and had great senses of humor. Pluses (besides staff), the room overlooked Bryant Park, the carousel, the skating rink and the NY Public Library. I could have spent my entire trip looking out my window. Small things -- huge, warm bathrobes. a spare blanket, perfect pillows, heat that you could control (I like it cold at night thus the need for the spare blanket and warm in the day), fantastic room amenities. a huge bathtub and separate shower. Other things that I though were gone forever were  beds that are actually made crisply and pens in the room (I confess, I took them home.) No coffee makers in the room, but coffee and muffins available downstairs in the morning.  I've always wanted to stay in that hotel -- the building is gorgeous -- but for some reason never did. I have already booked a return trip for me and one for my daughter's birthday.  Perfect, wonderful stay. Thank you so much, folks.

title: Best place to stay in NYC
text: Had the most wonderful stay at The Bryant Park Hotel. We were warmly welcomed by Jo at the front desk upon checkin and every staff member was so helpful and accommodating. Our room was spacious (especially for NYC!) and beautifully furnished with the most spectacular view of Bryant Park. My husband and I loved having a glass of wine while looking out over the ice skating rink. The bed was very comfortable and we really appreciated the little touches such as a sound machine in our room and the luxurious Molten Brown Toiletries. The location was so perfect for everything we needed to do. Just a quick walk to the Museum of Modern Art, Central Park and plenty of shopping and restaurants. You’re even incredibly close to Time Square/Rockefeller Center (less than a 5 min walk) but just removed enough to be away from the chaos and noise. We appreciated the later checkout of 12pm and the hotel kindly held onto our luggage until we were heading home later that evening so we could enjoy our last day in the city. We can’t recommend this hotel enough and are looking forward to coming back for another stay!

title: Great location and friendly, helpful staff.
text: The hotel is located right at the heart of 6th Ave at 40 St which s perfect for all major attractions. The staff were friendly and the room was spacious and clean. A special mention to Jo on reception who took time to discuss our plans and made us feel very welcome

title: Excellent location large suite
text: We had stayed at another hotel on Bryant Park before, I think it was the Bryant Park Terrace. Mistakenly I thought the Bryant Park Hotel was the same place but it’s a few meters away, conveniently and charmingly located right across from Bryant Park with its Christmas decorations, winter village and ice skating rink of which we had a glorious view from our room. Unfortunately some ugly scaffolding adorned the Bryant Park just now, spoiling the entry way. But the staff welcome was good and friendly and prompt when we arrived. I didn’t know the Bryant Park was #1 in New York on TripAdvisor (I knew it was highly ranked) but I can see how it got its rating. Slightly dated the elevators need some updating but they worked ok and our room was a very generously appointed suite with two bathrooms and a fabulous view (22nd floor). This hotel is eye watering expensive and could do with a facelift but nothing to dent a five star rating. The bar (Celon) is atmospheric and good cocktails. We didn’t eat at the hotel but we heard the restaurant was very good. You can walk everywhere from the hotel - it’s a great mid town location. Many positives; I would just say place needs an update perhaps and it’s very expensive but I guess that’s the price for being #1.

title: Great experience with Park View room
text: While the décor isn't my taste, the room was very large by NYC standards (at least 100 sq feet larger than my past few rooms) and the bathroom is massive and beautiful. We sprung for a park view room and I am so glad we did. The view absolutely made our stay. The weather wasn't great so being able to sit in the room and watch all of the holiday festivities over at Bryant Park without getting wet or being in in the massive crowd was so wonderful. I kept telling myself not to check my phone but just enjoy the view for the few days we were there. I wish we could have stayed longer. The restaurant and bar were closed on Christmas day so we didn't get to try those. Staff most days were amazing and kind. We also loved the Hershey's kisses at reception. Also, there's a privacy button over the one light. We accidently hit it one morning and didn't notice, so we didn't get housekeeping that day. Not a problem, just pointing it out so others may not have the same issues. Housekeeping the other day we were there was great.

title: Great staff and location.
text: The location was amazing! Unfortunately,  it rained but being able to walk across the street to Bryant park was convenient.  Jo Kinsella at the front desk was a wonderful breath of fresh air in the city.  She was professional and had a kind spirit that made you feel like you were visiting a family member.  Ronin her counter part was equally accommodating.  Those two alone would make me go back.

title: Always Great
text: Been coming to BPH for about a decade when I need to get away if even just for a night. Service was great, loved the deep soaking tub as always, and the bartender at Célon was lovely. My upgraded room was really spacious and I had a great late checkout and departure thanks to Josephine at the front desk. She was so great to chat with! I felt rested and happy upon leaving. Looking forward to my next stay already.

title: Fantastic Hospitality, great location and stay.
text: Probably the friendliest staff I have ever experienced at a hotel. Upon checkout, Josephine was amazing. So friendly and inquired about our trip and who I was with. It just makes a huge difference to be treated this way. Great location and close to everything you need. Thank you to the whole staff for a great stay.

title: Great Hotel - Even Better Staff!
text:
Celebrating a milestone wedding anniversary, we chose the Bryant Park Hotel for its ideal location, great service reputation, and the terrific reviews on TripAdvisor.  It did not disappoint.

We booked the junior suite for the extra space, the views of Bryant Park, and the handsomely outfitted bathroom that included a deep soaking bathtub.  Large bathrooms with tubs are a rarity in almost any hotel, and practically non-existent in New York.

Thanks to all the front desk staff who provided exceptional service on our stay...with a special shout-out to Josephine and John.  I wish I could mention everyone by name, as your attention and kindness was displayed consistently by everyone.  And lastly... thank you for not counting the number of front desk Hershey kisses I snarfed up during our stay.  

Our new favorite NYC hotel.  Until next time...!

title: Hotel Holiday Happiness
text:
We had never stayed at The Bryant Park Hotel before and chose to because it had great reviews and was within walking distance from Grand Central Terminal - what a great hotel.

Shannon checked us in and she was so welcoming and accommodating to our needs (having just carried our bags from GCT) and took the time to further explain hotel services while walking us to our elevator.

Our room was a modern well-appointed corner unit with views of Bryant Park and the bathroom was luxurious and incredibly spacious.  The location of this hotel is truly incredible.

We had left dinner reservations to the last minute so I asked Veronica at the check-in desk for some advice. She kindly offered to check with the restaurant adjacent to the hotel (Koi) to see if a table was available and within a few minutes we were seated!

We went for brunch the next morning, leaving our bags with the concierge (I wish I had gotten his name), knowing that check out was at noon.  I believe that Dwight was the manager that day, he should too be proud of how smoothly his team runs.

10/10 room cleanliness. 10/10 accommodations  10/10 location 10/10 staff

title: Great Hotel centrally located!
text: Great hotel and a great stay. Shannon at the front desk was so helpful. Our room had an amazing view of Bryant Park and the Christmas market and skating rink. Great location!  Had a good dinner right next door. Busy area during December but FUN!  Easy to get anywhere from here!

title: An Experience I’ll always cherish!
text:
My new Fiancé and I stayed an evening at the hotel that was nothing short of extraordinary! Upon first entering the premises we were greeted with welcoming smiles, champagne and a big Congrats! The service from all staff was remarkable, they made sure we were happy, comfortable and well taken care of! I have to give a special shout out and Thank You to Chris Monico  as well as Kieran who both truly went above and beyond to decorate our room adding many extra details that were so heartfelt! I felt like such a star for the evening and there aren’t enough words to express my gratitude and appreciation! 
The Bryant Park hotel felt like my home away from home and I am looking forward to many more stays there!

title: Service
text: The staff was superb during our stay and particularly wanted to thank Larry Houseman who helped us our last evening with a food devliery. He was so pleasant and a true gem! We thank you all for a great stay and thank you Larry!!

title: Perfect location and amazing staff!
text: We were just in NYC and stayed at this hotel.  You could not be more centrally located for The Christmas Markets and Skating Rink, The NY Public Library etc.  Right in the heart of the city.  The staff were incredible and made our stay just so relaxing.  In particular, a big shout out to Shannon at "Reception".  She treated us like royalty and I'm sure that every guest walks away feeling the same.  Thank you!

title: Best stay I’ve ever had 😍
text: So just to start by saying, one of the best experiences I ever had in my life . From accommodations to comfort to all in all service. My vision for a wonderful night out with my new Fiance was put together beyond expected by the team at Bryant park hotel .. Christopher Monico went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. The views of the Bryant park skate rink and lights gave us warm feeling like it was my own home . The bed super confortable, warm and gorgeous room , mini bar stocked with everything you  need to have a cozy night in, when I say attention to detail Bryant park hotel definitely knows how to do it . Upon entrance my bag was taken for me and carried to the room for me .service 100000 percent top notch .. definitely recommend everyone stay there number 1 hotel in ny in my book .. thank you Bryant park hotel and I will be back .. promise

title: Magnificent
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is excellent, its location is perfect, adjacent to Bryant Park, excellent location, between 5th and 6th avenues, in the center of the city and the entertainment center, very close to subway stations - a 2-minute walk (at the end of the block), excellent hotel service, willingness to help with any question / need that rises Special thanks to: Ray, Shanan, Zaul and John.

title: A Memorable Visit to the Bryant Park Hotel
text:
The staff was amazing. They did everything they could to make our stay memorable.  The rooms were spotless.  Special shout out to Veronica, the front end manager, Jo and Scott. They should be on a talent show, after listening to them sing Happy Birthday to my fiancee.
If you plan to visit NYC,  and need a place to stay, you will not go wrong with the Bryant Park Hotel.

title: John, Ann  and Val  (alias "The Trio) visit to New York
text: "The Trio" that is, two ladies and a gentleman in their eighties, approached New York with some trepidation albeit "on the bucket list"!!!! Pleased to say that Siobhan the   manager, Jo and the front desk, plus the concierge team at Bryant Park Hotel , ensured that we need not have had any concerns as they were so friendly, helpful and made us feel "one of the family". The reservations for Thanksgiving Day, theatre, and restaurants were superb and helped to make our stay in New York unforgettable. The hotel is in fantastic situation for a tourists holiday - central for everything.

title: This place has it all!
text:
What an amazing trip we had. This trip was my partners dream Christmas location and it turned out to be her very own fairytale of New York. 

The hotel is absolutely amazing, whether it be the staff, location or even a nice hot bath after a long day walking round the cold city - Bryant park hotel had it all. The suite with a Bryant park view was especially nice!! 

I want to say a huge special thank you to Kieran Bennett who helped bring my dreams to life! I had been speaking to Kieran for a few weeks prior to flying out as I’d planned to propose to my partner. I’d given him an idea of what I wanted but couldn’t be more grateful for how he brought it to life!! She said yes & I just wish I could have thanked him in person! 

You’ll not regret staying here!

title: Best location
text: This hotel is in the perfect location during Christmas time especially because it's right across from Bryant park and the Christmas market. Josephine at the front desk is a sweetheart, personable and helpful offering recommendations to eateries nearby. The room and hotel itself could use some updating and repairs. All the hotel staff was very accommodating and welcoming. The celon on site had a cool ambiance for some drinks.

title: Bryant Park Hotel at Christmas - 2023
text:
Great experience from arrival to departure. A most accommodating staff - friendly,
helpful and well informed.  We loved our suite, roomy, bright, very well maintained and the view was outstanding - facing Bryant Park.

title: Bryant Park Hotel perfect location for a holiday visit!
text: Bryant Park Hotel is in the best location for a holiday visit.  You can walk to everything including having the Winter Village right across the street!  The front desk staff made our birthday extra special with hand signed cards, balloon and a bottle of Prosecco.  Big shout out to Josephine for being so nice and welcoming!

title: The only hotel name you need to remember in NYC
text: I've stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel close to ten times on different occasions so I know about this hotel way more than most guests who've reviewed here. I also stayed at many different hotels in NYC in the past, including multiple big name "five-star" hotels. If you are one of the lucky people reading this review, please do yourself a favor and just stay at the Bryant Park Hotel whenever you visit the City next time. This is absolutely the best hotel you are going to find in the City. The quality of service provided by the hotel staff members is unparalleled. Kieran always makes sure if I need anything before my arrival. At the reception desk, Shannen (who set the whole tone of this hotel for me when I first visited the hotel drenched in rain) always greets me and checks me in with her bright smile. Siobhan, Zaaul, Jo, Scott, Ronan, Veronica are always available to assist and help me have a super pleasant check-out experience as well. If you call the hotel, they actually pick up the phone and answer directly instead of rerouting your phone calls to an automated system. The doormen are polite and always willing to help guests with luggage. The location of the hotel is just perfect. You have everything you need within a walking distance including CVS, and the iconic Bryant Park is literally ten steps away from the hotel entrance. It is equidistant from all the major locations you can name in the City. The cleaning staff keeps rooms super clean, and I appreciate the fact that they always have clean slippers and an umbrella available in every room. The hotel may look a bit dated, but you get a much more spacious room than most 4-star and 5-star hotels offer in the City. I think the Bryant Park Hotel provides the true upscale NYC hotel experience defined by the high quality service and attentiveness. You'll see all these other NYC hotels boasting their brand new rooms and lounges, but it's always the service that makes or breaks your hotel stay experience. The fact that I am writing this review while I'm on vacation abroad shows how much I appreciate the BPH. Give this hotel a try for your next visit. You won't be disappointed.

title: Bryant Park Hotel is the BEST!!
text: My husband Jim and I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel a few days before and up to Thanksgiving Day.  It was wonderful!!  The hotel was within walking distance to shopping, the theatre, museums, Madison Square Gardens, subway, etc.  The view of Bryant Park was beautiful with the ice skating and vendors.  Many places to dine.  But most importantly we were able to do all of these things with ease because of the wonderful staff at the hotel, especially Jo Kinsella at the front desk.  She, along with others whose name I did not catch, were wonderful. She provided directions, places to eat, places to go, arranged transportation if needed, anything we needed help with was taken care of.  And believe me, we asked PLENTY of questions! Everyone was always very courteous and greeted us with a smile.  We SO hope to return one day.  And did I mention the giant bowl of Hershey’s Kisses at the desk!!!!  My favorite!!  Thanks every so much to everyone there!!  Jim and Sally

title: Will be a repeat customer!
text: Minimalist decor but warm and fuzzy staff, especially Ronan and Dwight upon arrival.  Location central to subways, 5th Avenue and choice restaurants.  Former Radiator building provided panache and basement cocktails.

title: Made us feel so welcome.
text: After a very long day of travel we were pretty needy guests night one.  We called guest services several times for additional comfort items (too many times) Larry Houseman arrived so quickly and with such a positive attitude, really made us feel valued and so welcome.  Management, this man deserves a raise and promotion ASAP

title: Awesome hotel
text: Fantastic hotel and in the best location on Bryant Park, all the staff were incredibly friendly with a special mention to Jo at the front desk who looked after us with some great advice. Rooms were larger than normal for New York and the downstairs bar had a great vibe to it. We will definitely return to The Bryant Park Hotel.

title: Great Service!
text: I recently stayed at the Bryan Park Hotel for business.  The hotel itself is centrally located and was a fantastic experience made all the more enjoyable by Jo K at reception.  Looking forward to my next stay.

title: Great location, vibe and friendly staff
text:
We wanted a hotel away from craziness of Times Square but close enough to walk after returning from a show. While I’m sure there are cheaper options out there, my teenage daughter and I really liked it here. Everyone was super friendly, cool vibe and we got lucky that are room was available early. 

The rooms are minimalistic with a very comfy bed (which after a two-show day it was heaven). No coffee machine but there is coffee and muffins out in the am in the lobby.  My daughter was able get in some ice skating which was on her bucket list. 

All in all made for a nice mom and daughter getaway. 

We will definitely stay here again!

title: Great hotel and without doubt the best front desk and door guys in NYC
text: Stayed at the Bryant for 4 days and what a great experience. So close to everything in downtown and right next to the Bryant market and ice rink. Hotel rooms are spacious and clean and mostly with views over the park and market place. This hotel is considered a boutique hotel which l like unlike the usual chain hotels.As per the title of this review it really is the staff of the Hotel that made our stay so special. What a wonderful group of guy’s and girls.shoutout to John, Zanul ( probably not spelt correctly) Dominick, Rey and Scott👍

title: This needs to be YOUR hotel in Midtown Manhattan!
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is by far our favorite hotel in midtown Manhattan.  Lost count of how many times we've stayed (over a dozen) but it is always consistent and special.  The closeness to Bryant Park (particularly with the Holiday Festival ongoing over much of Nov and December) along with its ice skating rink, the nearness to the theatre district, shopping, Madison Square Garden, Grand Central Station, the main New York Library on Fifth Avenue, and Penn Station....all walkable within fifteen minutes max.  Hard to beat with the Hotel's proximity to major things to do.  Plus the rooms are always impeccable, and the staff is very courteous and well-trained; really nothing to complain about.  Highly recommend this gem of a hotel in the midtown area of Manhattan.

title: Top Class at the Bryant Park Hotel!
text: Another fantastic visit to NYC and the Bryant Park Hotel.  Stayed in the Bryant Park Hotel for a business trip a few weeks ago and what a terrific experience. From the moment I arrived I got a lovely warm welcome from Jo which after a long day of travel was just what I needed.  Jo quickly checked me in to a superb room with a view over Bryant Park which was fantastic.  The hotel is impeccably clean and attention to detail is meticulous.  I met the hotel manager (Siobhan) who was ever so helpful and hospitable and clearly runs a top notch hotel with very happy staff.  Special mention to Jo, Ronan and John for being so friendly and helpful during my stay.  Look forward to my next visit to NYC and of course the Bryant Park Hotel!

title: Celon Lounge inside the Hotel is a Hidden Gem!
text: Let me preface this by saying that I didn't stay at the hotel and my review is focused on the Celon Lounge. We hosted a team cocktail reception there for a party of 12. Everything from making the reservation (which we were able to do on Open Table) to the service (We loved SiSi) was seamless & top notch. We had a lovely space with tables & tiered benches in the middle of the bar. It was cozy and our server SiSi was not only super personable, but also navigated our party of 12 with ease. We will definitely be repeat customers especially since our office is just down the street!

title: Wonderful experience
text:
Great location in the heart of NYC . Very convenient 
The whole staff is kind and helpful.
Jo at the front desk was wonderful, going way beyond to help and make us feel like home .
I wil definitely go back

title: Nice centrally located hotel
text: The Bryant park is a nice hotel, centrally located. The rooms were comfortable and spacious and everything was very smooth. The staff were all very helpful and friendly, in particular Jo at reception.

title: It was a positive experience
text:
The staff was very attentive and personable.
The rooms were very modest but very clean. The bathrooms were the best as there was lots of room to spread out.
Because we were across from Bryant Park and there were vendors and ice skaters across the street, Saturday and Sunday nights were very noisy. Otherwise, the noise level was fine

title: Weekend in NYC
text: Great employees- so friendly and I loved that they called before our visit to see if we had any requests.  The most comfy beds of any hotel we’ve stayed in and a super location! Will definitely stay here again.

title: Great location and service
text: I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for 3 nights last week during a work trip, and really enjoyed it.  All of the staff were extremely helpful, especially Jo at reception.  I loved the location as my room looked down on the winter market at adjacent Bryant Park and was well situated near Times Square and the Library.  I hope to stay there again next time I'm in the city.

title: Awsome Hotel
text: Fantastic hotel and very well located. Right over the road from Bryant Park. Great rooms, very clean, and the most friendly staff in NYC. The best place we have stayed in NYC. 5 to 7min walk to Times Square

title: It is a perfect synergy of a great location and greater hospitality!
text:
Rarely I give a review before my trip ends, and I am back home, but the staff at BPH and the service make me do this the 2nd day of my trip. Dominick greeted me at the hotel, and John at the front desk and one after the other, the superstars make you feel like you belong. This was my first trip to NYC and will surely be a memorable thanks to the hospitality, location, and energy of BPH! 

Can't wait to be back.

title: Great spot, we will be back!
text: We loved this hotel, we have stayed here 3 times (June 2022, December 2022 and June 2023) and it was great each time.  We are returning in a few weeks time.    We have stayed in many NYC hotels over many years and The Bryant Park Hotel is now our favourite.  The staff were all lovely and very helpful, especially Veronica and Jo.   The location is perfect, most things are walking distance and subway is very close, lovely park to sit and watch the world go by in the summer and Christmas market in December with Ice Skating.  Rooms are a good size for NYC and spotlessly clean.

title: Staff and location are the absolute best!!
text:
I wish I could give this hotel 10 stars - especially because of the amazing staff!! They are friendly, beyond  helpful and there for you every need. Ronan and Dwight were especially helpful!! We booked and junior suite and Dwight upgraded us to a suite, which is a very nice room.  They had a bottle of chilled champagne with a birthday balloon and personalized card in the room when I arrived. Very nice surprise! 

The room was large room by NYC standards with huge windows in the living and bed rooms. We have a view of Bryant Park if we looked to the right, but pretty gnarly rooftops view we looked straight ahead. 

The bed and sheets were extremely comfy. I love that they had the “do not disturb” light next to the bed. Much classier than hanging a tag on the door. 

The bathroom was large with plenty of amenities. The water pressure was good and there adjustable shower head which felt nice after a day of sightseeing. You also had the option of a deep soak in the tub.  Housekeeping keep the room clean and supplied. 

The location of this hotel is extremely convenient!! You can easily walk to Times Square, Empire Building, New York Public Library, theater district, restaurant row and more. Bryant Park is right across the street. Nice place to grab a coffee, snack or meal and sit in the park to enjoy the weather, read and/or people watch.

title: Magical stay in The Bryant Park Hotel
text:
I had the most amazing time at the Bryant Park Hotel. The moment I walked into the Lobby I was greeted by Josephine and her colleagues. Such warmth and professionalism . I had the an astonishing room with such a fabulous view overlooking Bryant Park and the Winter Markets chosen by Veronica. Such a beautiful gesture by Siobhan for the roses to compliment the amazing room. Thank you to Larry in housekeeping for ensuring everything was at hand. I would highly recommend you stay in the Bryant park Hotel  on your next visit to NY. ❤️
Helen Kilkenny Ireland

title: 5 Stars!
text: We can't speak highly enough about our stays at the Bryant Park Hotel. We've had the pleasure of staying there twice recently, as our son is attending NYU. From the staff to the management, the service has been impeccable. The rooms are luxurious, the location is excellent, and the overall experience is truly five-star.  We highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for an exceptional stay in New York City.

title: Great hotel, excellent service
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is a lovely property with bright, modern, ultra-comfortable rooms, centrally located to all parts of Manhattan.  Most importantly, the service was wonderful. The check-in desk was beyond helpful, the luggage checking person was super friendly and efficient.  And a very special thanks to Josephine Kinsella, who went above and beyond to help me with unparalleled efficiency and kindness. Thank you, Jo!! You have secured a regular customer to your hotel!

title: NYC Birthday Weekend!
text: I love this hotel. Located directly across from Bryant Park, it’s an easy walk to Madison Square Garden, Times’ Square and the theater district. Found great restaurants nearby for quick coffee and croissants as well as rooftops, and fine dining, including cocktails at the Célon Lounge in the lower level of the hotel. The rooms are comfortably chic, and the staff always incredibly friendly and accommodating. Thanks to Paul, Scott and John for making our stay easy and memorable!

title: Will definitely return to the Bryant Park Hotel!
