text: Lovely hotel and accommodations in a very convenient location. Room was spotless, quiet and comfortable. Very enjoyable stay and excellent service by the front desk staff, especially Josephine Kinsella.

title: Superb in every way
text: We came to the New York to see family and experience the City. We chose the Bryant Park based on its location and past reviews. What really sets this hotel apart is its staff who were always gracious and attentive to our needs: Ronin, Dominic, Zaaul, Shannon, John and Ray. I was especially grateful for Siobhan, the GM, who brought me yellow roses and tea when she heard I wasn’t feeling well, and Ana the head housekeeper who offered her tailoring expertise to hem my new pair of pants. Everything about The Bryant Park is exceptional!

title: Amazing New York Stay
text: From the moment we walked into the hotel on a rainy grey Friday morning we were greeted with a ray of sunshine and warmth from Josephine at the front desk. She made our welcome so relaxing and comforting, she told us a brief history of the hotel and showed a sneak preview of the beautiful lounge and lobby. The hotel itself is beautiful,clean,spacious, the rooms are big enough and the bed is so comfortable and location can't be any better. Coffee and muffins in the mornings  was a pleasant addition. Only wished we would be there to witness the Christmas village across the street at Bryant Park. That is why we will be  coming back in the future and staying at the Bryant Park Hotel!

title: Fabulous place to stay, definitely made our stay in the city. Really liked the coffee and muffins on offer.
text: Amazing hotel, & handy for subway. Times square is walkable. Staff are very friendly & helpful. Fantastic room with a view over Bryan Park. Lots of eating places nearby.  Will return. Thanks Room 1605

title: Friendly staff win the day
text: This is a lovely hotel with clean rooms, great location, and friendly staff.  The downstairs bar is a good vibe and Koi's had great service.  The front desk staff at this hotel were extremely helpful and friendly, especially Josephine, who helped me navigate some adjustments to my check out time and other questions.  I'd be back.

title: Best Experience Ever!
text:
We had the most AMAZING EXPERIENCE at this hotel! Before we set foot on the grounds Veronica was so helpful over the phone & assured us that we could check in early after our red-eye flight! Our room was ready & upgraded. 
We can’t say enough about the staffs’ hospitality throughout our stay! They knew us by name, gave amazing suggestions & even left sweet notes & treats in our room. We legit didn’t want to leave! Our housekeeper was also very kind & super responsive.  So to Veronica, Shannen, Dwight, Ronan, Julia, Rae & everyone else, thank you for such an amazing stay & unforgettable experience! If you want a beautiful boutique hotel experience, stay at the Bryant Park Hotel! We are back in CA & still talking about our experience!

title: Lovely hotel, perfect location & super friendly, helpful staff
text: Service is excellent! Front desk staff are extremely friendly and helpful - especially Josephine! The location of the hotel is excellent - so central and lovely to be so close to Bryant park too! It’s clean and rooms are large! Lovely molton brown toiletries too!

title: Exceptional Service
text: When I say I couldn't be happier with my 5 day stay at The Bryant hotel, I really mean that. From 2 days before check in, they called to confirm my arrival time. They asked if we were celebrating anything special. Once we checked in we had been upgraded.  The fabulous doorman, Dominic (know known as Dom, because we made friends) lugged all our luggage up to our room. He had a great personality and gave us many recommendations for breakfast, lunch and dinners for the next 5 days. He also let us know his off days so in case we had questions he was available.  We then got a coupon from John C, at the front desk for a great bite to eat in the area. We then became familiar with all the staff and they'd call us by name. Veronica,  Shannen, Dominic,  John C, To ( I think that was her name) and Ray ( our go to direction guy) made us feel like family.  Ray and Dom were the key to our successful trip. The handwritten directions for the subway and recommendations for dinners and what order to do things saved us time and we were able to see EVERYTHING.  Those gentlemen deserve and round of applause.  I will only stay at the Bryant Park goring forward.

title: The Best of the Best!
text:
The front desk staff could not have been more kind or accommodating during our very short stay. Each staff person was personable and ready to help with any question we had. Having a space for weary travelers to rest until our room was ready made things even better. 
We look forward to staying again.

title: Another great stay at the Bryant Park Hotel
text: I had another wonderful stay at the Bryant Park Hotel.  The location is very convenient.  The room and the other hotel amenities are top-notch. My room (I had selected a standard room) had a large balcony/patio overlooking Bryant Park.  Josephine Kinsella and Ronan at the reception were absolutely terrific.

title: 60th Birthday Celebration - So good I'll be Back!
text: I stayed over the weekend to celebrate my 60th birthday with family and friends.  The staff could not be friendlier!  They were accommodating and helpful with tips on places to visit etc..  The room had a bottle of champagne, with a birthday card signed by the staff.  So welcoming!  We had dinner at Koi that Friday evening and it was all that the reviews said it would be.  They held onto my luggage before and after I checked out so I could continue to enjoy the city.   Shout out to Domenic and the front desk crew!

title: Bryant Park Hotel Rocks
text: I travel a lot globally for work and I have to say the Bryant Park Hotel is my favorite for both work and personal travel.  The facilities are excellent and the staff is really amazing - Jo,  Veronica and Shannon are friendly, professional and really make you feel special as a guest.   Great food at Koi, great gym, great location  and great team.  Thanks Jo !!

title: Happy Stay at the Bryant Park Hotel
text: Two friends and I were there to celebrate our 70th birthdays and our stay could not have been better!  Josephine, Dominic and Ronan are the best! They were SO friendly and made us feel like we were family! There was a bottle of champaign and balloons awaiting us, and an electric tea kettle was delivered immediately after asking.  Josephine welcomed us and immediately knew we were the birthday girls.  She was like a friend whom we'd know all our lives.  Dominic was so helpful in storing our luggage and suggesting a few good restaurants and calling for cabs when we left.  Ronan was very accomodating with everything we requested.  And the room was wonderful - clean, spacious comfortable beds.  We plan to return on our next visit to NYC.  We would not think consider staying elsewhere!  Thank you to ALL the staff for your friendliness and warmth!

title: Front Desk staff is unmatched.
text: Veronica, Jo and Shannon were amazing. My husband and I spent the night after our wedding here for our “mini-moon” and these ladies treated us like royalty from the moment we walked in the door until we checked out. They took a genuine interest in our love story and provided all we needed to make our quick stay a trip we will never forget. We already cannot wait to come back for anniversary.

title: Perfect spot for our family
text:
The hotel was clean, comfortable and lovely. The view from the tall windows in our room overlooked Bryant park.

The staff was phenomenal. We were traveling for our 7 year olds birthday and he was so surprised when we checked in to find that they’d put a birthday arrival gift together for him. They really went above and beyond at every opportunity and truly made our trip so special. 

They provide an in room sound machine to help drown out any NYC noise and we slept so well! The muffins in the lobby were an enormous hit. 

My only regret is not having time in our schedule to try Koi while we were visiting. I suppose we’ll just have to come back again!

title: Fantastic stay thanks to a wonderful staff!
text: I visited NYC with my two high school friends to celebrate our 70th birthdays. The Bryant Park Hotel is in a great location. Easy walk to theaters and restaurants.  The front desk staff was incredible. Jo, especially, really made us feel so very welcome and went above and beyond to make our stay truly special. Veronica and Michelle were also amazing. Thank you to our Bellman, Dominic, for his help in advising us about restaurants nearby and asking about our adventures when we returned to the hotel at the end of the day. The bartender at the bar downstairs, Angel, was fantastic as well. I highly recommend this hotel. I will definitely be back. Thanks again for a wonderful stay!

title: Wonderful hotel!
text: I've had the pleasure of staying at the Bryant Park Hotel three times now all for business, as well as utilizing their events space. Each time, the staff there have gone above and beyond to ensure our group has an incredible stay. They are accommodating with all of our needs for set up and tear down, and throughout our events. Of course it is also worth noting how gorgeous the event space is, and how comfortable the rooms are. Rooms in New York are often very cramped, but the rooms at the BPH are quite comfortable! Huge shoutouts to Alex and Matt from the events/group housing departments. They are the best!

title: Outstanding!  A perfect 10!
text: Best hotel I have ever stayed in! The staff was beyond amazing!  Everyone was so friendly,  professional, personable, and accommodating.  A special shout out to Jo Kinsella of the Front Desk Staff who went above and beyond to make our experience the best!  Her smile, fabulous attitude, friendliness , professionalism, sense of humor and genuine caring make her stand out!  Three of us silly girls were celebrating our 70th birthdays and were greeted by her upon arrival.  She proceeded to go out of her way to make our stay so memorable!  Thank you!    In addition, the location of the hotel is great!  It’s in the center of everything, yet away from the hustle and bustle.  One more shout out to Dominic the Bellman for his knowledge, friendliness, and professionalism.  The Bryant Park Hotel is the only place I will stay from now on when visiting NYC.   It’s outstanding …It’s a perfect 10!

title: Great Stay
text: I had a great stay the the hotel.   The place was clean and well maintained and the location is wonderful.   I want to especially call out Jo and the front desk staff for going above and beyond for me and my group.

title: Excellent experience!
text: In ny for a wedding, stayed only one night at the Bryant Park Hotel but wanted to move in!  Lovely room with great amenities, perfect location and the staff was over and above nice and accomodating.  Great experience, highly recommend and worth the price

title: Perfect!
text: Everything about our 5 nite stay at BPH was just right. The location, the view, the wonderfully engaging desk staff, especially Jo, Veronica and Shannen, all added up to make this our best stay ever in NYC. Details, such as clothes and towel racks right where needed…and the towels and extra pillows,  Deluxe!!!  The location could not be better. Right in it all, but comfortably removed. And so many bakeries (and so little time) nearby! Thoroughly enjoyable.

title: Making a Wedding Weekend even more perfect!
text: We had a family wedding nearby and the 2 families + some friends stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for several days. What a fabulous property (very comfortable rooms) with a highly responsive and attentive staff. We could not have asked for a more perfect stay. Shout out to: Matt Pathak, John Castillo, Veronica Calero, Shannen Santos, Josephine Kinsella, Rey Alamo and Julio Moreira. Thank you for making this wedding weekend as perfect as we hoped it would be.

title: amazing hotel in the hart of the big apple
text: Bryant park hotel is just amazing! Is a wonderfull hotel with the best service you can find in town! John and Veronica at the front desk are fantastic! they will welcome you so wormly that you will feel like home...actually better then home! they are very profesional, helpfull, gentle and always avalaible! A wonder team! Koi restaurant is the best japanees restaurant of NY.....dont miss it!!!

title: New fave
text:
This has become my favorite NYC hotel. Definite European feel with surprisingly spacious rooms. Staff is superb - can’t say enough about them. Ceylon bar is lovely - I recommend. 
Give it a try & get hooked like I did.

title: Great Customer Service
text: Excellent customer service from John @ the front desk. I attended a private in June of 20232 and left my suite jacket there. For a long list of bad excuses, I didn't get return to the hotel until last week. Despite my ridiculous story, John checked Lost & Found and my blazer was still there. Thank you John.

title: Weekend Getaway
text: Room was spacious, clean and located walking distance to Broadway show we went to. Really liked that they use 100% cotton sheets, (wife allergic to polyester), that the shower had both rain shower and handheld shower heads, and the room had a white noise machine to cancel out street noise which is unavoidable in NYC.

title: The True Magic of NYC
text:
From the moment we were greeted at the door to the incredible friendliness and professionalism of the staff, our stay at BPH was purely magical. We had a corner suite overlooking Bryant Park and highly recommend the view. Rooms were spacious, clean and the bathroom was massive. BPH is breathtaking in itself and is the most appealing art deco building not only in NYC, but in all of America.

Highly recommend and we will definitely return! Thanks to all the BPH staff for making our trip magical.

title: Wonderful stay!
text: Everyone was wonderful from beginning to ending of our stay. So friendly and helpful. Our room was clean, comfortable and a well stocked fridge. Bryant Park across the street was lovely. Thank you Jo and staff!! Until next time !!

title: Excellent hotel and great staff!
text: My team and I just stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for our summit. The staff at Bryant Park Hotel were very accommodating and made our stay very pleasant and easy. Jo and Matt in particular were very helpful, and checked in with me to ensure we were taken care of. I can't thank them both enough!

title: A lovely weekend in the park
text: The hotel is friendly and comfortable. It’s location, across from Bryant Park left us feeling that we had spent the weekend actually in the park, with it’s lovely gardens and all the activity and energy of New York. Dwight, Scott and John, at the front desk felt like friends. They genuinely cared about us as they cared for us, going out of their way to make us feel commonwealth and welcome

title: Best hotel in grand central 5 Starsss
text: First time traveling alone I was super nervous. I was greeted at the door by Ronan very welcoming he assisted me with my luggage and kindly walk me to the front desk. Jo, Julio , shannon and Veronica were Friendly super exceptional!!! I love how lit this hotel it has a bar downstairs gives a nice speakeasy vibe . The rooms are super nice they also come with housekeeping soft comfortable beds very very clean bathrooms.  I loved the concierge team John and Dwight they know the city so well so many recommendations I ended up going to Stk which had a live DJ will definitely come back to New York City and stay at this hotel super convenient location wise across the street from Bryant Park. There also a Whole Foods walking distance, I loved the whole 5star NYC experience !!!

title: The reason why I would definitely stay at The Bryant Park Hotel .
text:
This is the hotel I've stayed at whenever I've been in New York since college, and I've always had great memories and fond memories of it. 

I also stayed at this hotel on two business trips to New York in June and October 23.

The hotel has a bit of a classic vibe compared to newer hotels these days, but that's one of the most important things that keeps me coming back. In particular, the Bryant park view from the room is awesome and the combination of buildings and trees outside the window is one of the best views in manhattan. 

Also, the niceness and friendliness of the hotel's staff is something I've never experienced at any other hotel. Veronica, Shannen, and Jo know what I need before I even ask, and their attitude and service is better than many 5 star hotels I've stayed in. 

If this place had a resedential contract, I would be more than willing to sign with them instead of looking for another 1 bedroom apartment. 

I will be traveling for business at least twice a year and will always stay here.

title: Fantastic hotel and better staff
text: Bryant Park Hotel has comfortable and clean rooms, beautiful views, and a fantastic location. Check-in / Check-out is always easy, and there are great restaurants onsite. However, what truly sets Bryant Park Hotel apart is the staff. Jo, Shannen, Rey, and Veronica (and the rest of the staff) go above and beyond to make their guests feel welcome and comfortable. I can’t recommend this hotel enough.

title: Highly recommend
text: The room, staff, and amenities were wonderful! Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a great location in the heart of Manhattan. Jo at the front desk was amazing! I left a pair of airpods in the room and she found them and delivered them to me!

title: I Love the BPH!
text:
The Hotel staff are amazing, especially the lovely Jo at the front desk!

Our suite was fantastic (loved the shower!)

The BPH is the best stay in NYC!

The amenities are wonderful and the BPH location allowed us to have about 15,000 steps each d

title: Wonderful anniversary stay!
text: Wonderful anniversary stay! The hotel is in a perfect location and the staff were so accommodating - especially Josephine Kinsella. When we booked it, we did mention it was our 36th anniversary, but as we checked in, she upgraded us to a spacious room with a balcony and had a lovely bottle of champagne waiting for us. Truly made it a special weekend for us :)

title: Excellent place, exceptional staff!
text: I rarely write reviews, but Bryant Park Hotel deserves one. It is truly exceptional - and not only because of location, cleanliness, and overall excellence, but - first and foremost - because of its staff. I was part of a group travelling for business, and we had quite a few last-minute or "strange" asks (like a make-up chair or permission to film an interview in the bar, deliveries, etc...) - and the eagerness and efficiency with which staff responded was remarkable. With additional special thanks to Josephine Kinsella, who made my stay particularly wonderful!

title: Very spacious and comfortable room, very thoughtful and kind staffs
text: The jr king is very spacious, has lots of thoughtful details and comfortable bed. The bathroom is very very spacious and the bath towels are big and soft. The hotel staffs answered my questions pre-trip through emails very promptly and were all very helpful. All the staffs we interacted were friendly and helpful. They even surprised us with a bottle of champaign  and a very cute birthday card for my husband’s birthday. We mentioned to front desk that our room is rather cold even after we set the thermo to warmest, they immediately brought a space heater which resolved the problem. During the stay, the Bryant Park is renovating for skating rink, so definitely use the ear plugs hotel provides. Convenient location as the subway 7 is on the same block. There are so many pastries / coffee / brunch shops nearby. This is our first time at Bryant Park Hotel, we will definitely return!

title: The perfect spot to celebrate our anniversary. Views of the park. Walking distance to everything. And the staff, perfect
text:
The hotel was stunning. The staff was amazing! Dominic was so wonderful to us. Made sure we had wine and chocolates for our wedding anniversary. Views of the park and walking distance to everything. 
We will be back!

title: Excellent stay
text: My first time at Bryant Park Hotel.  Service and spacious room were both excellent.  Special thanks to Jo at reception - she was very hospitable and helpful.  Look forward to returning to Bryant Park Hotel on my next stay inNew York.

title: Spring time
text:
The Bryant Park  Hotel New York is the perfect location. 
The staff at The Bryant are welcoming & friendly, no request is too much trouble. I would recommend this hotel for future visits to New York. Thanks team Bryant we had a lovely time with you all. Thanks John , Jo and Shannon no request is too much effort, this can be said for all of the team at The Bryant , Scott,Zaaul,
Julio,Dwight,Shandel, Ronan, Rey and Dominic. You make a holiday special. You are amazing. 
Peter&Bernie Australia

title: Once was enough
text:
The hotel was just meh.  In general it was really scruffy looking, with scuffed walls and woodwork and peeling wallpaper.  The rooms don’t have coffee makers in them - instead you have to go to the lobby to get it from a communal pot which was never out early enough for me.  I hate it when hotels do this – it just screams”We’re going on the cheap.”  The gym was well equipped but tiny - two people in it was too much.  Although the hotel has a restaurant, there’s no room service.  For $600 a night there are definitely better places.

On the plus side, the room was cleaner and larger than most NYC rooms and the location was great.

title: Amazing family vacation
text:
Amazing! From the moment we arrived until check out. We were celebrating our sons 10th birthday, his first trip to NYC and celebrating life being cancer free for the first year. Jo and Veronica checked us in - they were so sweet and friendly. They showed a true interest in talking with our son and making sure he felt included. The room was amazing with beautiful views of the park. They made sure to always check to ensure we had what we needed. Larry was super fast with any amenities to the room we needed and also so friendly. The door man sorry can’t remember your name was also so helpful with our luggage and the door and whatever again we needed. The restaurant Koi was delish and the sushi was on point. The complimentary coffee, muffins and lemon water were a nice touch every morning. 
The location was ideal. I can’t recommend this place enough for a family! I can’t wait to return for our next family trip. We are definitely coming back. Thank you to the Bryant park hotel for making this trip magical and so memorable.

title: New Favourite Hotel!
text:
From the minute we arrived and Ronan the lovely doorman took our luggage from the taxi  we felt at home.  On reception we were greeted by Jo who was so friendly and helpful. We had a corner room which gave great views over Bryant Park and beyond.  It was immaculately clean and spacious.  
Each day we returned to the hotel the staff were friendly, chatty and interested in what we had done that day.  All the staff that we came into contact with were friendly and helpful.
The hotel is in a great position, near 2 subways, breakfast places, and Time Square. 
I am in the process of booking a hotel for a trip elsewhere and am  concerned that nowhere will live up to The Bryant Park Hotel!

title: Above and beyond
text: John at the front desk was incredibly helpful and courteous. He suggested a place for us to have lunch that turned out to be great. We were only in the city for one day and I had one pair of pants with me that got soaked along with my shoes in the rain. I met Larry (houseman)  in the front lobby who noticed I was soaked. He offered to dry my pants and my shoes so I wouldn’t be soaked at the show we were going to.  I find people who are willing to go out of their way to help someone is becoming more rare. This hotel seems to have a surplus. Great service, above and beyond! Thank you Larry

title: Wonderful experience during Climate Week
text: I had a wonderful stay, we both hosted events here and I stayed as a guest. Service was wonderful, Jo was especially helpful on multiple occasions. I appreciated the convenience and comfort, overall, and specifically the easy and simple to use white noise machine at night. Would definitely stay again.

title: Jo is the best!
text: Our team has been going to The Bryant Park Hotel for the last couple of stays for our meetup. Every time we attend, we are greeted and wished well by Jo at the front desk. She is so kind and incredibly easy to connect with! Thank you so much for being amazing hotel to stay at!

title: Wonderful stay in Bryant Park Hotel
text:
Wonderful stay at the Bryant Park Hotel 
Central location 
Wonderful views over the park 
The hotel staff, particularly Jo on the front desk were extremely professional, helpful and friendly 
I would definitely recommend staying here if you’re visiting Manhattan

title: Fantastic hospitality!
text: From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was welcomed by the doorman and greeted at the front desk by Jo Kinsella. She was delightful and warm to me and all the guests that came to the front desk. She upgraded me to a suite which was lovely, and the meeting facilities as well as gym were top notch. I highly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel.

title: Wouldn’t stay again
text: I like being near Bryant Park but would not stay here again.  It is not worth $1000 a night.  It is run down, doesn’t have a lobby to sit in and we had strange problems with the lighting in our room.  There was a night light that wouldn’t stop flashing on and off and we weren’t able to turn off one of the bed side lights.  In addition there is construction on the street adjacent to the hotel and they started working at 5 am making it impossible to sleep.  So I would certainly not advise staying here anytime soon.  Lastly we asked for a one hour late check out and they would not accommodate us.

title: Best hotel experience in New York
text: This was truly the most exceptional hotel experience my partner and I have ever had! From the moment we walked through the hotel's doors to the time we left, every moment was filled with joy and exceptional customer service! Larry, one of the workers, truly deserves the highest bonus. He's incredibly cool and funny, and he made our time even more enjoyable!

title: Pleasant, Professional, Accommodating, and a great location!
text: I took a business trip to New York City and stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for a few nights. My stay was positive and very pleasant. ALL staff were very professional. I want to personally thank Steven Watt, Scott Cohen, and Jo Kinsella for making the booking and hospitality experience very easy and accommodating. My room was spacious, with a fantastic view of the park and plenty of sunlight. The location was very convenient and central to everything I wanted to do in this part of the city. I wholeheartedly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel to anyone staying in this area. I will definitely be returning next time I'm around Bryant Park!

title: Great location, Hotelk needs a refresh
text: The Bryant Park Hotel has amazing potential.  The location is perfect for any NYC activities and the staff are very nice.  Note:  the park can be loud at night, but it is NYC after all. We had a lovely Bryant Park Suite that is large for NYC hotels.  The only drawbacks are the entire hotel is dated and tired.   The lobby area needs a complete redo to make actual sitting areas rather than very large check in desks and 2 narrow benches for guests to sit on.  The lobby can feel tight and chaotic with more than four people there.  And while the rooms have lovely views of the park, the room decor was a bit tired—paint cracks, stained drapery, rings on coffee table that looked like Ikea.  Not what you expect for over $600/night.  Overall good experience, but when you pay top prices, you have expectations and  It  feels like the whole hotel needs a make over to make it 5 stars

title: Wonderful location but noisy room
text:
Superb location on the edge of Bryant Park and you could never tire of those views day or night! Super friendly staff made it a very pleasant place to stay. 

The only downside was the noise. I’m not counting the noise of the city here, that’s to be expected in midtown Manhattan, sirens, cars, people. What was disappointing was the loud extractor fans located somewhere near the room that couldn’t be turned off, providing a constant deep rumble day and night. Add into that a high pitched rattle from the air con (even when switched off!) and even with ear plugs I couldn’t get much rest. 

Rooms large and clean, great bathroom with tub and separate shower, couldn’t fault much else! Just couldn’t stay again as sleep quality is kind of the most important thing for a hotel, I came back from the trip exhausted.

title: Outstanding Hotel and Staff
text:
Last weekend my daughter and I had the pleasure of staying at the Bryant Park Hotel. Upon arrival the historic building was quite impressive, with its black and gold Gothic design. Our friendly bellman, Rey escorted us to our spacious deluxe room, with a nice modern bath and later a tour of the hotel. The staff was beyond accommodating! Shannon, Scott, Jo and Rey personally ensured our stay was exceptional. 
I highly recommend this hotel.  The location is great, the rooms are nice and the extra ordinary customer service makes it memorable.

title: Great stay!
text: Great stay at The Bryant Park Hotel. Spacious rooms and very helpful staff, particularly Jo Kinsella. She was a real gem and super attentive and kind. Koi restaurant was also very delicious. Nice size gym  as well.

title: Great vibe and service in middle of Manhattan
text:
Had a 2 night business trip , the location was excellent for my meetings.

On arrival I was immediately welcomed by Dwight who kindly upgraded me .

I met with Ronan( concierge , doorman, bagman , story teller , rugby player , aspiring actor 😀)  who brought his Irish charm and humour to NY ,he couldn’t be more helpful . 

I dined in Koi restaurant Inside hotel , superb japanese food .

When checking out I met the lovely Jo , full of charm and fun , had me giggling to my airport taxi .

I don’t think I will stay anywhere else in NY .

title: Wedding Weekend Extravaganza
text:
I stayed at the beautiful Bryant Park Hotel just recently as my wedding was across the street.  The entire experience was extremely positive, from touring the facilities and rooms, setting up a room block for our guests and the actual wedding weekend itself.  I'm sure many reviews rave about the views and location, which are terrific, but to me, the real winner is the staff.  From start to finish and this entire 6 month process of planning a wedding, I felt I was in good hands with people who understood planning a wedding can be a bit stressful and they sought to help on matters far beyond my stay at the hotel.  
I had a few surprises I'd planned for my wedding weekend and the hotel staff helped me every step of the way while cheered me on the entire time.  Although there are quite a few hotels in the area, hands-down The BPH won with all of our guests (especially those from out of state).  From the warm reception and everyone's willingness to help, to all the little details they (especially Matt) took into account to make our stay so special, 5 stars feels like an understatement.

title: Il posto dove stare a New York
text:
Volevamo stare vicino a Time Square ma fuori dalla baraonda e Bryant Park è stato perfetto.
Storico Hotel rinnovato di recente (almeno la nostra camera). Lobby essenziale ma con coffee station aperta tutto il gg e muffin free a colazione (si possono prendere muffin e caffè e sedersi in uno degli innumerevoli tavolini anche questi free, del Bryant Park). Il parco è veramente bello e ben tenuto , con spettacoli e attrazzioni praticamente ogni gg, sorvegliato e non accessibile di notte.
Eravamo due adulti e due bambini e abbiamo soggiornato 5 notti  in una bellissima camera molto spaziosa e luminosa al 16esimo piano con due letti queen + zona divano e vista sul parco e sui grattacieli antistanti per circa 400 euro a notte (forse era un'offerta). Letti comodissimi ,bagno enorme, ciabatte, accappatoi, teli spugna per 4 persone, con sostituzione a richiesta.
Personale molto gentile , acqua minerale in bottiglia disponibile alla reception su richiesta.

title: Great Staff and wonderful location at Bryant Park Hotel
text: We stay at the Bryant Park Hotel every August.    The location is perfect for getting around Manhattan.    Plus, the staff is wonderful.    Shannon and Zoaul were top notch, very friendly and incredibly helpful!    I would highly recommend Bryant Park Hotel!   We always have a great time!    Bryant Park is my husband's favorite park in the whole city.

title: Bryant Park Hotel: friendly atmosphere and best staff ever
text:
I recently stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel. The warm reception I received from Josephine (Jo), Shannon and Siobhan upon my arrival was amazing. The hotel and facilities were top class. The room was clean and the views onto Bryant Park were scenic. Jo was so kind to provide me with directions to local tourist attractions including sharing local knowledge on the famous buildings around the hotel. This was a stay I will remember for a long time. I will definitely be back to New York and will be only staying at the Bryant Park Hotel.

I give it a 5 star review for all of the above reasons.

Thank you again to all the staff, especially Jo at the front desk.

title: Best hotel in NY!
text: I absolutely loved The Bryant Park Hotel!! Location is perfect, room was amazing, bed super comfy, and the staff…they are fantastic. Everyone I spoke to was so kind and helpful but I want to make special mention of the delightful Jo who checked me in and helped to make my experience there such a special one. I will absolutely be back!!

title: 10/10 Experience, would recommend
text: I had a lovely stay at the Bryant Park Hotel. The staff were accommodating and the room was very comfortable. They offered recommendations for local restaurants nearby and made my trip, while short, that much more enjoyable. Would absolutely recommend this hotel.

title: The people make the place!
text: The hotel was clean, comfortable, and modern. The reason for the 5 star review was the staff. They are always ready to help and have a smile on their face. I would highlight Jo at the front desk was AMAZING!

title: Amazing NYC experience!
text: I have stayed here a number of times and am always impressed by the location and look of this hotel. Bryant Park is lovely any time of year. I was immediately welcomed at check in by Jo at the front desk. She was absolutely fantastic! Welcoming and accommodating....the staff here truly sets the bar for incredible service. The rooms are always clean and spacious (especially for NYC where space can be an issue). My stay was wonderful and I highly recommend for a great central location that is close to everything! Thank you, Jo!

title: Exceeded our expectations!
text: My husband and I were absolutely thrilled with our  4 nights at the Bryant Park Hotel! From the time Scott checked us in to the morning we departed, we felt welcome and taken care of. We were fortunate to be upgraded to a room with a view of Bryant Park and a roomy window seat. We both celebrated our birthdays during the stay and were surprised with a bottle of wine and a birthday balloon that was delivered to us. The cocktail lounge was wonderful and housekeeping did an outstanding job. Kudos to the entire staff of this special hotel!

title: Prime location and friendly service
text:
Hotel is situated right across the street from Bryant Park —Great option for families as there’s a carousel, plenty of seating, eating options and huge lawn for the kiddos to burn off energy. 

Outstanding service from front desk and bellman. They saw we had small kids and a birthday and the staff brought up gifts for all of them.  Rooms were clean and views were amazing from our suite. Hope to get back here very soon.

title: Great welcome to NYC
text: Had a great stay at the Bryant Park Hotel. Spacious room, very clean, nice bed. Great service from the front desk. Thanks to Jo K, who was super welcoming - setting the tone for a fab visit and helping me with a late checkout so I could get to my meeting looking fresh!

title: Stop searching and book it already!
text: Fabulous historic hotel overlooking Bryant Park.  Upon arriving, I was immediately greeted by the loveliest hotel staff member, Jo. I immediately knew why all of the reviews of this property are so good, it's because it's a special hotel, in a magical location with staff truly committed to making your entire experience as good as possible.  I was upgraded to a room that featured three large windows looking out over the carousel in Bryant Park.  The room was clean, comfortable and even had a large soak tub.  Although my room faced 40th St., it was remarkably quiet.  This hotel is in the best location in Midtown Manhattan. Close to everything including 5th Ave. Saks, Times Square, Koreatown and so much more.  I highly recommend giving them a try.

title: First class hotel experience!
text:
Not much of a review guy but wanted to share our recent excellent experience at the Bryant Park Hotel and recommend it to anyone staying in New York.
Everything about our stay was first class. Some of the most attentive, friendly service we've received at a hotel. Shannen and Jo at the front desk and Anna in housekeeping were welcoming and accommodating with a customer first attitude. The whole staff was excellent.
The location in mid-town could not be more convenient, across the street from the lovely Bryant Park, with great restaurants close by. Our room was modern and very comfortable. Great value for a hotel in New York. 
Could not possibly stay anywhere else in New York after discovering this gem.

title: Excelent. Feeling at home
text:
One of the best New York hotels I have ever stayed in. 
 I was looking for space and found a very spacious room full of light and stunning views of Bryant Park. An ideal location to discover New York.
 Clean rooms with a minimalist atmosphere but offering everything you need.  The staff is friendly and helpful and willing to solve any problem you may have. I will definitely repeat. I already have a hotel for my visits to New York.

title: Exceptional service, wonderful rooms, great location
text:
Our first visit to this 'boutique' hotel will not be our last! The location let us walk to many iconic NY spots (Time Square, Rockerfeller Plaza), there's a subway stop at the corner, and we were right in front of beautiful Bryant Park with pretty spots to hang out, people watch, etc.

We stayed in a lovely room with 2 queen beds, a sitting area including a dining table and a beautiful, spacious bathroom, with an oversized soaking tub. There was plenty of room for us and our teen daughter! The hotel also has a nice workout room. 

But what made this the best experience was the staff and their exceptional service! Need extra ice in your room? They deliver it! Is the free coffee in the lobby running low? They'll deliver a fresh cup to your room! 

Before heading to the airport, we did some more site seeing after we checked out. When we returned to the hotel to grab our luggage, the bellman asked us if we'd like access to the bathroom in their club area so we could freshen up and change clothes if needed. So very thoughtful! Cannot wait to visit NYC and The Bryant Park Hotel again!

title: My new Hotel of Choice
text: I have stayed in NYC several times, all the rooms have been tiny rooms that were almost claustrophobic. This room was spacious, the Bathroom was wonderful, Beautiful windows that let in lots of light  and a comfortable bed. I enjoyed the flavored water at the elevators and the muffins in the morning to grab and eat on my walk to my office.  Everyone was incredibly helpful and nice. When I come back this will be my hotel of choice.

title: Best customer service at a hotel ever!
text:
This is one of the best hotel experiences I have ever had - maybe even the very best! The customer service at the Bryant Park Hotel is outstanding, and we really felt like every member of the staff was happy to help us or even just see us and say hi. There was a personal touch to everything, and we felt SO cared for. John, Roy, and especially Scott really made our experience over-the-top good. 

The location was fantastic for us since we were in town to see someone working in Times Square - we were close enough to walk over at any time but it was far enough out of the craziness to be comfortable. Having Bryant Park at our feet was also REALLY wonderful, because any time we had a spare hour or two and we didn't want to be cooped in a hotel room, we could just take an elevator down and be in a beautiful park with lots of seating and wonderful people watching, plus tons of activities in the summer like free concerts!

One of our party had a birthday on our first day, and we were brought a birthday balloon and wine, which was unexpected and wonderful! 
There was a maintenance issue in our room, and after fixing it, we were left with a note and a little chocolate hammer for the inconvenience. Seriously, this made us so happy, and it is a pretty small thing that the hotel can do to really show how much it cares about our experience.

title: Great place to stay
text: My Dad and I visited the Bryant park hotel for the final five days of our vacation. The Hotel's location was ideal as it placed us in midtown Manhattan, with subway stations on the same block. Staff very courteous and rooms are luxurious.

title: Boutique Hotel Gem
text: What a pleasant experience, the hotel staff, Jo at check-in and the doormen were amazing!  Koi is a treasure and being right by the park is wonderful. It felt safe and the bed was so comfortable. Rooms need a little TLC which I believe is in the works, definitely a boutique hotel gem! Great location, central to everything.

title: Warm and lovely NYC Hotel
text: Bryant Park Hotel is the ideal location for any kind of trip to NYC.  Being next to Bryant Park and the iconic NYC public library leaves you feeling like you are in a beautiful city neighborhood and away from the bustle and chaos of Times Square.  The hotel itself is lovely and accommodating, and the room is well appointed and comfortable.  Most important to me was the personal and warm reception and stay provided by the hotel's  superb staff.  Bryant Park Hotel is my #1 place to stay in NYC!

title: My New Go To Hotel in New York City
text:
Picked this hotel because it was highly rated on Trip Advisor. Well, it exceeded every great review I read. Let's start with the most important thing any establishment must have when one is traveling-the staff. Everyone I came in contact with starting with check in went out of their way to make my stay the best possible. John, Dwight, Veronica, Rey, Ronan-and the GM Siobhan-made me feel at home at all times. They all knew my name by the first night.
The hotel opened in 2000 and is in a historic 21 story skyscraper built in the 20's. The renovations done to convert it to a hotel are amazing. My room was much larger than what one expects in New York. It was spotless, well appointed and had everything I needed during my 7 night stay. The bathroom was stunning with beautiful marble surrounds and floor. It had a huge soaking tub with a separate glass and marble stall shower with a rain shower head and a second extendable shower head. Fresh towels were provided every day if desired and the bedding was also changed by request. I did it every other night as the hotel stresses being "green". Very comfortable high thread count sheets.
The GM, Siobhan, personally took me on a tour of some updates they're going to do to the rooms over the next yearor so. Wow. Making a good thing even better. The hotel is spotlessly clean. There are 2 restaurants and a bar on the first floor. I can't stress enough how clean this entire hotel was. Housekeeping and the custodial staff are sticklers for cleaning and disinfecting.
Now about location. Bryant Park is literally across the street. It's a beatiful place with lots of fun activities during the day and at night. Kind of a mini Central Park. The area is perfect for taking walks around the City. I probably walked 10 miles a day. Great restaurants and shops are close by. Close to the Empire State Building, Macy's Herald Square, Rockefeller Center...I could go on. Just a perfect location for everything New York has to offer. Subway station on the same block connects to all the major lines.
But this is a review of the hotel and I will finish by saying that every time I visit New York, I will stay at The Bryant Park Hotel.

title: Will stay here again!!
text: Room with a view overlooking Bryant Park was wonderful. The bed and pillows very comfortable.  The robe was my one favorite part of the hotel extras. The staff members were so welcoming and helpful with every interaction!!

title: A hidden midtown gem
text: This is the second time I have stayed at this little gem in one year. If you are looking for a clean, centrally located hotel, this is it. The staff that I met-  Scott, John and Rey- were welcoming and helpful.  Centrally located to attractions and transportation.  What more could you ask for?

title: Simply the best!
text:
Love love love this place! Johnny the manager is always on his A-game. The location, hospitality, and amenities are always impressive for this global traveler!
I stay here every time I visit New York and it never fails to wow me.

title: Our home in NYC
text: We love everything about this hotel. From the minute we called reservations to the moment we checked out we received prompt, kind, and excellent service. Location is wonderful. Would definitely recommend this hotel in NYC.

title: Amazing place and stay!
text:
Our 3 day stay at the hotel was outstanding - beautiful rooms, view and service was excellent. All staff including Scott, Rey, John and Z were incredibly friendly and helpful. The general manager Siobhan treated us wonderfully well. 
Their recommendations for food, travel and sights were great, and being across from the beautiful Bryant Park was awesome.  
Can’t thank them enough and would highly recommend this place for location, comfort, cleanliness, services, and staff. 
We will stay here again. 
Mike

title: A great weekend getaway
text:
My husband and I celebrated our 20th anniversary  at Bryant Park Hotel, and the staff made it such a GREAT experience!  Veronica greeted me with “happy Anniversary!’, and promptly looked to see what would be the best room available for us at the time. 
Over the next few minutes she and her colleagues, Larry and Shannen, put our stay together for us.  
First of all,  I asked for a suite  with a view, and they totally delivered!  Our suite was on a high floor with spectacular views of Bryant Park.  After giving us time to get settled in, we were then surprised with a bottle of Prosecco, chocolates, and a handwritten card from the team!
….I mean, that was SO special!
Over the next 24 hrs the staff were incredibly attentive and engaging, and always recognized us by name.  
As far as the building, it’s a classic NY experience in a GREAT location.  It’s a  bit dated, but clearly getting a sprucing up as I write this.  The room was clean, the shower water pressure strong,  and the bed very comfortable.  By NY standards, this hotel is a good deal.  
Most of all,  I really enjoyed the staff that treated us like family.  It makes me look forward to returning again.

title: A wonderful hotel experience with an unsurpassed staff!
text:
My wife and I have stayed at numerous hotels in NYC and nothing has compared to The Bryant Park Hotel. The friendliness and helpfulness of the staff is exceptional. The associates at the front desk are particularly noteworthy for their service and courtesy. All were very helpful, but to single one out, Stephen was exceptional (with an additional shout out to Scott).
The hotel itself was extremely clean and the location is great! As you exit the hotel each day you are greeted by Bryant Park directly across the street.
We will most definitely be staying here again.

title: Love Bryant Park
text: Great front desk staff. Friendly and helpful. Room is nice, view was a brick building. We had a cleaning issue (splatters on the wall) when we first arrived but it was handled quickly. Can’t beat the location. Right on the park and walkable to Broadway.

title: Best Hotel to Stay
text:
The staff is so helpful and friendly. The Hotel is a perfect location to everything.  Rooms are clean.  I would recommend the Bryant Park Hotel  great place to stay. When we arrived our room was ready early and the gentleman at the frontdesk and door were so welcoming. thank you.
Susan G

title: 5-Day Work Trip! 5-Star Stay!
text: Absolutely the 5+ stars best! Scott, Ronan, and Dwight went out of their way to make our stay the best. So attentive. Friendly. So hospitable and welcoming. Thank you for taking such great care of my daughter and I during our visit. A super team!!! A lovely stay!

title: Anniversary Trip
text: Scott Cohen and his group were great to deal with hotel.  Ray as well was awesome! We were on our anniversary and they took care of us.  Great location around the park plus not far from Herold Square shopping.  Will go back for sure for location but mainly for the customer service.

title: Number one hotel in New York City
text:
We visited NYC for a period of 3 days 2 nights. Initially we were hesitating between several hotels because there are many in the city. 
Then we saw The Bryant Park Hotel, we fell in love! Location, rooms, accommodations .

Arrived at the hotel around 9:30am, we had the room at 10:30am! Normally, check in is at 3:00pm.. it's extraordinary ! 
During the hour of waiting, they kindly offered us to put our luggage in a safe room at the hotel while we visited the surroundings. In addition, we had a superior room to the one we had requested at no additional cost!

There is always ice water with lemon at the entrance of the hotel for guests and from 7:00am to 10:00am a variety of muffins/coffee. 

The rooms are clean and spacious. The beds are comfortable. Located in front of the Bryant Park, you can only have a beautiful view from your hotel room and you can have a coffee and lunch in the park on the other side of the street ! It's awesome!

The staff members are very courteous and smiling. We feel treated like royalty!

For our next stay, it is guaranteed that we will go to this hotel!

Thank you Julio, John, Rey and their team! 

This hotel deserves 5 stars *****

title: Best hotel in NYC!!
text:
I was in town as photographer for Metallica on their M72 World Tour! The upgrade to a suite on arrival was a wonderful surprise and the room was one I never wanted to leave. Bryant Park with your morning coffee is one of life’s untold pleasures. The hotel helped me with taxis to MetLife when I needed them and generally couldn’t do enough for me. All the staff knew my name (without me even meeting them beforehand) which is a nice touch! 

The location is perfect. Blink gym is 2 minutes away which is great for people who are serious about working out… and whole foods market is right across the street for people who are serious about the  food they eat!

This will be my go to hotel next time I’m in NYC!!

Lee Jeffries

title: Great experience
text: We had a great stay for 5 nights during July 2023. John the Manager got us a room at short notice. The room had beautiful views and was really clean. The staff were universally friendly and helpful. One issue with hot water was swiftly dealt with. Excellent location with easy walking or subway distance from everything in Manhattan.

title: Excellent Stay at the Bryant Park Hotel
text: My husband and I had a wonderful experience at the Bryant Park Hotel. This was our second trip to NYC but first time here. We highly recommend it! First of all, the location is great. We loved going down stairs and grabbing coffee  at Blue Bottle and pastries at  Ole & Steen and enjoying them while people watching at Bryant Park. More than the location, the service you get at Bryant Park Hotel is fantastic. Jo and John at the front desk were friendly,  super helpful (including answering all of our questions about transit), and always managed to be around to hold the door open for us. We enjoyed the lobby amenities such as coffee, ice water, and cupcakes to celebrate the 4th of July. Our room was always clean, and housekeeping was helpful and courteous when I requested more towels. Our room was bright, airy, and had a great view of the park. The bathrooms were a good size, water pressure was great, and I definitely took advantage of the huge tub to soak in after walking a great many miles each day. We also had fun rummaging through the fridge for snacks each night. Overall, it was a pleasant way to spend our weekend together, and I highly recommend you stay here!

title: Amazing Views, Great Hotel
text: Checked in late after 10pm for a 1 night stay. Checkin was smooth and the staff are very friendly.  The room was on the 15th floor in the corner facing Bryant Park. WOW! Huge windows with great views. The room was clean and larger than I expected in mid-town. I loved the huge bathroom , separate deep tub and standing shower with rain shower head and hand-held option can be run simultaneously! Free lemon infused ice water 24/7 and freshly brewed coffee and muffins in the morning until 10am in the lobby! Had a wonderful stay! 🌟

title: Great hotel in terms of value, location, service
text: We recently stayed at the Bryant Park hotel to celebrate my brothers wedding. The wedding venue was the Bryant Park Grill and the location could not have been easier. The service was amazing lead by Josephine "Jo" and they were very accommodating for our large group. The rooms were spacious and I would recommend upgrading to a room with a view of the park. The hotel also had a great underground, Moroccan themed bar called Celon.

title: Fabulous !
text:
We found the staff there to be all very helpful, friendly and efficient. 
Great spacious clean room with fantastic views of the park and city. 
Staff went out of their way to recommend places to eat and drink and any queries we had they answered efficiently. Ronan, Sue, John and Zaahl were all super nice. Would definitely stay there again !

title: Treated Royally
text: I travelled with my 10 yr old granddaughter, her first trip to NY.  The staff welcomed her graciously, making her feel very special.  A gift for her was found in the room. We were upgraded to a jr. Suite with a city view. Shout out to Jo, Rey, John, Shannon  and Scott. I cannot say enough about this most accomodating staff. I would definitely return!!

title: Needs a remodel.  But nice basic hotel and friendly staff
text: I’m honestly surprised the reviews for this hotel are so good.  It’s a great location and the staff is very friendly, but otherwise it’s very basic hotel that needs an upgrade.  Hallways are a bit dank and shabby.  The rooms are a nice size (two queen beds and a sofa) but there were literally no decorations in the room other than a flower.  All white walls and ceiling.  Beds are comfortable but relatively thin.  Basic room, basic hotel.  They mentioned they are starting a  remodel…so maybe that’s why it is how it.

title: Lovely hotel!
text:
The service here is very good!  My stay started with a bit of a glitch - I arrived before my room was ready so the gentleman I spoke with at the front desk was to call me when it was ready.  Unfortunately, he never followed through. 
However, once I was in my room, the customer service was impeccable!  There are no ice machines so if you want ice, you need to ask the front desk to send some to your room.  I was lucky to have Larry deliver my ice multiple times.  He is attentive and personable without being intrusive.  He is a real asset to the hotel!!!
The room is clean and well-organized.  
My only complaint would be that I can hear every door slam on my floor... the soundproofing through the door is sorely lacking.  I can't hear my neighbors through the walls but if they are talking in the hall, I can hear every word.
The windows also leak sound from Bryant Park across the street but hey, this is NYC!!!
If they continue to hire people like Larry, I will be coming back!

title: Beautiful hotel
text: Zaaul and staff were very welcoming from the moment we arrived ! The hotel was a perfect location to everything. The view of Bryant park was beautiful from our room. This was a perfect place to spend our anniversary

title: My best NY stay ever
text:
From the first moment I walked in, I was welcomed by staff with Ronan first remarking I looked thirsty (I was, it was hot and I'd walked several blocks) and he gave me a cold bottle of water. But that was only the beginning. The very welcoming Derek who checked me in assigned me what must be the nicest suite in the hotel, with an incredible terrace and view of Bryant Park below. I spent most of the time I was at the room on the terrace, enjoying what turned out to be perfect weather for the duration of my stay. 
The room was light & airy, well maintained, with a large and marbled bath (separate shower and tub).
Concierge Jo gave me the highlights of the neighborhood, suggesting what turned out to be excellent restaurants, including the sushi place Koi on the property. Also great shopping pointers as well. French restaurant Angelina turned out to be a perfect breakfast spot.
The subway stop right at the end of the block gave me access to the whole city within a few minutes and Grand Central was nearby in the opposite direction.
A friend met me at the hotel and we went to the event for which we were in the city, and had a great time. Shopping at the Diamond District was close and convenient, and when our to do's were complete we conversed on the terrace for hours.
Oh, and there's a Whole Foods around the corner, so we didn't need to eat at restaurants all the time.
I went home thinking that it was an absurdly nice suite with an incredibly nice staff who saw to my every need. I would be happy to stay there again, and likely will do so. I can't recommend the hotel and its staff highly enough.

title: Great location and service!
text: I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel back in May, and the location was very convenient. Even though I had a very short stay, Jo at the front desk made it a great experience. She was welcoming, helpful, and gave great advice on places to visit!

title: Best Hotel Staff Ever!
text:
My husband and I have stayed at other nice New York hotels in the past but our recent stay at The Bryant Park Hotel is unparalleled because of the amazingly awesome staff. 
Even before we arrived the exceptional service began with Steven working his magic to accommodate our request for connecting rooms, which was a special birthday surprise for our 12 year old son.  Upon arrival we were warmly welcomed by Jo, John and Shannon. Jo and Shannon even sang happy birthday and all of the staff signed a birthday card for our son! Throughout our stay we were treated with this level of warmth and hospitality, all the way to Veronica wishing us farewell as we left. 
A very special thank you to Jo who always checked on us and took time to talk to our son. It really meant so much. 
Additionally, our rooms were immaculate and positioned for great views of the park (or the Empire State Building if you’re in the park). The hotel is in an amazing location with easy access to the subway.
This is the only hotel you ever need to book when visiting  NYC. Thank you!

title: My new favorite NYC hotel
text: I can't say enough good things about the front desk staff at this hotel.  Bellhop staff Ronan and Rey were more than helpful with any request.  Scott at the desk was very friendly and full of helpful suggestions.  But Jo, Lovely Irish lass Jo, deserves extra accolades.  I mention I'm headed out for tea and she says "No need.  I'll have a kettle delivered to your room along with a selection of tea bags."  She offers me a fresh water bottle at each trip downstairs.  "Can I fill your bottle with some lemon water or would you rather a new bottle?"  "Don't miss our muffins in the mornings."  Everyone addressed me by name, always.  And then my room - spacious, sunny and bright.  Sparse and clean with the amenities needed.  A bench, table and two chairs with leftover room to move.  Really large for NYC hotels.  My family of 5 congregated in my room for cocktails and we didn't feel the least bit squished.  Plugs and charging stations where you need them.  Very little floor noise from other guests. I was next to the elevator and NEVER heard it.  The hotel is on Bryant Park, close to Broadway and Times Square.  Easily walkable but without the noise and crowds of Times Square.  Bryant Park offers many tables and chairs so everyone could choose a different restaurant and then meet in the park to eat together.  The park also offers activities each day - music or games, performances.  Just one enhancement of this lovely hotel.  I'll be back.  For sure.

title: Great experience!
text: Scott's service at Bryant Park Hotel made my stay excellent. He was eager to provide helpful recommendations for nearby attractions and dining options, and his insights and suggestions helped me make the most of my time in the city. His friendly and personable approach, along with his attention to detail, ensured a memorable experience. I can't recommend Bryant Park Hotel and Scott's stellar service enough. I'll be sure to stay at the Bryant Park Hotel when visiting NYC again.

title: 5 star staff,  4 Star Rooms at a reasonable price
text:
Our Stay

My family and I (2 adults 2 children 1 and 5yo) recently visited the Bryant Park Hotel for a family wedding (July 2023). 

The hotel's decor is a bit tired but the rooms were clean and the staff was exceptional! I spend 30+ nights a year in Ritz Carlton hotels and I will say the staff at the Bryant Park strives for the same level of customer care.  We did not care for our first room but the staff was very accommodating and offered a reasonably priced upgrade fee to move into a larger room with wood flooring. 

We upgraded our stay to a 1BR corner suite. The suite was filled with light and very clean. The overall decor and furnishings of the hotel are lacking but my understanding is that they have begun a complete refresh of the furnishings to be done later this year.

Location

The location is superb! Being right next to Bryant Park the hotel provides an oasis in a busy city. There are a number of nearby restaurants and we particularly like Peccora and The Bryant Park Grill. 

The subway is also located just on the corner and there is an amply sized curb cut for transportation making it easy for Ubers or car services to wait and safe to get in and out of your vehicle.

Service

The staff was simply amazing! The front door was consistently held for our family and we were greeted by name and with a smile. Each day our house keeper Tadshi ensured we had fresh linens, a sparkling room and took extra care to change the bedding on our 1 year olds pack and play and ensure it was "just right." 

The entire team went out of their way to make our stay great. Ronan made my daughters smile each time they walked in, Veronica and Shannen were there for all of our needs but the star of the show was Jo who did not rest until we had all of our needs met.

At each turn the staff looked for ways to improve our stay.

Services

The fitness center needs improvement and is awkwardly located across from a guest room making noise an issue. That said Bryant Park offers a wonderful setting for outdoor exercise and on the morning of our arrival had a group yoga event with hundreds of participants. 

The morning coffee service was great and featured locally baked muffins and illy coffee. Throughout the day the team (I believe Keith or Kevin) updated the lobby table with fruit infused waters. 

When it rained the staff had umbrellas ready which was unexpected but welcome. 

The bar located in the basement is very cool and has a bohemian vibe. The cocktails were well composed, utilized the finest spirits and fresh ingredients.

We did not eat at Koi but several friends, there for the wedding, did and had good things to say. 

Overall

The Bryant Park hotel is very fairly priced and provided calm on what could have been a stressful family weekend trip. I look forward to staying there again in the near future and experiencing the upgraded rooms.

title: Great hotel, location and outstanding customer service from Jo.
text: Love this hotel. Great location to my office and subways. Love the restaurant and bar here as well and perfect for outdoor cocktails at Bryant Park. Jo in guest services was exceptional as well. Made me feel welcome and taken care of. Was a pleasure to stay here!

title: Great hotel for a family
text:
Our family of five had a great time at the Bryant Park Hotel. We were in the city for 2 nights and felt like this is one of the best hotels around. All of the staff members we encountered were so nice and accommodating. They even sent some very thoughtful and sweet gifts for our boys, ages 12, 8, and 4. We've stayed at five star hotels before and never had this nice of a welcome. 

We were in two rooms, both junior suites with park view. Room 608 is one of the largest we've ever been in the city. We used to live in Brooklyn and I am pretty sure this room is bigger than most people's apartments. Room 607 was also large but didn't have the dining table that 608 had. 

Location is excellent, especially since it's right across from the park where our boys enjoyed the carousel. We watched a show and it's a very easy and short walking distance from the hotel. 

Steven at reservations was very helpful and we appreciate his responsiveness when we ran into an issue regarding booking transportation from/to the airport. The lady at the front desk as well as the bellman were also super helpful and got us minivan cabs when we needed them (Uber was giving us issues with our party of 5). 

We can't wait to go back the next time we're in the city.

title: Clean modern lovely rooms. Friendly staff. Perfect location to see all the best of NYC
text: The room overlooking Bryant park was wonderful. Clean, spacious room with a queen size bed and a desk and a huge bathroom with soaking tub and separate shower. The staff were super friendly and helpful. They even gave us a bottle of sparking wine for my birthday. The free coffee in the lobby was strong and delicious. The location was perfect to see a Broadway play, Times Square, go jogging in Central Park, and catch a movie in Bryant Park across the street. Whole Foods is at the corner and has great beer and wine for a few dollars. Perfect to enjoy in the room or park before going to see a show. This location really was the best and we've stayed in NYC several times over the years. The front desk staff Rey & Scott & Shannen were so friendly and helpful. It was like staying with friends. They made the vacation super-special. I highly recommend this place.

title: Best hotel in NY
text: This hotel is amazing. The rooms are amazing. The staff is amazing. The location is amazing. The views are amazing. Most importantly, the staff is amazing. The front desk staff is so friendly and professional and knowledgeable. Special shout out to Shannen! Won’t stay anyplace else in NYC if I can help it!

title: First rate
text: Well appointed hotel with great location near the park and spacious rooms. The desk staff, in particular, Jo, were friendly and very helpful. Checkin was easy and fast. The downstairs bar is worth a visit.

title: The pinnacle of hospitality!
text:
After this week's stay at the Bryant Park Hotel (BPH), I can't imagine ever staying anywhere else in NYC.

I travel to NYC every few months and like to try out new boutique hotels around Bryant Park for fun. This was my first stay at BPH and because of a flight delay, I ended up staying just one night instead of my intended two nights. I was in a flurry when I arrived, with less than an hour to unpack and head to a meeting. The team welcomed me warmly and swiftly. Everyone was absolutely terrific. Because of my hotels.com status, they even brought me a complimentary bottle of prosecco! My room was large, clean, and filled with light and all the amenities needed.

The true reason I will always come back is because I fell ill right around check-out time yesterday. I was sitting in the lobby and Jo K. from the front desk noticed that I looked off and came over immediately with a bottle of water. She offered to help get me something to eat, but I wanted to try and walk down the block to get food. I only made it a few steps outside before I knew I couldn't make it any further and had to come back to the hotel, even though I had already checked out. Jo set me up in a quiet, air-conditioned space, made sure I had water and an internet connection for my laptop, and let me know that she would be there for anything I needed! What incredible care and hospitality.

I experienced a long day of food poisoning, but I was absolutely taken care of as if I was family at the Bryant Park Hotel, and not for one minute was Jo or anyone else upset about the true chaos I, unfortunately, caused in this wonderful hotel.

title: Great Stay!
text: Staying at the Bryant Park Hotel has been on my list for a number of years - and finally I crossed it off with a three day stay in New York with my husband and kids. The front desk staff were amazing - shout out to Jo and Shannon. They make you feel like family. The amenties are perfect and the location is spot on.

title: Welcoming, professional and clean
text:
We just had 6 nights in a suite at Bryant Park. Everyone from Jo on front desk to the housekeepers who cleaned was fantastic. So welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. 

Headlines: 
Wonderful views over Bryant park with easy access to everywhere. 
Room spacious and clean 
Staff professional and helpful

It’s a fantastic location and the hotel room was very bright and clean. Bathrooms nice too. 
The rooms and hallways are clearly maintained and regularly painted which helps keep a fresh feeling.  

I think my only suggestion would be the entrance hall reception and lift area really need brightening up with different decorations as they felt dark and the rain mats need replacing - almost the first thing I saw when I walked in and I thought “oh no it looks tired” I wondered what the room would be like. 

However pleased to say the room was great. Very clean. Staff responsive and friendly kind and professional. 

Would I stay again? Absolutely.

title: I❤️NY
text: The stay was wonderful. Such great service from staff members Jo, Ronan, and Veronica, Shannon and Dwight. Hotel offers easy access to theaters timesTimes Square, many restaurants, Parks and sightseeing and shopping. Will definitely visit again.

title: Great Staff
text: Just dropped into NYC for a 4 day trip. Found the Bryant Park hotel at a good rate so I thought I’d give it a try. I usually stay at the Grand Hyatt. Moving forward I will be staying here more often. The hotel staff were amazing. Literally amazing. One staff member certainly went above and beyond and set the tone …. Josephine Kinsella who from the start made me feel like I was a friend visiting NYC and she was there to show me the ropes. Everyday she knew my name, asked me what I was getting up too and always had a great tip about NYC. She made the experience even better. But I the staff at this hotel all of them were amazing.

title: Best Hotel and Staff aim NY
text: Where do I start with this amazing hotel and it’s staff!? Outstanding from start to finish. Great rooms and views and location BUT the staff are the best I’ve ever experienced in any hotel. Scott, Ronan, Veronica and Shannen were so welcoming with nothing and I mean nothing being a hardship. They made us feel so welcome every time we walked through the doors. It was really nice having fresh coffee in the morning and ice cold fresh water available throughout the day. The guys were simply the best and when I return to NY I cannot see past this hotel. Well done guys and thank you so much.

title: Great stay!
text: I hesitated before sharing experience here. If people find out how Josephine is cool and helpful, they may start booking like crazy and I'll have to find another hotel... But hey... Let's help fellow travelers: Bryant is really a nice place to stay at the heart of NY.

title: At Last I've Found a Favorite NYC Hotel!
text:
I've been coming regularly to New York for a theatre vacation since 1983, and I have managed to stay in a different hotel every time I need one - not because they displease me but because I love different experiences. One place I had longed to try, due to its handy location and the recommendation of a good friend, was the Bryant Park Hotel. That became a reality on my recent visit, and now  I have to rethink my travel philosophy because after spending five days there, I just may have found my home away from home. 

This is the perfect location for a theatre lover: it is within easy walking distance to Broadway, and yet there's not a whiff of the craziness of Times Square here. That's because the hotel faces Bryant Park, the best oasis in New York City outside of that bigger spot of green a little further uptown. Most mornings, I would grab a coffee and something to eat from one of the myriad of choices ringing the park (Ole and Steen, Le Pain Quotidien, Starbucks, Whole Foods, the list goes on) and grab a table in the park to eat, read, and people watch. There are also places where you can sit and have a lovely breakfast. (I highly recommend La Pecora Bianca, only a few doors down toward 5th Avenue.)

When I booked, I splurged on a park view room, and then I was given a complimentary upgrade to a junior suite. The room was enormous, sleek and clean. The park bustles in the daytime: during my stay, there was a film, a theatrical presentation, and a gigantic yoga class. But the park closes at night, and W. 40th Street is quiet for a midtown NYC street. I'm not a good sleeper, but I slept beautifully on that comfortable bed. My bathroom, too, was huge and included a separate tub and shower. Best of all, when I opened my shades, I was met with a wonderful contrast of the buildings of Gotham and the greenery of the park. 

Every member of the staff that I met, from front desk to housekeeping, was warm and friendly. I wish I knew the name of the gentleman who checked me in, but I want to especially mention Veronica and Jo. Jo knocked on my door the first day to present me with a gift of candy (I think they give something to every guest on their first day), and then she and Veronica checked me out and fetched me a cab to the airport. I know the running of a metropolitan hotel is never-ending work, but both these women took the time to chat and make sure I had had a good stay. 

My deepest thanks to everyone at the Bryant Park Hotel for making my stay so comfortable, restful and friendly. I can't wait to come back!

title: Fantastic Hospitality & Service
text: A very special experience hosted by the Bryant Park team. From the start of the trip to finish - all week - the staff offered phenomenal customer service and went above and beyond to ensure my stay felt elevated and comfortable. They are the best in the business. Larry, one the staff members really took care of our requests timely and attentively. He really helped us get situated and made the week stay feel like a 5-star experience. Thank you again to Larry, Shannon, and Veronica!

title: Best hotel in NY
text: The best hotel in NY.Its not my first time in NY and Bryant park area is our favorite place for accomodation. Its my first time in Bryant park hotel ( based on trip advisor review) and wowww what an experience.lets start from the staff whom surprised us with baloons and wishes for my daughter birthday. We stayed in the superior queen room which has the best spactacular bryant park view. The room is big with wonderful amnities and very very clean. The hotel team is the best winning team. always willing to help, support and always smiling. We stayed for 7 nights and we will come back to Bryant Park Hotel in every visit in NY. Special thanks to all the BPH TEAM  especially to Julio, the most professional night manager, Shannen, jon, Stephen,Jo and Veronika

title: AMAZING EXPERIENCE 👏
text:
What an amazing experience we had at Bryant Park Hotel, everything was awesome, the location of the made it very easy for us to visit many activities and events. 

I wanna thank Ms. Josephine for the great hospitality and service she offered.

title: Great staff, wonderful hotel, central location
text: My first time here. I chose it bc it had great reviews on TripAdvisor, and because my son spent 40 days in an Upper East Side hospital last fall, I wanted something special for him. We needed a beautiful hotel with welcoming staff in a wonderful location, and Bryant Park Hotel fit the bill. The room was very spacious and had a great view of Bryant Park. Front desk, esp. Veronica C. (who leads them as front office manager) and Shannen, were exceptionally kind and helpful. The two made my son very happy to have been a guest here. We will return.

title: A wonderful experience that made our visit even more special.
text: A wonderful hotel to stay in - the staff could not be more helpful (shout out to Larry) and made my wife and I feel very special. the location is probably the best for NYC: Bryant Park is beautiful, centrally located and great for dining. This is a four star hotel that behaves like a five star hotel - from the staff, to the room, to the overall service - cannot recommend highly enough. Thank you BPH!

title: Checking in was like a Broadway Musical
text:
From when I walked in the door it felt lik entering a swanky stage with an all star Broadway cast!
Ronen opens the door with his Irish charm, takes care of my bags John at the front desk recognized me from a previous stay greets me by name with a glowing smile. Jo, who is an actual comedic stage and comedy actress begins the scene with a humorous monologs that starts the experience with laughter, followed by welcoming greetings by a dazzling cast of charmers - Rey, Veronica, Shannen and Julio, each more personalized and caring than the other. George stops by to make sure they give me a room so nice I'd never want to leave. 
I stay at NY hotels often and there simply is no comparison in terms of design, luxury, view and most of all, the hotel front yard is the entrance to Bryant Park!
Every time I enter or exit the hotel someone else from the team checks how I'm doing and asks of they can help with anything.  If not for the fact that even the person opening the front door greets me by name I would think they all mistook me for a celebrity guest.
 Got all my wor done and had solarlce. Felt like the Mayor of New York for the week. 
If you can manage to book a room no doubt you will understand that I do not exaggerate.
The morrocan turkish restaurant is gowgeous and fit for business or social with a staff on par woth the hotel.
