The one downside is it's a very hard place to leave and they don't offer permanent stays.

title: Fantastic time at Bryant Park Hotel
text:
Had a fabulous 5 night stay at the Bryant Park Hotel, 2 adults, 2 teenager daughters.  Received a lovely personal greeting from Siobhan and the team, informing us we had been upgraded.  Oh what a lovely upgrade we had!  Balloons, cards, notepads, chocolates, souvenirs and fizz!!  The rooms were more than perfect for us! Both rooms looking over the lovely Bryant Park.  Nice touch with Molton Brown toiletries and ear plugs.
The hotel offered bottled water, fresh iced lemon water, coffee and muffins.  All greatly received.  
The location is great with Bryant Park opposite.  Really central to all attractions and subways.  Will definitely return. 
Thank you Thank you Thank you xx

title: Impressive Attention to Detail
text: The property was originally built as offices in the early 1900's. At first glance that is somewhat apparent. From there between the attention to detail and friendliness of the staff, combined with  the exceptional quality of bedding, pillows, bathroom amenities, etc. (all the details) it's just an all around impressive place to stay. Being right on Bryant Park and a 5 minute walk from Times Square is also a huge plus. I will stay here going forward.

title: The only place to stay in New York City!
text:
The Bryant Park Hotel will be our place to stay in New York City. The hotel is beautiful, rooms and surroundings were spotless, and everyone who assisted us was kind, friendly, professional, efficient, and welcoming. We look forward to returning. Many thanks to Scott, Ronan, Shannen, and all members of the wonderful "cast of characters" who work at Bryant Park Hotel. A special shout out to Jo who made us feel like family with her warm sense of humor and kind-hearted thoughtfulness. These are all special people and make staying at The Bryant Park Hotel a phenomenal place to be. Thanks for a lovely 3 days.
Jeff & Carol Bischoff

title: Ooooh,  I’ll be staying here again soon!
text: Very nice upscale hotel.  Location is SO convenient, (9 minutes walk from Grand Central Station) and it’s an extremely  peaceful & quiet city hotel , with completely comfortable, and quite spacious rooms. Bathrooms are very well appointed, Milton Brown soap products, and  lovely, British style deep bathtubs.  Wonderful robes, and slippers.  Mini bar,  and in room snacks are convenient & fabulous.  The staff is plentiful,  friendly,  and very helpful.

title: Great service, beautiful location, large room, outstanding view
text: I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for two nights last week and it exceeded my expectations. The location is perfect, view of the park was lovely, the room was spacious and very clean (the bathroom was huge) and the service agents at the front desk were very helpful, especially Jo Kinsella.  She went above and beyond to graciously help me as I was leaving that Friday afternoon --- she got my checked luggage, walked me downstairs to show me where the ladies room was located, refilled my water bottle, and called a taxi. Definitely will stay there again on my next trip,

title: Love this place
text: From the second I got here it has been a wonderful experience thanks to the warm greeting by Josephine. And it was followed through by the rest of the staff - great location and hotel. And thanks to Jo I will return.

title: Great stay!
text: Stayed here for my wedding night - it was great! So clean and comfortable. The staff was so nice and friendly and made our stay extra special with chocolate and champagne. Matt was great to work with on our room block and was super helpful through the whole process!

title: Jo and the Bryant Hotel - 5 stars!
text: From the moment we were warmly welcomed by Jo at the front desk until the moment we checked out, we felt cared for and special. The Bryant Park Hotel is in a beautiful midtown location, in walking distance to literally everywhere-Times Square, Broadway, the Empire State Building, 5th Avenue, etc. It was our home for about one week, where all our needs were taken care of. The staff are all professional, respectful, courteous and you get what you ask for in a matter of minutes! Jo in particular was amazing-her warmth, smile and knowledge of NYC made our stay particularly memorable. You won’t forget her or the Bryant Park Hotel! We will be back! Thank you to Jo and staff!

title: Loved our family vacation here.
text:
One block from Times Square and right on beautiful Bryant Park so a perfect location if you want to do the Time Square tourist thing without being in the middle of Times Square. Beautiful building, great rooms with large windows, really clean and comfortable. 

The staff are some of the kindest people we ever stayed with. Shanen and Dwight checked us in, made us feel very comfortable, and even gave gifts to our children. Jo made sure my elderly parents well taken care off. 

The hotel has a beautiful lounge and restaurant. One tip - they don't have room service, but there are tons of delivery options. So if you're slow to get out in the morning you can always get breakfast delivered (or pick up) from one of the nearby places. There are also some really great restaurants right on that block.

title: Bryant Park Hotel is the greatest!
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is the best choice for accommodation when visiting NYC. The staff are friendly, efficient and capable. They have great knowledge of the city and spare no effort to provide all the information and assistance needed to make clients feel happy and comfortable. The location of the Bryant Park Hotel makes it doubly appealing. The beautiful trees, gardens and entertainment across the road in Bryant Park and its proximity to Fifth Avenue, the New York Public library and Moma make the Bryant Park Hotel a priority. I choose the Bryant Park Hotel because the staff make me feel safe, comfortable and happy all the time I’m there.

title: Delightful Return
text: Been a while since I've stayed here but glad I returned. Absolutely fantastic location, convenient to subway, my favorite coffee shop, etc. Staff, especially Jo at the front desk, was uniformly helpful and friendly. Only one elevator serviced my floor but never had to wait, and loved the cups of cold water in the foyer. Room was pleasingly stark, if verging on spartan, but highly functional and definitely comfortable. Apppreciated the bedside clock-radio that paired with my phone for music. Sockets were old and loose but I'm told they're being replaced. Bryant Park has a lot more more concerts than the last time I stayed there, so I was frequently serenaded at lunchtime and cocktail hour, but it wasn't disturbing and I never had a noise problem at night. It's probably been more than 10 years since I've stayed there but I'll definitely be back sooner than later.

title: Absolute perfection
text:
Had the most wonderful experience at the Bryant Park Hotel. From the second we arrived we were thoroughly impressed with the hospitality, cleanliness, and romantic ambiance. 
Veronica, Shannen and Ronan provided a lovely experience and made sure our birthday celebration was extraordinary! We cannot thank them enough and look forward to visiting again soon

title: Personal
text: We loved our stay at The Bryant Park Hotel!  Shannen, Scott, Veronica and Ronan were all a complete pleasure!  From the moment we arrived, the staff was friendly, warm, and welcoming.  They were helpful with the luggage, parking garage situation, and even offered to bring our seven-year-old son up to the top floor to take in the NYC views!  We unfortunately, couldn't take them up on the offer that evening, but when we went to the desk the next morning to see if we could, not only did they have a small gift/toy waiting for him, but Scott dropped whatever it was that he was doing and immediately came from around the desk to take us up!  The hotel room was large enough, very clean, the bedding was very comfortable, and the mini bar was well stocked with snacks and booze. The bathroom was stocked with Molton Brown products which smell great!  It's a great location, and we would definitely go back. It was a great experience!

title: Fantastic hotel with incredible service!
text: This hotel is amazing and has it all~ great location, great rooms, great prices, and to top it off, amazing service! Scott Cohen, John, and Rey at the front desk do everything they can to make your visit to NYC a memorable one! They are true all-stars and make this hotel that extra bit special! Kudos for a job well done!

title: Absolute perfection.
text: A+++++ stay at the Bryant Park Hotel. Excellent location in midtown with a view of the beautiful park. The room was absolutely perfect. In fact, they upgraded us to a junior suite and it was much bigger than expected. Clean, high quality modern furniture in a practical layout with a large table and seating area. Nice bed and linens and it was quieter than expected for a city location. The shower worked well... I could name off every aspect of the room and hotel—they were all above reproach! The staff (especially Jo) was so friendly and helpful. Fast elevators. Oh! and several really good bakeries on the same block for brekky. BPH is going on my list of top hotels of all time alongside Campton Place Hotel in SF.

title: Great stay at Bryant Park Hotel
text:
My husband and I have traveled to NYC for overnights and shows many times    Without a doubt the Bryant Park Hotel was the loveliest experience we have had.  The staff were attentative, responsive, thorough, and respectful  

Jo Kinsella checked us in and for our entire three day stay went out of her way to be sure our every need was met   Her knowledge of the City, restaurants and theatre saved us time and opened new doors, as we explored, wined and dined.  She was absolutely lovely
Ronan met us each day with a gracious greeting as he bid us a friendly hello,coming and going
I did not get everyone's name but each staff member could not have been more accomodating.  
The hotel was clean, and very comfortable   Overall BPH had a very welcoming feel   Being across from the park just added to this wonderful space
Siobhan checked in with us after our stay....wishing a Happy Anniversary and hopes that our stay was all we had hoped    Very nice touch Siobhan....it was all that and much more
LD

title: Perfect location and stand out service that sets this hotel apart for all others in midtown.
text: Every stay here is exceptional.  The location and rooms are first class but what sets it apart is the staff and in particular the front desk.  I would call out Jo In particular.  I had a 6am flight cancelled and found out at the airport it was moved to the evening so I had checked out.  I headed back to the hotel  and the team were able to make sure I got access to the room again, moving around the cleaning schedules to help...nothing was too much trouble.   Above all else they offer a personal experience that is not replicated in a chain hotel environment - I can't rate it highly enough.

title: Fabulous hotel and great hospitality
text: We stayed at the Bryant Park hotel in the last few days of our NYC trip. It's well located and in the midst of all the action. Plenty of breakfast places and very well placed if you want to see broadway | visit Time Square | other touristy locations. Bryant Park in itself is a fantastic place to spend your time. We got upgraded to a suite which was so wonderful. It has great views of the park and Manhattan, very specious with a gorgeous washroom. We didn't want to leave the hotel :) The team at Bryant Park take hospitality a notch higher. They know you by your name and make the stay really comfy. The morning coffee and muffins is a fantastic touch. Special shoutout to Veronica, Shannon and Dwight.

title: Jo Kinsella and her outstanding team are wonderful
text: As a native New Yorker that has worked on 5th Ave and 43rd St.  for many years – our family has spent hundreds of hours in Bryant Park over the years and dined at the restaurants at Bryant Park Hotel as locals.    On my first trip back to NY as a Floridian, I was determined to stay at Bryant Park Hotel.   Jo Kinsella and her excellent team made my business trip perfect.  So much so, that when we return to NY this summer to visit family – I still plan to stay at BPH even though we don’t need to be in midtown for this trip.    Very much looking forward to seeing Jo and her colleagues again later this summer…

title: a warm welcome
text:
Very nice stay.
Had a great room with a view of the park. You can hear the noise of the street, but that's part of the game.
I was particularly impressed by the staff.
Josephine and the others were gracious and helpful

title: First time in New York and perfect hotel choice
text: First time in New York and perfect hotel choice. Couldn’t fault . The room was generous , comfortable and stylish with amazing views of the Park which is just across the road. . Just loved getting coffee and breakfast then hanging out in the park watching the world go by. The staff are very professional . The hotel is in a fantastic location too - close to many of the usual attractions. . I’d love to come back to NY and would definitely want to stay at the Bryant again.

title: Five stars.
text:
Wonderful experience at this excellent hotel.  Kudos especially to the manager, Michael Strauss, and the courteous and helpful folks at the front desk, in particular Veronica, Shannen and Z.  Thanks so much.

Keith Ingber

title: Wonderful guest relations and great location.
text:
The check-in was the nicest experience. Stephen W. was incredibly hospitable.  He inquired about the nature of my stay and offered suggestions and well-wishes. 
The location is perfect. I went out for a run, got a coffee, and enjoyed the coffee on the steps of the NY Public library. There is a Whole Foods right across the street. 
The hotel always had water on ice. In the morning there was complimentary coffee and muffins. 
All around great trip. Wish I could have stayed longer.

title: Really happy with our stay!
text: I don’t normally write reviews but we were so pleased with our stay, I had to! Veronica, Shannen and Ronan were so helpful and all the additional staff (that I didn’t catch their names) were so friendly and greeted us with a smile during our 3 night stay. We had a double queen room that had a park view. Loved the location of having Bryant Park just steps out the front door.  The room was spacious and clean, beds were comfortable, and all requests were responded to in a timely manner. We especially appreciated the lemon water at the elevators after walking around the city all day! Although it wasn’t noisy, we also appreciated the provided noise machine. The only thing I would have liked was blackout curtains to go over the window shades. The shades were great but I would’ve preferred it to be just a little darker in the mornings. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Great spot in midtown
text: Love to stay at the Bryant Park when i am in NYC. The access to all i need could not be better. The rooms are not tiny and the staff, including Josephine at the front desk are always extremely accommodating.

title: Exceptional stay. Hits it out of the park every time. Phenomenal staff.
text:
I have stayed at The Bryant Park Hotel a bunch of times over the last 15 years and every one of my stays is always phenomenal. The location of the hotel is second to none making it a quick walk from Penn station or anywhere else you need to be. The rooms are functional and have stunning views of Bryant Park across the street.  In addition, depending on your room the empire state building. The staff helps set the place apart from many of the hotels in the area. They remember you and take notice of your preference and really exceed expectations with future visits. Zaaul at the front desk has made my last few stays very memorable. He proactively goes out of his way to make your stay one to remember. From the smallest things they help put a smile on your face from the moment you arrive until you leave. It’s also very nice to see Rey welcome you when you arrive. He is always ready to help with whatever you need. 

I stay primarily at larger brand hotels when I travel outside of New York but quite honestly, I can see my place staying anywhere else when I come to the city. The staff at The Bryant Park Hotel really hits it out of the park. They provide 5-star service and really make the stay worth it. I already look forward to my next stay and saying hello to my friends that make this place special.

title: A fun place to stay in midtown
text: The highlight of our 4 days was definitely the staff. Josephine, Ray, Ronan and Zaaul made it their mission to ensure the best possible outcome for our stay. We upgraded to a junior suite (thanks Jo) with a view of the park which is an oasis in the middle of the concrete jungle. Nicely located, within walking distance to everything.

title: We had a wonderful time celebrating a friend's son's wedding.
text: We enjoyed our stay at the Bryant Park Hotel.  Everyone was very welcoming and Josephine went above and beyond getting us into Angelina's for a Father's Day brunch.  I would highly recommend this hotel.

title: World Class Customer Service and Attention to Detail
text: The team at Bryant Park made my co-worker and me feel welcome and important.  Jo Kinsella and the team at the front desk made us a priority and provided us with a world class service experience.  The front desk team made sure we got checked into a comfortable room right away, had everything we needed and remembered details about us to make our experience at the hotel attentive to our preferences.  The Bryant Park hotel is a very nice hotel in a great location, but the people within the hotel are what make it world class.  Thanks for the great service!

title: Fabulous Stay in Bryant Park
text: I have stayed in many four star hotels in NYC, and this is by far the best.  The rooms are large, with a seating area , table and couch, which is unusual in NYC.  Free coffee and muffins in the morning, polite, attentive staff, and a lovely view over the park.  All areas are tastefully decorated and clean.  There is a gem of a cocktail lounge on the lower level, and the location, near subways, stores, and Bryant Park is fantastic. We will be back!

title: Oasis in busy New York
text:
The Bryant was exceptionally clean and spacious . The staff were very friendly , helpful and kind . Siobhan Delaney (General Manager ) went out of her way to leave chocolates and the most beautiful scented roses in our room. This features was greatly appreciated. Being away from home for some time it was heart warming. John and the others in reception we’re always kind and helpful. As was Ronan and others helping us with luggage. They were always up for a chat . The views over Bryant park were amazing and there was very little traffic noise on our floor level .  It’s a colourful and art hotel  hotel that  was great to enter. 
The downstairs bar is great and we enjoyed the Japanese restaurant. 
Having stayed here 5 times and loved it we will be back again.

title: Unmatched
text:
I've been coming to the Bryant Park Hotel for more than 7 years on business travel.  And the only hotel I stay at in NY is the BPH.  

Whether you are greeted in reception by Jo, John, Scott, Dwight or whoever, you are met with unparalleled professionalism and kindness.  Not to mention, the rooms are fairly large for NYC hotel standards, with high ceilings and great amenities.

A+ all around.

Albert R.

title: Best hotel in New York
text:
This hotel was everything you would hope to experience staying in New York. Perfect position being in mid town so close to everything. The location was also magnificent because we had a suite and view of Bryant Park itself. Thank you to the wonderful, professional and warm staff who made our stay including Ronan, Zaaul, Julio and John. Nothing was too much trouble. Little touches included fresh flowers in our room and fresh coffee and muffins at breakfast time. Room was huge, clean and fresh with a large shower and deep soaking tub.  View was amazing. Always something happening at the park which immersed us into real New York life. Loved this hotel and cannot wait to return. 
The hotel exuded old world charm with a modern twist.

title: Unmatched hospitality, location and rooms!!
text: We checked in a coupe of days ago and the stay has been excellent! Super spacious room, unbeatable location and great service. Still have few days before we leave, and will update, but so far The Bryant Park Hotel rocks!! If you want to stay close to all the action while being in an oasis of calm and green, just book this. You won’t regret it!!

title: Wonderful!
text: Fantastic hotel,beautiful room and luxurious bathroom! But the staff were exceptionally attentive and kind- Thank you to Veronica,Shannen,Rey and Larry! YOU all made the experience unforgettable- the Baileys and Birthday  were an awesome surprise!

title: Jo is amazing
text: Very good stay in Bryant Park Hotel. Central location, with Bryant Park just in front. A warm welcome by the team, especially Jo, who has been super nice and fun, and delivered great service for our stay to be perfect !

title: Marvelous Stay In Nyc
text: Emplacement exceptionnel avec une vue imprenable sur Bryant park. L'accueil est chaleureux et la chambre spacieuse et très confortable. Nous nous y sommes sentis comme à la maison. Un grand merci à  Stephen le directeur des réservations pour le soin et la bienveillance apportés. Je recommande les yeux fermés.

title: Great stay - central location, super-comfy room, attentive staff
text: Our room on the 15th floor overlooked Bryant Park and was just lovely - clean, bright and with the most comfy of beds.  Although the hotel supplies earplugs, we did not need them - it was nice hearing the muted sounds of the city at nignt - did not bother us at all.  The muffins/morning coffee the hotel offers were tasty but the lemon-infused icewater was the best.  Staff were very friendly and knowledgeable -  and one staff member, who is also an actress, managed to snag us seats to a sold-out play. (sorry, I forgot to get her name!)   We had a couple of issues when we first arrived, staff saw to these within minutes. Very central and close to Whole Foods, Blue Bottle Coffee (amazing), Pret a manger and other places to grab a quick bite or pick-me-up.

title: Fantastic hotel in the best NYC location on Bryant Park
text:
We spent 5 nights in late May at the Bryant Park Hotel. We had a Park View room with a wonderful view over Bryant Park and the library. We lucked into a room with a terrace over the park where we could sit and enjoy a morning coffee and feel on top of the world.

The Bryant Park Hotel is fantastic. We have been staying here for about 10 years now. The staff, Scott, Jo, John and Zauul are all very friendly, personable and helpful. The hotel's location is right where we want to be, centrally located, on a park, close to excellent subway and bus links, walking distance to plays, and easily accessible to all museums. We love to hang out in the park at the end of every day and enjoy a coffee from the many good coffee shops nearby.

The rooms are bright generous and have modern furnishings. Bathrooms are well designed and spacious.

We will definitely stay here whenever we return to New York.

title: Great location, great staff
text:
Great location, and the staff is top notch. Jo and Veronica were friendly, personable, helpful and made the experience 10x better.

Highly recommend spending some time in the downstairs bar and getting recommendations on what to do in Bryant Park across the street from the staff.

title: Stay here!
text: Wonderful boutique NYC hotel! The absolute best location on Bryant Park with outstanding staff and terrific rooms. We were on the 21st floor with a view of the park. Zaaul, Veronica and Ray were so welcoming and helpful.

title: Perfect Stay
text: Fantastic week at BP Hotel.  Requested an upgrade 2 days into our trip...for larger beds and were granted upgrade the next day.  Response time from staff is amazing...requested additional towels 2 times during our stay...delivered both times within 2 minutes of request.  Fantastic location...park across the street is just perfect.  Special shout out to Veronica, John, Zaaul & Rey.  Had great conversations with the staff...they make you feel at home.

title: Great hotel & location
text: Excellent hotel & location. We got a high level room overlooking the Park, and it was amazing! There are free muffins & coffee in the lobby for breakfast. The Koi Restaurant was trendy & delicious. We walked to. Times Square & Broadway. And we ate outside at Bryant Park. The NY City Library is rithereto. too. Highly recommend

title: Great experience
text: Loved our experience here.  We stayed in a junior suite overlooking the park - beautiful. We did not have the opportunity to experience the restaurant or bar but will definitely be back to try them next time. They looked fabulous. Comfy bed, great service, Great experience.

title: Bryant park
text: Very comfortable big room. Received a free bottle of champagne. Service was stellar. Veronica Shannen upgraded our room for free since it was our first time staying with them. Big private balcony with free of the New Year’s Eve ball. Would definitely stay here again.

title: What a find!
text:
Fabulous first-time stay at the Bryant Park Hotel. This will definitely be our go-to hotel for future NY visits! Wonderful staff (many thanks to John at the front desk for a gracious and helpful check-in, and to Jo - also at the front-desk - for her excellent recommendations and assistance throughout our stay...what a gem!)

The hotel is well-situated and is a 20-minute walk (or less) to many spots.  There are a wide range of restaurant and take-out options (including Whole Foods) within a couple of blocks. The stunning New York Public Library is right outside the hotel's doors, and it is a must-see. The rooms are large by NY standards. We also enjoyed the hotel's workout facilities and the cocktail lounge.  And it was wonderful to look out blue sky and the greenery of Bryant Park from our windows.

Highly, highly recommend.

title: Next-level personal service and great location.
text:
As always, the staff at the Bryant Park Hotel is wonderful.  Josephine and Veronica always make me, or me and my wife feel at home, and they are attentive to every need we may have.  I've found their level of hospitality to be rare in the post-COVID environment.  Kudos!
The hotel's location is perfect for a quick getaway or a week of business meetings in the city, and the hotel is currently undergoing a bit of a facelift, which is sure to improve the overall experience even further.

title: An ideal stay
text: The hotel is ideally located, very comfortable and the staff is charming. My special thanks to Jo for her warm welcome and the service she provided. I'll definitely be back!I warmly recommend this hotel for a stay in NYC.

title: Yes, It Really Is an Excellent Place to Stay!
text: I was a bit skeptical of all the excellent reviews before booking our first stay at The Bryant Park Hotel.  We quickly learned the reviews are quite accurate.  The location is excellent, the rooms and bathrooms are large and comfortable with awesome views of the park, and the elevators quite fast and uncrowded.  While there is not a large traditional lobby, grab a complimentary coffee and muffin and head across the street...then the beautiful Bryant Park becomes your lobby.  Even better is the service from the staff at the front desk and door -- always friendly and offering to help.  We especially appreciated Jo, who was genuinely friendly, caring, and professional.   We will definitely stay here again.

title: The 5-star reviews are correct!
text:
We chose this hotel based on reviews on Trip Advisor, and we are so glad we did.

From the moment we arrived we were so well looked after. John who checked us in was a delight. Our room was amazing - a deluxe with park views. Bigger than I was expecting, with a huge bathroom. No noise from other rooms or the hallways. Perfect.

The bar in the basement is great - excellent cocktails. We will definitely be back. (Hopefully the unsightly scaffolding above the hotel entrance will be gone by then!)

title: OUTSTANDING SERVICE, HOSPITALITY, and LODGING , 5 stars!
text: We had an amazing experience at the Bryan Park Hotel.  Dwight, Ronan and Zaaul were an incredible team. They brightened our day so much!  All of them are so kind, helpful, and attentive. We even had an upgrade for our room, which was such a huge surprise.  The room was immaculate, with every comfort imaginable.  This hotel is a rare gem in NYC and not to be missed.  Our trip was absolutely perfect, big thanks again to the amazing Bryant Park Hotel team for all the joy and smiles you brought to me and my mom.

title: A Hidden GEM in NYC!!!
text:
Heartwarming and delightful experience!!

We visited NYC recently and stayed first at another hotel. We extended our trip but the room type we're staying no longer available. The other rooms there didn't suit our needs. I booked Bryant Park hotel in a hurry and requested a early check in. So glad we decided to make the change.

We arrived at Bryant Park Hotel in the morning. Veronica, the front office manager welcomed us warmly. She put in a lot of effort to accommodate my early check in request. After leaving our luggage, we went sightseeing and lunch. She called to inform us we can pick up keys to go to our room early if needed. We were pleasantly surprised that she arranged a room upgrade for us from Junior Suites to Bryant Suites when we came to get the keys. Shannen, another front office staff, followed up with us after we got into our room to make sure we have all we needed. She surprised us in the evening with card from the front office staff and very thoughtful gifts for our visit. Dwight and Josephine at the front office also helped us when we needed things or directions.  All the staff we interacted with at Bryant Park Hotel were welcoming, kind, genuine and thoughtful. They're passionate about their job, and care about the customers and love their city!

Room: 
The Bryant Suites we stayed in is very spacious and overlooks the Bryant Park. Soft natural light pour in from the tall windows in the bedroom and bay windows in the living room, it's bright and calming. The marble bathroom is huge, with a bathtub and a separate enclosed shower. Good water pressure and fast WIFI. We felt very relaxed in our room the minute we stepped in, rested and and slept well. 

Location:  
Right in the middle of Manhattan, walk 6-8 blocks south to the Empire State Building and all the tasty restaurants/cafe in Korean Town, walk 10-15 mins north to Rockefeller and MoMA. Time Square is just a few blocks to the west, and the rooftop experience at Summit One Vanderbilt is a few blocks northeast....Many subway lines at the Bryant park, easy ride to Soho/Nolita, Chelsea, East Village or Greenwich Village, etc.

Service: 
All our requests were handled timely. Larry, the housekeeping staff who brought extra blankets for us is fast and upbeat. Elevators are super fast, we never waited longer than a minute, one of the added advantages of staying at boutique hotel. My teen boy used the hotel gym. Great weight lifting equipments and he loved working out there. He used the gym at night and in the morning, neither time was crowded. The free coffee and muffins provided at the hotel lobby in the morning was lovely, too. 

We look forward to coming back to Bryant Park Hotel when we visit NYC and highly recommend it!!

title: Great hotel for families
text: The hotel is great. The staff is amazing. So good after my kids and friendly. Location in front of the park is amazing. Some rooms could use an upgrade for a star rating. But overall no complaints at all. Great place to stay close to Times Square and various subway lines.

title: Fantastic experience
text: I was in NYC for work and my husband and son flew in to join me.  Jo at the front desk made my 8-year-old feel so welcome - it was a great first trip to NYC for him!  We had a fantastic time.  Thank you!

title: Great hotel!
text: The hotel went above and beyond to make our short stay perfect. The room was spacious and the bathroom was big. Everything is completely renovated. The location is ideal and the park across the street is amazing. Big thanks to the most accommodating staff - front office manager Veronica as well as Ronan and Shannen. We’ll be back!

title: Amazing hotel with views of Bryant Park in the heart of Manhattan
text: Stayed at The Bryant Park the weekend of our wedding. The staff, location, and rooms are all incredible! Especially want to thank Scott, Lou, Veronica, Shannen, and Jo for a fantastic, welcoming stay. Thank you!

title: Wonderful hotel in a great location
text: Had a wonderful first-time stay at The Bryant Park hotel!  Bryant Park and the beautiful NY library are just across the street. Several nice bakeries/coffee shops are a few doors down.  Theater district is a short walk, subway station just a few minutes away and Grand Central about 10 min away. Bed was very comfortable and bedroom and bathroom were very spacious. Shout out to Jo at the front desk--she was very friendly and helpful as was the rest of the staff. Frequent traveler to NY and look forward to my next stay!

title: Pure Gold in the heart of New York
text:
From literally hundreds of New York hotels ..we scored GOLD!
Our first trip to NY for this Australian couple and it was so confusing trying to find a convenient hotel without being in the centre of all the tourist craziness but still close to the subway.
From the moment we walked in Jo at reception gave us  a welcome as if we were family and just walked into her own home. So refreshing! Thank you Jo ..you are a New York treasure and one  Ireland no doubt regrets letting you go😅.
Then we were “ adopted” by Ronan ..another amazing staffer at Bryant Park Hotel …and yet another welcoming Irish man.
Each time we entered or departed the hotel on our adventures we were always acknowledged by all the staff…the hotel felt more like a family B&B.
The rooms are spacious and serviced brilliantly.
Whilst there aren’t any tea or coffee making facilities in the room, each morning a coffee station was set up just at the lifts so you could take up your coffee to your room. Oh, and yummy muffins!
We stayed in a spacious junior suite which overlooked Bryant Park. Room facilities were great.
In a  concrete jungle of a City, having Bryant Park directly opposite was a godsend. Check it out on the web but such a beautiful place for relaxing, coffee, snacks, dining and lots of seats and grass. Grab something from the Fresh Market across the road, sit in the park and enjoy the sights.
The subway was just at the end of the block and Times Squire, Broadway etc just a few blocks easy walk,
Thank you Jo, Ronan, and all the Bryant Park Hotel team for making our New York visit so special.
Needless to say I’d recommend this hotel to anyone in a heartbeat and if I could give more than 5 stars I would

title: Best NYC hotel we’ve stayed at. The park across the street is spectacular, 2 blocks to Times Square, best staff ever.
text: Best hotel stay we’ve had in NY. Booked off of TripAdvisor rating and agree with so many it’s a 10 out of 10.  Right across the street from the Bryant park-huge hundred year old trees, coffee stands, cafes, historic and beautiful-yet three blocks to Times Square. The park and hotel feel very quaint and European. Small European lobby, bathroom design and room design is very well done. The staff (Ronan, Veronica, and Shannen) went so far out of their way to make the most amazing experience (including bringing up an electric tea kettle and tea from their personal stash for us after we mentioned all cafes were closed). Book it -you will love the location and staff.

title: AMAZING
text: This was the most incredible stay. The best possible location right across from a beautiful, calm, and quiet park. Endless cafes, coffee shops, and cute restaurants. Just a 3 min walk to Times Square but still quiet and peaceful. Subway station 1 min outside the front doors. Cool bar area under the lobby with an amazing environment and a nice restaurant inside. Right across from the beautiful NY Public Library with am amazing artifact exhibition. The staff was the best I have ever experienced, went out of their way every minute to accommodate any of our needs, give recommendations, and made us feel like family. AMAZING!!! A+, will be the ONLY place in Manhattan we will be staying

title: Outstanding Customer Service and Responsivness
text:
I travel to New York for business monthly and Bryant Park Hotel is always my first choice. With each stay, I have consistently been impressed with the room cleanliness and professionalism of the staff. It is refreshing to see such attention focused on customer service and responsiveness, especially after a long flight and day at the office.  

On my most recent trip, my husband and two young children joined me for a long weekend. Both Jo and Stephen went above and beyond to check on us throughout our entire stay to ensure we were comfortable. They even went so far to send syrup to our room, when our Door Dash missed this item in our breakfast order! Absolutely exceptional service that is praiseworthy!

title: Bryant Park Hotel is worth it
text: The staff was outstanding.  Scott was most accommodating and very professional.   Any hotel would be proud to have him.  The location is excellent for mid town activities and going to a play.  A nice touch to have water provided at all times in the lobby.  Morning muffins are offered and are outstanding.  They remembered us for a special occasion in our lives which was most appreciated.  Rooms are a nice size.  Sheets are quality.  Pillows are good.  The rooms are just starting to get a little tired.    Subway is close. Bryant Park is fun to people watch.

title: Just Zen
text: Scott at the front desk was absolutely wonderful! The room was beautiful with an unbelievable view. I would definitely stay here again. Room was immaculate, bed was very comfortable. There was even an umbrella available. I’ve never seen that before.

title: Great hotel!
text: My wife and I went to NYC for our honeymoon during Memorial day weekend. Bryant Park Hotel went above and beyond our expectations. First of all, I’d like to say thank you to John at the front desk who read my notes and upgraded our room to a 22nd level suit with the great view. Also, me and my wife had a 13 hour flight and landed at JFK way before our check in time, yet John was able to accommodate us early. Had a great first impression of the hotel with very professional and nice staff. Even though there are only two elevators, we did not have a single issue with it like most hotels in the city have as I learn prior to book. Great location, with bunch of good spots for breakfast. We enjoyed grabbing our breakfast to go from Le Pain downstairs and eating it at the park with an awesome view every morning. Our room was clean and bright. Hotel is located very close to literally everything. Everything major site seeing is with in 15-20 min walk. Our check out with Scott was nice and easy just like our whole stay. Scott was very helpful with tips on how to manage our time to airport. Overall, 10/10 to staff and hotel.

title: Fantastic Stay!
text: I had a lovely stay at The Bryant Park Hotel; the room was stocked with everything I could need and the staff was so kind! Jo was so personable throughout the stay too! I would definitely recommend staying here!

title: Great place!!!
text:
Went there for my Wife's birthday, our second time there, all  staff and management where great, Shannen, went out of her way to make us feel at home!! Rooms are amazing and location couldn't be better, right in front of Bryant park.

Will be back for sure!!

title: In the heart of NYC
text:
We loved it all - Fun team at reception, upgraded us to a junior suit, beautiful room, full of 
 -  light, many windows, and a surprise porch 
with beautiful New York views
.  Spacious  bathroom, and friendly maintenance staff.
Location - the  best  - next to a more quiet street (If you could call that in New York) nearthe NY Library and many dinning options. We had a great time -. 

Would love to visit again

title: Lovely and Excellent customer service
text:
Dear Bryant Park Hotel, this was my second stay at your hotel, and my experience was as lovely and of high quality as it was the first time.  The staff every day was so polite, respectful, happy and provided its highest customer service, thank you mostly to Veronica, Scott, Josephine and Maria !! :)  The location is off course perfect.  The simple breakfast offered in the morning was ok, wished to have slightly more choices for something to eat and oat milk to put in my coffee. Loved the iced lemon water everyday. 
Also, I recommend incorporating recycling bins in the hotel to be more environmental friendly,  much plastic and other recyclable items are used daily.  I tried to accumulate mine in paper bag in my room, but not sure if it made it to recycling.  Overall, I love this hotel, my favorite place to stay when I come to NYC.  Thank you once more for making my stay unbelievably pleasant.  Hope to see you all very soon. :)

title: Another perfect stay
text:
I sound like a broke a record - and for that I’m thankful.  Completed yet another great stay last weekend - I believe our 24th here. It’s as good as ever and actually improved. Key card elevator access is now required which is great. Muffins and coffee out, fresh water always out, and the same great, great staff to greet and assist you.  

We are here so often I truly wish we had a locker on-site to store toiletries so we didn’t have to pack all of them!  

As always, we booked our next stay while there and look forward to returning to our NYC home.

title: Many thanks, Bryant Park Hotel, we'll be back when next time in NYC!
text: Truly great hotel. The rooms are beautiful, full of light, nicely furnished. The people are professional and friendly, everyone, the front desk, all staff, including the contacts communicating with us before the trip. Hotel is located next to our favourite park in the City!

title: An unforgettable experience.
text: The hotel was wonderful the staff treated us like family when we arrived to the hotel we were welcomed by the lovely Veronica, it was our first time in New York. When we arrived to the room we were welcomed with balloons and treats. The entire staff was exceptional Shannon and Dwight were also really helpful giving us directions and recommendations. It was an unforgettable experience.

title: The best hotel experience in NYC
text: An outstanding hotel with terrific team, efficient, very clean, spacious rooms, bathrooms,  great location, terrific view. We were there on a busy Memorial Day weekend and felt very welcome. Zaaul at the reception, the manager Mr Cohen, cleaning staff - all were all extremely helpful. Highly recommended. Will def stay again.

title: Locación y buen trato
text:
Es un excelente hotel con una locacion inmejorable frente al Bryant Park y a dos cuadras de Times Square.La atención de sus empleados es muy cálida y cordial. buen servicio.
Es especial para familias por tener connecting rooms y habitaciones muy espaciosas.

title: A great refuge in the city with the help of friendly, competent staff
text: One could never underestimate the value of a friendly greeting and cheerful assistance from a hotel staff in a city like New York and certainly this hotel had plenty of them, all given with sincerity and competence, as Jo the staff at the reception did, for example. She remembered us by name and was never too busy to find out if we needed anything. We found similar attitude and help from other staff too and we couldn’t be happier we decided to stay at this hotel.

title: Bryant Park Living Room
text:
Jo and her team always make a stay at the Bryant Park hotel warm welcoming and special.
Cracking view of the park, spacious suite and a great location for a mother and daughter trip to NY.
The park is the best parlor in town

title: Hone away from Home
text:
Home away from home.  I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for just shy of a week and from the moment i arrived until I left I felt very well taken care of.
From my early start to some late night returns I was always greeted by the team with such welcome.
Indeed I look forward to staying again at BPH and having the warm Irish welcome and care from Siobhan, Jo and Ronan to name but a few of the team

Thank you!

title: Week in NYC
text: Great stay and great location …Friendly and Helpful and Informative Hotel Team and a huge thank you to all  for such an enjoyable stay in NYC and for the chance to have a really enjoyable week including all the very best that NYC has to offer ..highly recommended

title: Great customer service and a wonderful property
text: Scott, Jo, and Rex were wonderful last week when I ended up at the Bryant Park Hotel after a false start at another hotel. They worked with me tirelessly to find another room for a colleague who did not have a hotel at all. Their recommendations for what to order at Koi were spot on and I ended up getting the Koi Crispy Rice both nights I was there. I am in NYC often and I will never stay at another hotel in the City.

title: Excellent experience and look forward to next stay
text:
Excellent location with friendly and professional staff.  Especially Jo from front desk who seems to be always full of energy no matter what time of the day.  Keep up the good work!
Morning muffins and coffee was a nice touch and love the fusion water in the afternoons.

title: 49th Anniversary Celebration
text:
My husband and I celebrated our 49th wedding anniversary in NYC for 4 days last weekend. Upon arrival, the hotel staff were smiling and welcoming to us. The checkin was smooth with only nice surprises. We were asked about purpose of our visit and offered assistance with plans. The guest service agent that assisted with our checkin, Josephine Kinsella, was very friendly and kind, answered all our questions, and was extremely helpful. She and the staff even gave us an anniversary card and a box of chocolates. It was lovely.
With every entry and exit from hotel we were greeted with smiles and well wishes for our day.
We had a full trip with four broadway shows, a visit to the Intrepid ship museum and many delicious meals, including the Koi Restaurant in the Bryant Park Hotel. It was a beautiful setting and delicious meal. Our hotel room was very comfortable and spacious and a restful spot to recharge.
The Bryant Park Hotel and especially their staff helped make our trip memorable.
Dr. T and J Bass

title: Absolutely wonderful stay!
text: From May 15th to 18th, 2023 we were guests again after a long time at the Hotel Bryant Park New York (several other hotels in between) and were warmly welcomed by Josephine, Ronan and their colleagues and looked after very nicely. The team looked after the guests very lovingly and in a family manner, the room on the 21st floor facing the park was fantastic and very clean and we will definitely stay there again the next time we visit New York. Thank you all for this wonderful stay! Werner & Sonja

title: A warm and welcoming hotel
text: I just had a wonderful weekend at The Bryant Park Hotel thanks to the warm and welcoming staff. Everyone I dealt with on every shift was friendly and helpful. The location is very convenient and the room was very comfortable. I felt well taken care of and would love to stay here again.

title: Outstanding NYC Hotel
text:
I called the Bryant Park Hotel for  a reservation direct, and from that moment to the last minute of check out the service was outstanding.  I have never felt more welcomed and now know why they sign off correspondence with “The Bryant Park Family”. That is what this group of people are.  The room we had was fabulous; a corner room overlooking the park. The bed was extremely comfortable and the towels were fluffy & soft. Housekeeping were sensational and our room was cleaned daily to perfection.(Maria is a star) Both Célon lounge and Koi Restaurant were wonderful and I am making this hotel my go to place in NYC. 
Special Thanks to Siobhan, Ronan, Scott, John, Jo, Veronica,  Zaaul and Shannon )& to all the staff. We had a fantastic stay.

title: Best birthday ever
text: Our stay at the Bryant Park Hotel was incredible. Ronan, Zaawl, Veronica and Shannon all made our belated birthday so special. We felt like celebrities every time we walked into the hotel and they even dropped off Prosecco, Chocolates and a balloon when they learned it was our birthday trip. We will be staying here anytime we are in NYC from here on out.

title: Super star team!
text:
The staff and GM Shivan made me feel entirely cared for. This hotel is a GEM—5 STARS. I’ve found my go to hotel in the city! 
The rooms are spacious, bed is comfy and clean! 

PS-They offer free coffee and gourmet muffins in the morning too! 

Well done! 👏

title: Clean, great location to rest your head!
text:
Clean hotel, a little dated but does what it says on the tin. A HUGE THANK YOU to Ronan for making us feel so welcome, super helpful with suggestions too! Really friendly staff! Highly recommend!

Thanks again for making our stay so memorable!

title: Smooth Sailing
text: I booked with this hotel for a work event. The staff made everything so painless. Every change in the groups schedule was quickly accommodated by Matt. I did not know hotels could operate on this level of care and efficiency!

title: Great Team!
text: I always have such a great experience with the BPH.  Jo is fantastic, and I feel like I'm staying with family.  I stay here for every one of my business trips to New York - and I continue to do that because of the people there; and the location doesn't hurt either.

title: Bryant Park Hotel staff are perfection.
text: The Bryant Park Hotel is an absolute gem, brilliantly located right on Bryant Park within walking distance to everything in midtown and subway lines that can take you anywhere. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. SO comfortable. What really sets the hotel apart, however, is the staff. John and Josephine and the staff at the front desk are amazing and attentive down to the smallest detail. The bell desk is incredibly helpful as well. Housekeeping does an amazing job. This hotel is, lastly, great value for money. You won’t find better for the price in all of New York. Highly recommend.

title: Best Hotel in NYC (No doubt)
text:
3rd time in NYC and found the best hotel here.  My teenage daughter and myself really enjoyed this stay, it was just perfect from the check-in to checkout. Big applaud to Rey, who is bell man, he is always welcoming us and it made us feel heart warming every time. 

We arrived early in the morning, around 8:00 am and Jo/Scott helped us to get into the room around 11:00 (they sent a message once ready! very helpful) and it was upgraded from deluxe room to Jr suite with decorating Birthday balloon and cake. What a surprise! Beautiful view with park and the Public Library is bonus.  Oh! at the check in day, Jo gave us Angelina coupon 10% off , so we could enjoy Hot chocolate and Avocado toast while waiting for the room. Thanks!! 

The location couldn't be better, close to every where. Elevator is very fast and efficient and house keeping is neat. It is good to have a water with lemon next to the elevator and coffee and muffin in the morning. Every other staffs whom I don't remember names, they are all kind and sweet! 

This hotel will be "must go" hotel in NYC from now on. ( Prior to arrival, I emailed hotel with several questions, and Camiile Majid always helped me with very kind soul. thank you so much!)

title: Fabulous service and location
text:
A lovely stay again! A special mention to Jo Kinsella on the front desk - she was great! So friendly and helpful and really made my day! Infact I can safely say that my stay was made all the better for having met her! 

Other than that the rooms are nice and big and location is perfect!

title: Perfect Stay
text: I was in NYC for 2 days for my birthday. Jo at the front desk was amazing. Got me into a room early on the day of my arrival (and an upgrade!) and was kind enough to send a bottle of prosecco to my room for my birthday. The customer service plus the location made for a great few days in the city. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a central location that has easy access to Broadway and various subway stops.

title: Perfect location for accessing midtown businesses and theatres
text:
Perfect location for accessing midtown. A little back from the hustle and bustle, opposite the oasis that is Bryant Park, so quieter than you'd expect. 

It's very clean and the staff are very friendly and accommodating (especially Jo)!

Thanks!!

title: Highly Recommend
text: We just got back from a long weekend at the Bryant Park Hotel and can't recommend it enough.  Everyone on staff was friendly and helpful, but Jo at the front desk went above and beyond to ensure that we had a wonderful stay.  The hotel is so unique and stylish.  The location is perfect.  We had an amazing room with beautiful views of the park.  We'll be back.

title: Bryant Park Hotel - Best in NYC
text:
I am a frequent traveler to NYC for business and pleasure. Ms. Siobhan Delaney, Ms. Josephine Kinsella & Mr. John Castillo at the hotel make the you feel like you are at a home away from home. Cannot recommend the hotel or the staff enough. It's my go-to hotel in the City.

Regards, Amit (Bermuda)

title: Perfect!
text:
The greatest stay in the most beautiful building.  The staff are ALL amazing, I was so well looked after, they literally couldn't do enough for me.  Jo on the front desk was an absolute delight, she went to such lengths to make sure my stay was all that it could be, along with Scott and the Irish porter!  My room was huge  (for New York) and really well equipped.  It was quiet and really comfortable.  The bar in the basement, Celon, is fabulous, - expertly crafted cocktails that are well priced within a really nice, chilled atmosphere. Location is good, 10 mins to central park. 
Thanks to all the staff for making my stay such a good one!

title: Nice room - High price
text: The room facing Bryant Park was spacious, nicely furnished (I would call that Scandinavian Simplicity, a style you rarely find in Manhattan Hotels), the location is perfect. Downsides: The rooms get all the noise from the street, the valves in the bathroom almost do not work anymore, there is no coffeemaker in the room (which should be normal for this price ticket), the staff is so and so and finally, like all Manhattan Hotels, quite  overpriced.

title: Perfect weekend getaway
text: Shannen as well as the rest of the staff are delightful! Rooms are spacious with lovely views of the park. Upscale decor with extremely comfortable bedding. Exceptionally clean with a great lobby bar.  Drinks are delicious. Perfect location! Bryant Park Weekend vendor market is fun.

title: Séjour de rêve
text:
Nous venons de passer 8 jours magnifiques à Bryant park hotel . Nous y retournerons avec grand plaisir car pour nous c’est l’hôtel idéal à New York ( idéalement placé, chambre spacieuse et très confortable, 
Merci beaucoup à toute l’équipe qui est adorable et professionnelle  avec tous les clients,
De plus tous les matins de délicieux cupcakes avec café à volonté sont mis à la disposition gratuitement aux clients ainsi que des fontaines d’eau citronnés l’après midi pour nous désaltérer 
Et tout cela dans un hôtel qui a beaucoup de charme !!! 
Une excellente adresse à New York 
Mr et Mme Cambon

title: Perfection at Bryant Park
text:
I would like to thank once again Jo, Scott and the entire team at the property for the great and enjoyable time i had  this week. The experience overall was well above my expectations. From the check in to the check out everything worked perfectly and flawlessly. Big thanks for the amazing hospitality and i really hope i can bring soon also my family there.
Until then all he best to the BPH staff.

title: Perfect Hotel for Personal & Business Travel!
text: Our stay was perfect at the Bryant Park Hotel! We loved our daily greetings from Ronan, the staff was helpful and lovely, the amenities were stellar, and the downstairs bar was fabulous! We will be back!

title: Immaculate experience.
text: Phenomenal service Ronan was extremely helpful in accommodating me. The whole staff including Scott was extremely helpful. The rooms are Impeccable with a gorgeous view of Bryant Park the best i  have seen in Nyc. Service is top tier i am extremely satisfied.

title: Excellent hotel in even better location
text: Many times I read reviews about how helpful and wonderful the front desk people are and to be honest I am often skeptical.  In this case it is really true.  My wife and I stayed 5 nights and every interaction was truly first class and outstanding.  The employees seem genuinely interested in being helpful and personal and follow up as needed.  Our room overlooked Bryant Park and while my wife and I were concerned about the potential noise we found the noise level to be OK and consistent with other big cities (sirens, garbage trucks, etc).  The room itself was clean, in decent shape and the bathroom had a nice stall shower.   The location in truly amazing and provides across the street access to the park (great for morning coffee) and very easy access to every subway and bus line we needed during our trip.  We also enjoyed easy access to the Whole Foods grocery store, numerous coffee and bagel shops as well as too many restaurants to even count.  The location is really special and would be reason enough for us to return.  Once you add the great staff and nice accommodations, recommending as well as returning to this hotel becomes an absolute no brainer.

title: Fabulous Stay at Bryant Park
text:
This hotel has it all. We had a lovely room with a beautiful view of Bryant Park, it was a great sanctuary from the hustle and bustle of the city. Housekeeping was excellent, something we missed from pre-covid times. They serviced the room and made it easy to choose whether or not to change the sheets. It didn't matter what time of the day we came or went the room was always ready upon our return.

The staff is excellent. Scott at the front desk was extremely helpful and welcoming. All of the team went out of their way to be hospitable.

The location could not be better for visiting,  and the area has many excellent restaurants. It is also a building with a fascinating history. Being  O'Keefe fans we were thrilled to be in the building we'd seen so many years in her painting.

After many trips to NYC over the years this hotel is far and away our favorite. We'd recommend this hotel and its staff to anyone visiting NYC.

title: Great stay from a repeat guest
text:
I live upstate and take the train in to Grand Central, and so have stayed on quick overnight trips at the Bryant Park Hotel many times.  It is a great location near the station, on BRYANT PARK, and in the center of NYC.  I have always enjoyed the beautiful historic building, and the bright, minimalist luxury of the rooms.

This was my first stay since COVID, and I must say the hotel has a new spring in its step. The service in particular was a step way above what I remember--very warm and personal, and with a staff eager to help in any way.  I enjoyed a few conversations with Jo at the front desk, who stood out.  The room this time was an upgrade to an amazing corner suite overlooking the park.  Thanks to the dedicated staff for keeping this one of the great modern hotels in midtown.

title: Great service
text: Call out to the Bryant Park hotel in NY, and in particular to Jo, who was super helpful and attentive during my 4 night stay.   Very human and cheerful and a great ambassador for the hotel.  Makes a real difference.

title: Amazing Service
text: I stayed here just one night for a job interview, and the service was absolutely amazing! I'd had an incident with a plane delay and couldn't visit a printing service the night before to prepare my materials, as planned, but Jo Kinsella, Dwight Izaaul, and the other lovely folks at the front desk saved my life and let me use their printer instead. The morning of the interview, they let me store my bag with them after checkout, made sure I had enough water to last the day, and sent me a good luck email in addition to thanking me for my stay. Their attention to care and kindness touched my heart. I am so glad to have met them, and I hope stay at Bryant Park Hotel and see them again next time I'm in NYC!

title: Best service ever!
text:
Great location, comfortable room and amazing service. But what made my stay was Jo Kinsella, the best Guest Service Agent. She helped me fixing my bike with kindness and great service attitude. 
100% recommended.
Don’t miss the opportunity to meet Jo at the front desk!
;)

title: Perfect weekend with my daughter in the city!
text: I took my young daughter to NYC for the weekend and decided to splurge on a nice hotel so we had somewhere pleasant to retreat to when we got tired of exploring.  Wow, did Bryant Park Hotel deliver!  From check in to check out everything was perfect.  Jo at the front desk upgraded us to a Junior Suite which was LOVELY.  Definitely the nicest hotel room I've ever stayed in the city.  The view was truly sublime.   Bathtub delightful.   Coffee and muffins in the morning delicious.  Service impeccable.  Location is unbeatable- close to everything we wanted to do and plenty of public transport options as well.  Walkable to our Broadway show even for an 8 year old.  Bryant Park itself has lots of fun free little activities set up, we enjoyed some chess and their art cart.  Told my daughter its pretty much all downhill from here, as many of the staff greeted her by name in the lobby and the city was in its perfect spring weather zenith.  What a delightful trip.  I'll never stay anywhere else when I'm back in the city.  Thanks so much to Jo and the rest of the wonderful team!

title: Perfect Location/Fabulous staff
text: From the minute you walk in to the Bryant Park Hotel, you feel special. The wonderful Veronica at the front desk solved problems. I didn't even realize I had. The seamless check-in, the extra special touches, and the fabulous rooms are all top notch.  I had to ring down to the front desk for two separate issues which were immediately solved beyond my expectations. Truly top staffing with Veronica and the team. Can't wait to go back!

title: Exceptional hotel and staff
text:
I booked this hotel as a present for the 13th birthday of my daughter. Coming from the Netherlands, when we checked-in we met Josephine, who made our stay feel exceptional. The hotel itself has a great location, clean rooms, and charming atmosphere. The complimentary muffins in the morning are delicious. What elevated our stay from very good to exceptional was Josephine’s warmth and effort to make it the best trip my daughter ever had, including a birthday card and surprise chocolates and balloons waiting in our room. As a mom, you could not ask for a better welcome in a hotel. 
Meraki- to put a piece of your heart and soul into your work. This is the word that Josephine inspired in me. 
Thank you Bryant Hotel, and thank you Josephine!

title: The Perfect Choice for my Big Birthday!
text:
Wow.  We had a perfect stay here!  Fabulous view.  Perfect location.  Gorgeous old building. Spotless room.  Comfortable bed and great shower.  We expected all of this.  
But it was the friendliness of the service that made our stay.  

Staff will do anything to make guests feel comfortable... and do it with a warm smile.  No question seems too silly and they seem to know what guests need before they do themselves.  

All staff were special to us (and i'm not as good at remembering names as they are!) but Ronan always had a cheerful greeting and Jo went out of her way to make sure my big birthday was special.  

I had such a wonderful week in NYC that i may just have to make this a yearly thing... and the Bryant Park Hotel will be first on my list.  Thank  you from Jeffrey & Kimberly

title: Great hotel with great, attentive service
text: Great room and amenities, and extremely convenient location in midtown with a beautiful view of the park. Nice drinks at the club downstairs. Earplugs provided were great for a light sleeper. Excellent service checking in and out, and throughout the stay. We were especially happy on the final day when we were trying to negotiate our luggage and purchases to the car before noon so we could take care of the rest of the day before leaving the city. Josephine (Jo) at the front desk completely took care of everything—storing our bags for us and giving us a number to call so we could just pull up and have everything loaded into the car. Completely seamless and wonderful way to end the stay before hitting the road!

title: The Bryant Park Hotel is Incredible!!!
text: I am obsessed with the Bryant Park Hotel! The rooms are quite nice and comfortable - there are so many accommodations! The staff is the best in the world! All of the front desk people and bellmen are amazing. John, Josephine, and Scott at the front desk were all so kind and answered all of my questions. Rowan the bellman always helped with my bags, opened all doors for me and was very friendly! I highly recommend this hotel! Don't walk, run to The Bryant Park Hotel and thank me later :)

title: Best boutique hotel mid-town NYC
text: Best boutique hotel in New York City.  Sheets and pillows were perfect.  Great view of Bryant Park . Hotel staff were beyond attentive especially Veronica at the front desk. Loved the gym on the 5th floor. Complimentary fresh muffins and coffee every morning.  Intimate not a busy lobby. Gave me an umbrella when it looked like rain.  I'll be back.

title: Great Hotel & Customer Service
text: We had an awesome stay at The Bryant Park Hotel. The location and customer service can’t be beat. Jo Kinsella and the rest of the staff are so nice and helpful. From the moment we checked in they made us feel so welcome. The Bryant Park Hotel will be my hotel of choice when visiting the city.

title: Bryant Park Hotel - Business
text:
We very much enjoyed our stay and Josephine (Jo) most definitely was a main contributing factor. From the moment she greeted us to when we departed her enthusiasm to provide outstanding customer service is amazing!  

I will say I am excited to return once some renovations are done as the decor is very tired and dated. 

Be sure to have lunch/dinner at Koi and the cocktails at Celon were excellent!  

Brad & Ron

title: What a wonderful trip!
text: I was in NY for business and took my partner with me to also enjoy some time in the city. I usually stay at a brand hotel but decided to go with the Bryant due to its location and pricing. What a perfect choice! From the minute we stepped in the door to the minute we finalized our trip it was a great experience. The staff was amazing, so helpful and nice. Jo Kinsella at the front desk made our final day relaxing and fun by providing helpful hints on eateries, taking care of our bags, and helping us make the most of the day. Every day there were fresh muffins, coffee, and tea next to the elevators and an attentive staff to take care of any needs. We will absolutely stay there going forward. What a wonderful trip!

title: A hotel with a great location and guest experience like no other
text:
I was on a 24 hour layover in NY and decided to stay in the Bryant Park Hotel because of it location beside Bryant Park , I had visited the park at Christmas previously, loved it and wanted to experience it in Spring, I wasn’t disappointed.

I chose the hotel because of its location and I was not disappointed. Fantastic location to explore NYC in 24 hours. 

What I wasn’t expecting but completely surpassed anything I’ve experienced before was the staff of the hotel . From the minute Ronan opened the door and welcomed me to Josephine expertly and effortlessly checking me in . Ray escorting me and my bag to my lovely room on the 20th floor overlooking the park. Shannon and Veronica who helped me with sightseeing queries and also for a speedy checkout . I’ve been to a lot of locations and hotels around the world but haven’t experienced the interaction between staff and guests like I witnessed in BPH . Everybody was chatting to everyone. It was like one big family .

My biggest regret was having to leave but I most definitely will return to what I must say was one of my best guest experiences of my life 

Thank to everyone at the BPH and see you soon .

title: A Great Location for Your Next Business Trip
text:
Our organization was hosting an event a few blocks down and hosted a few government VIPs on our guestlist. It was important to us to choose a hotel known for its high caliber of customer service and we received exactly that. We got nothing but positive feedback from our guests about their stay, the staff (especially those working the front desk), and the amenities. Our employees on-site were so grateful that they could focus on the work and event knowing that guests would be cared for by the Bryant Park Hotel staff. 

Our sales contact Matt Pathak was quick to respond and take care of our needs when our guests had special requests and last-minute cancelations. We will certainly be returning!

title: Fantastic location and staff
text: I was on a regular business trip in New York with some colleagues and the Bryant Park Hotel popped up on our booking app. We were very pleased with this hotel and will make it our regular staying place in the area from now. What a fantastic location and comfy hotel close to our work locations, the sights and lots of restaurants. Great value for the area as well. Coffee and muffins in the lobby were a perfect start for the days when we did not want to have a full breakfast. And  a special mention of Jo (Josephine) who was personable, friendly and extra helpful with recommendations and sorting out my early checkout. It was nice to have a friendly face to chat to in the mornings.

title: Definitely staying here next time in NYC!! They also help with midnight pizza recommendations. :)
text: My best friend and I stayed here to celebrate our 30th friendship anniversary. It was the BEST experience. I needed some special accommodations due to medical conditions and they were met perfectly.

title: Bryant Park WOW
text: I was there on business and arrived early. Josephine Linsella at the front desk took such great care of me and prioritized my check in.... forever grateful for your care and consideration.  When I returned from meetings later in the day, Derrick was "at my service" and pointed me to the Celon bar where I got a  lovely after dinner drink to take to my room to sip while enjoying a soak and my great big bath tub. At the restaurant for breakfast the next day, Marco provided wonderful service and great recommendations for Peruvian food not only in NYC but in my home town. Thank you all for a wonderful stay. Can't wait for the next time!

title: Amazing stay in the city!
text:
Bryant park hotel will be your smartest decision in NYC trip. The rooms are huge, the location is brilliant, but most of all- the front dest staff is remarkable, and I want to specifically point out Jo (Josephine Kinsella). 
She was amazing from the moment I checked in- it really feels that her target is to make my stay the best one I have ever had in the city. 
She took care of a special room request I had (that included changing the room to a better one then the one I initially got), gave me a good city recommendations, and overall- made my stay at the hotel to a much nicer one.

title: Great hotel in a great location
text:
The Bryant Hotel staff, especially Jo and Scott, were very accomodating and made my 7 yr old daughter feel extra special during her first NYC trip with a suite upgrade. The free coffee and muffins in the lobby were a great addition and the only thing I would change is the bed, which was a little hard. 

If you're looking for a spot in NYC that is just steps from quaint and quiet green space aka Bryant Park, delicious coffee shops, bakeries, bagel shop, whole foods, famous and delicious cake shop, and subway lines, this is the place to stay! A five min walk will get you to times square and a 10 min walk you will be at Rockefeller Center.

title: Great NY hotel
text: Great hotel. Only in town for one night and was very busy throughout. Jo Kinsella at the front desk made everything super easy. Great location in the middle of Manhattan and nice views over Bryant Park. Will be back. Thank you!

title: Amazing Experience
text: Jo Kinsella at the front desk made the entire visit worthwhile.  Unbelievable friendliness and attention to detail.  While I didn't have a view, the room was spacious and comfortable.  I will go back.

title: Great Guest Services
text: I was very impressed (as usual) with Bryant Park hotel. The guest service agents are extremely friendly and attentive which make business travel enjoyable and relaxing. Josephine went above and beyond to make my stay a pleasure. Thank you!

title: Outstanding service
text: This is an outstanding hotel with very friendly staff.  I was given an early check in and a room upgrade.  My car was booked with great efficiency.  I would single out Jo Kinsella in guest services who leads the team and provides a warm welcome to all of the hotel's guests

title: The perfect location with the perfect staff
text: We always love to stay at the Bryant Park Hotel when in NYC. It's so convenient to everything...the subway at the end of the block goes to everywhere in 10-15 minutes; and  Broadway shows are a 15 min. walk away. Beautiful views of Bryant Park just across the street. Great restaurants all around. Most importantly, the staff always aims to please. Jo, who is a great concierge and always available to help you no matter what your questions, always makes us feel well taken care of; and the whole staff and management have always given us a warm welcome. It's our NYC home away from home.

title: Thank you
text: I had a fabulous stay at this hotel, where I was treated to a spacious room overlooking Bryant Park. I found the white noise machine to be a very clever detail. Upon departure, I forgot my passport in the safe. I was able to call from the cab and have Josephine retrieving it and waiting for me when I got back so I didn't waste anymore time that I had already. Everyone had been pleasant during the stay, but this was above the extra mile.

title: We cannot wait to go back!
text: The staff were terrific from the moment we arrived.  Josephine could not have been more helpful.  She showed genuine interest in us and went out of her way to make our stay very memorable.  We were always greeted with a smile by the front desk staff as we arrived and departed the hotel each time.  The room was fantastic and equipped with everything we needed.  Koi restaurant and Celon lounge were both big hits as well.  The location is fantastic and was a great home base as we explored the city.  As if we needed even more proof to know how great the staff is, Jo personally delivered my laptop power adapter to FedEx after I mistakenly left it in the room upon our departure.  We will definitely be back.

title: Au cœur de la pomme
text:
L’hôtel est magnifique de l’extérieur et est idéalement situé à la 40eme rue entre le nord et le sud de Manhattan.
Le bâtiment, début 20eme, est noir et or et fait face à la bibliothèques.
Les chambres sont lumineuses et propres, le lit confortable et les salles de bain spacieuses .
Pour le reste, demandez à Jo, elle saura vous rendre le séjour inoubliable. 
Nous on a bien aimé. Merci

title: Bryant Park Hotel
text: I took my granddaughter to NY to celebrate her 18th birthday.    Chose the Bryant Park Hotel for our stay.     The location of the hotel is perfect, we were close to subway access and about a 15 minute walk from most of the tourist locations.     We arrived late, but the staff was there to great us.   At all times the staff was so friendly and helpful.    The room was nice, we had a view of the park which was amazing, the bathroom very well appointed and had a tub!  So far from all my visits to NY, this is my favorite location.

title: Disappointing Room, Great Service
text:
The service was spectacular… thank you. 

The hotel condition is not. Maybe it was just our room, but it was old and tired with scratched up wood floors, cracks and peeling paint on walls and ceilings, and furniture that was beaten up. We paid for the upgraded park view—and that was nice. But to be ranked 7th we expected something much nicer. We don’t get to go away as a couple often and we’re disappointed. 

I did make a complaint and was told by staff that the hotel was full otherwise she would have moved us to a “better” room. She also said she noted it in the file to get a free upgrade in the future. Sh explained the hotel is going to be renovated soon. 

All was very nice but didn’t do anything to address the fact that we spent 460 for a night in a room that was highly disappointing.

title: Cared
text:
I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for two nights when in New York for meetings. I arrived late morning fully expecting to be told that I could leave my bag but couldn't check-in until later, but Josephine on the front desk went the extra mile to find me a room that I could get access to straight away.

She was friendly, professional and clearly genuinely cared about getting me into a room and having a good stay. 

The room was light and nicely laid-out with a very comfortable bed and a great shower. The view over the park opposite was excellent and the hotel is brilliantly located.

Great stay.

title: Great Way to Celebrate!
text:
My husband and I stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for my birthday celebration and we had a wonderful time. The staff, Ronan, Scott, John and Zaaul were all very attentive, helpful and so friendly.

Our room was fabulous with an incredible view of the park especially at night!

~Highly, highly recommend!

title: Our wedding weekend!
text: We stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for our wedding and there was a lot of back and forth needed between the grill and the hotel - the hotel managers and front lobby attendants were so incredibly helpful. John, Zeal and Ray were the best. They made things run so smoothly and made our entire weekend so easy and a pleasure. They made me feel so comfortable to ask for anything we needed. The beds and bedding were also unbelievably comfortable - like a cloud! We highly recommend!!!

title: Wonderful Hotel for Business or Pleasure in the Heart of Mid-Town Manhattan
text: This is my third visit to Bryant Park Hotel. I come here for business and on occasion bring our college-aged daughters. The staff here is so warm and welcoming. Jo and John at the front desk are attentive and eager to help you in any way possible. The doormen are congenial and ever-present to open doors, help with luggage, and the like.
