I suggest the rooms on the front side of the hotel that overlook Bryant Park and the NY Public Library which is totally worth a visit just to look at the ceilings. The hotel has a wonderful restaurant for quiet business meetings or an elegant dinner. Ole and Steen is down the street for coffee and Danish pastries. Whole Foods is two city blocks away.  Broadway and Times Square are within walking distance. Don't forget to see New York New York the vocal talent of the cast is amazing!  With a perfect mid-town location, inviting staff, and clean rooms, you will enjoy a pleasant stay for business or holiday.

title: Alex and Tayfun are Amazing - Book at Celon @Bryant Park Hotel!
text: We had a business happy hour in Celon. It is such a beautiful space and so close to our office, so the location was perfect for us. Also, coordinating the drinks and hors d’oeuvres for us, was super helpful and helped plan everything to perfect. Tayfun helped us while we were there and gave us such white glove service, catering to our every need (even anticipating our needs before we asked). Overall was a great experience. Will definitely be going back!

title: Highly recommend
text:
Great hotel, rooms are big ,amazing team, best location in town, just in front of Bryant Park
I enjoyed the stay, the welcoming team ( thanks John for the extra efforts) , be sure I'll be back next time I'm in town

title: Amazing Venue for Celebrations of all Kinds!
text: We chose The Bryant Hotel and its Celon Bar for a corporate event. The experience could not have been better. Thank you for helping us make our event all that it was. Our guests had an amazing time. Your servers were exceptional.

title: Great experience!
text: Although we booked Bryant Park Hotel for proximity to an event, I would absolutely return for a stay because of our lovely experience. The staff, especially Jo Kinsella at the front desk, were attentive and engaging. The room was lovely and well equipped and more than we bargained for, with a great view of the park which provided endless entertainment. Super comfortable, clean, great stay!

title: Good location, nice staff
text:
Very well located in midtown.  Nice coffee & cake place 2 doors down, Le Pain Quotidien. 
The hotel room was spacious. I liked the arrangement of a table with chair and sofa rather than a desk, made for a nice work space.  The staff at the front desk were very polite, helpful and professional. A shout out for Jo Kinsella who did my check-out. Pleasant and professional, a great start to my day.

title: Hip & Fun Home Away from Home!
text:
From the time you check in from when you leave, you are welcomed by the amazing staff. From Josephine at the front desk to Alex & Stephen in Events & Reservations, everyone is there to make your stay at their beautiful hotel fantastic.  
It's conveniently located across from beautiful Bryant Park which always has tons of things happening and you are smack dab in the middle of the city which never sleeps for anything else you want to do.  I've stayed in a million hotels in NYC and this is the only one that I keep coming back to.
Hungry? Go to Koi for crispy rice with Avocado that you'll dream about.  Celon is a funky bar downstairs with a great vibe and even the toiletries are top notch!
LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!

title: Lovely Stay
text: The room was generous in size, clean, bright, and the bed was very comfortable. Location was great and you walk out onto the beautiful Bryant Park. That staff was very nice. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Jo was amazing at front of house
text: This hotel is amazing Jo Kinsella the front of house is amazing! From before we even arrived Jo was incredibly helpful, giving tips of where to go, how to get there etc.. what routes to take for scenery. Jo showed us around the hotel and even gave us a bit of history about the hotel.. even down to why the hotel is black and gold representing coal and fire. We both agreed we have never experienced any front of house as welcoming as Jo and we travel ALOT!! HUGE THANK YOU JO.. a credit to Bryant Park Hotel and we 100% will be back because of the incredible service we received here. Currently about to head for a cocktail in the hotel. Very swanky surroundings.

title: Favorite hotel and staff
text: The stay was perfect. The staff are very accommodating and especially Jo at the front desk. This is my favorite hotel for easy walking everywhere. Across from the NYC library. I so recommend this hotel when in NYC. Right across from Bryant Park

title: Lovely meeting Jo at Bryant Park Hotel
text: From the minute we walked into the lobby, even though we were tired from a long journey to get to NYC, Jo at Registration made us feel completely at home and welcome. Jo is delightfully cheerful and we even lingered at the registration desk because we were having such a nice time conversing. Jo made sure we had a feather-free room and made sure we knew where the nearest patisserie was for some of the finest croissants in the city. And…. on top of all of that , our room is gorgeous with a spectacular NYC view!

title: Exceptional Staff & Service
text: We stayed for 6 nights and had the best experience. Every staff member we interacted with was exceptional (especially Jo at the front desk who was by far the best concierge I have ever encountered). The location is central to so much. We will definitely be back whenever we go to NYC.

title: Great stay
text: We had the best time in the hotel and a super end to our trip to the US. We got a lovely welcome from Jo at reception and Ronan was very helpful with info about where to go on our stay. Loved our room 11707. Super view of the park. Great bonus of coffee and muffins in the morning for free provided …. We loved the location. Beautiful spot. I’d return in a heartbeat. Loved every minute ❤️🇱🇷

title: Great guest experience
text: Myself and my husband recently stayed at the BPH for my 40th birthday weekend and loved it. Rooms are very spacious for NY with very comfy beds and spotlessly clean. The location is a perfect base for visiting NYC. The staff were all so lovely and super helpful. We had an issue with our airport driver on the last day and Jo on reception sorted it for us immediately and had a taxi arranged in no time. Will definitely be back!

title: Good hotel with great location
text: Really good service from the staff (Ronan, Scott and Zaohl), they were really helpful :) The location is great and next to the teain station. There was coffee and muffins to start your day! We only had a problem with our AC anf they took a day to fix it. A noisy place comed with a grat location in the heart of the city. Apart from that would totally recommend. We will return

title: Bryant Park Hotel is thee BEST!
text: I reserved the Bryant Park Hotel Loft on the 25th Floor for a Board meeting and placed several room reservations for the Board of Directors. From the first time I interacted with Matt Pathak and Alex Cintron via email and in person to get the logistics in place, the hospitality, hotel room gifts, and customer service shown in particular by Matt, Veronica, and Zaaul Gonzalez, to myself and the Board members were beyond what we imagined! They each went beyond the norm that, to this day, a week after our Board meeting at the Loft, the board of directors are still boasting about how great it was to stay at the hotel and how they loved the Loft meeting space. Thank you so much, you all. We will definitely use Bryant Park Hotel again!

title: Superbe hôtel au cœur de Manhattan
text:
Superbe hôtel très proche de Times Square et donnant sur Bryant Park, parc très agréable en plein cœur de Manhattan.
Hôtel superbe , chambres très agréables, spacieuses et calmes.
Muffins et café offerts tous les matins.
Personnel très sympathique.

title: Great staff and amazing location
text: The front desk staff was very helpful and kind.  They truly cared for your experience.  The bed was the the best I have slept in for this price tier of hotels.  The shower and amenities were very nice too.  The location is awesome.

title: Great Hotel super friendly staff .
text:
Really nice hotel in a great area . Very close to subway and time square .
Right between 05th and 06th avenues . 
Hotel rooms were nice and large size , housekeeping was excellent . Showers and beds were all really good .
 Check in and out was superfast , in fact any interaction we had with the staff was really pleasant . They really go out of their way to make you feel welcome . Just like to thank all the staff for their recommendations and general helpfulness during our stay .
Bryant park is directly across from the hotel and is lovely place to just chill .
All in all when we return to New York this will be our first choice .

title: Great hotel!
text: My husband and I got married in March 2023 in Bryant Park, so we stayed at Bryant Park Hotel for our wedding weekend, as did many of our family and friends. We had an amazing stay - the suite we were in was big, comfortable, and had two bathrooms, which was great for getting ready with my bridal party. The staff was also SO attentive and helpful throughout the entire weekend. The location was perfect for our out-of-town guests, who got to explore Grand Central, Fifth Avenue, Bryant Park, etc. We can't wait to go back!

title: Don’t go to Times Square. This is the quintessential NYC EXPERINCE!
text: Bryant park hotel is in a fabulous location. Right across from the NYC library, subway stops and of course Bryant Park. You can walk to any midtown meeting and your delicious downtown restaurants are only a short 10-15 min subway ride. MSG is a short five minute walk. The hotel is luxurious , spacious, with an amazing staff. The bar is comfy and inviting. Michelin star restraints are one block away. If this isn’t the best value for your dollar, I don’t know what is. When you check in ask for Jo, although the whole team makes you feel like best friends hosting you for an exciting NY visit!

title: Le charme de l’Art Déco New-yorkais
text:
Le Bryant Park hotel, donnant sur l’un des parcs les plus reposants de Manhattan, offre une expérience inoubliable. Jouxtant les métros de la 42e rue, la New York Public Library, et la 5e avenue, très central et permettant de se rendre n’importe où en ville rapidement. 
L’accueil chaleureux, courtois et professionnel, les chambres claires et spacieuses et leurs vues imprenables sur Bryant Park, sur d’autres rues calmes ou sur l’Empire State Building,  en font un « must have » à ne manquer sous aucun prétexte. Escale mythique  dans un immeuble Art Déco des années 30, son histoire fût façonnée par la Radiator Company, qui lui choisit des couleurs noir & or, symbolisant le charbon et le feu. 
Ne manquez sous aucun prétexte une expérience des plus divines dans l’un des hôtels de luxe les plus mythiques de New York !

title: Historic, Elegant and the Best Hotel Customer Service in NY!
text:
We wanted to visit the Bryant Park Hotel for a while and even booked it for last year but had to cancelled it because we got sick with covid the week before our trip.  We decided to try it again this year and it was worth the wait. The Hotel is in a very centric area with Time Square, The Summit, 5th Ave. and good Museums at a very short distant away.  The Bryant Park in itself is lovely with an amazing grass, flowers, activities, restaurant and very relax and good vibe.  The NY Public Library is right in the premises.

The Hotel has a very good restaurant (Asian) and a cocktail bar.  The food was amazing.

We must give thanks to Veronica Calero at the Front Desk.  We told her it was our 10th year wedding anniversary and our troubles the year before because of covid and she put us in an amazing 20th story corner suite with a bathtub, separate shower, very spacious room and the most beautiful breath taking view of the Bryant Park.  The room even had its own glass door to a very spacious balcony with a coffee/breakfast table and that incredible view.  Veronica even sent us (herself) a complimentary bottle of Prosecco.

The heating/cooling system in the room was great and so was the fully, and I mean, fully stocked refrigerator we had.

Can't say enough good things about Veronica and the staff (Josephine was great too) and their good customer service surely enhanced our overall experience.  We just loved it.  Best memories in NY so far.

title: Brilliant Bryant Park Hotel!
text:
We had the pleasure of staying in a park view room. The room gave a great view of the park. Facilities were perfect! 
What made it for us were the staff. 
John, Jo, Ray, Ronan and Amy were amazing! A delight! 
Thank you!
We will be back!  🌟

title: Best sleep since 2019!
text: My husband gifted me an overnight stay for silence, solitude, and sleep for my 30th birthday. Upon arrival, I was checked in by Shannon. She was so welcoming and thorough in the check-in process. I was greeted by all the staff on the way up to my room and it was refreshing to experience. The room itself was super spacious and very thoroughly clean and the temperature was very comfortable all night without having to be adjusted. The view in the room was absolutely amazing. Even the bathroom was beautiful! The bed was the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on at a hotel. The pillows were so fluffy and soft and the brown noise machine was the icing on the cake. I immediately fell asleep and didn't even dream that's how deeply and comfortably I slept (as a co-sleeping mom of two toddler boys, that's no exaggeration). I was accommodated for a late check-out (1pm). I was so comfortable and so thoroughly enjoying the experience, I lost track of time and ending up checking out at 1:45pm where I was met by John. He was extremely gracious even though I was late to check out. Overall, I had the best time and sleep of my life here and I 10/10 recommend this place to every and anyone!!

title: Excellent for a couples getaway!
text: If your looking for a nice quiet room while visiting NYC, this place is for you! Our room was clean and well taken care of. John C at the front desk was a friendly, professional host that took care of us from the moment we set foot inside. Both the cocktail lounge and Koi restaurant served a high quality product. We will be booking this again.  I highly recommend this place!

title: Manhattan's best accommodation and hospitality staff.
text:
A hidden gem in NYC.  Words will not do this hotel and their staff justice; you must experience it to appreciate it. The location is like a rural setting in a busy city, the sense of calm and relaxation vibe from both visitors to the park and the park itself make the hotel and its location a unique experience in Manhattan.
The Iconic building that is Bryant Park Hotel is also reflected in the interior of the hotel, with the most amazing staff, room layout, accessibility, and dining.  I booked the hotel to visit family in NYC, we booked a Bryant Park Suite and a standard room. They rooms were spacious and spotless with every amenity you needed. Pricing was excellent in comparison to other hotels in the vicinity and I will say the best decision I made was to book the suite as we could relax in the room as a family and hang out looking at the views of Bryant Park.  From check in to check out, the staff were interested in you, and how your day was.  From Jo, Veronica, Zaaul and Shannon on reception at various times, to Scott who had the tough job of the night shift, and the 2 R’s on the door, Ray and Ronan, no matter what query you had or just wanted a general chat, they were most pleasant and helpful.  Practically, the hotel is perfect for all types of travellers – from the individual traveller to families in both the corporate and leisure markets, there are dining facilities in the hotel, with Koi restaurant and Celon bar on the ground floor to endless options within a five minute vicinity of the hotel.  The location is idea at 40th and 5th to explore all parts of Manhattan.  Every time you walked in the door you felt at home.  We will be back and so will our friends!

title: A taste of Morocco
text:
Celon lounge is such a hidden gem. 
I adore the vibes and the ambient! I heard about this place from a friend and it lived to the expectations. 
The place is ideal to hang with friends or for a date. The drinks are really well balanced and creative. I especially liked “ The fist Word” a variation of Last Word. I have to shout out to the manager Tayfun, who was very attentive and friendly. 

Will be back  for sure!

title: Excellent experience!
text:
Had the most enjoyable stay at the Bryant Park Hotel. The room/bed were very comfortable and the service was excellent. The front desk provided great local knowledge, making my stay what it was!

Thanks guys

title: Excellent
text:
We had an excellent experience at the Bryant Park Hotel from the moment we stepped through the door. We were greeted byJo & her team who couldn’t do enough for us.  Our room had a fabulous view overlooking Bryant Park, it was extremely comfortable, spacious, very clean with all mod cons. The bed was particularly comfortable.
I was traveling with a teenager who really enjoyed the experience . The hotel is very central with excellent transportation links , shopping & dining on the doorstep. A lot of tourist attractions are within walking distance allowing you to soak up the New York atmosphere.
Each day Ronan was very courteous on the door & happy to help with any queries as well as being a wealth of information.
Without doubt I would recommend Bryant Park hotel to anyone who is considering staying in New York.

title: Our "go to" hotel in NYC
text: This is our second time staying at the Bryant Park Hotel.  The location is perfect, an easy walk from Penn Station and close to then NYC entertainment venues. The hotel has a beautiful view of Bryant Park.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The staff is friendly and accommodating. This is the hotel I will continue to use when I go to NYC.

title: Great stay and staff
text: This is a repeat visit to this hotel. We love the location, room size and walkable to many destinations and shopping. Great restaurant connected and fun bar in the downstairs. The staff is always very welcoming and friendly. Ronan, Veronica and Zacul were very accommodating and helpful.  We will definitely will be back!

title: Above & Beyond
text:
The hospitality of front desk service managerJo Kinsella went above and beyond expectations.  I arrived after an early morning flight and although my reserved room was not ready, she found me a great room for check in, assured I had coffee and got me situated in time for an important videoconference.
This level of service carried throughout my stay, from doormen to the wonderful restaurant Koi.
Service professionals like Jo are the reason I’ll return to the Bryant Park Hotel when business or personal travel has me headed to NYC.

title: What a city, what a hotel!
text: Thank-you Bryant Park team.  What a superb hotel, this must be New York's finest in terms of overall service,  value and vibe.  Veronica on the front desk and Tayfun the F&B Director were just two of so many friendly and helpful people.  Thanks to them all.  The junior suite we stayed in was fantastic with amazing views of the square and we were lucky the ice rink and winter market was still there (on its last weekend).  The Bryant Park cellar bar is so atmospheric and the coffee and muffins in the morning were a lovely touch.  Outside, the hotel is well located for all of Manhattan's central attractions including the Empire State and Times Square.  And out of five sky-high viewpoints we could have gone up, we opted for the Top of the Rock and weren't disappointed.  What a view, what a city, what a hotel.

title: Perfect location for a business trip! Centrally located to all!
text: I was attending an exhibition in NYC this month. The hotel could not have been more accommodating. The Jr suite was perfect to hold small meetings. The location, a block away from Time Square, was a perfect location to be close enough without staying in Times Square. Couldn’t have asked for a better spot!

title: FABULOUS VISIT
text:
From the second we walked in, we were greeted by Jo and Steven at the front desk......by name! It was my Granddaughter's Birthday, and she was presented with balloons, along with a couple special gifts from Jo and the staff. We were then escorted by Jo to our beautiful upgraded Jr Suite. Our room overlooked Bryant Park, which is my most favorite park ever. Bed was so comfy, large bathroom with a tub and shower and the room could not of been cleaner. Heater and hot water work great, no issues at all.
We decided to have breakfast at KOI restaurant downstairs, which is a sushi place for lunch and dinner, but serves an amazing American breakfast. Marcos, our server both mornings, was wonderful and the service couldn't of been better. He even taught my Granddaughter how to fold the fancy napkins. He was absolutely fabulous. One morning we had breakfast a few doors down at Le Pain Quotidien. Food was ok, but the coffee was amazing.
We were greeted every day by Rowan, the doorman. He also referred to us by name and my Granddaughter just loved him. He was always interested in what we did that day and what our plans were for the next.
Hotel is walking to distance to just about everything. We did take a taxi to Battery Park which was sooooo expensive, but because I was with my 10 year old Granddaughter, I didn't want to take the subway.
Whole Foods across the street was super convenient to pick up fruit and snacks for our hotel room.
It's simply amazing how a wonderful Hotel staff can make or break a trip. This was a special get a way for us, and the way we were treated by Steven, Rowan, Marcos and especially Jo, we will never, ever forget it.
Bryant Park Hotel, I will be back.

title: Bryant Park Hotel: My Favorite Hotel in the World
text:
For me personally, Bryant Park Hotel is the best hotel in the world (from my travels in the US, Europe, Australia, and Asia).
The words I associate with the BPH are: classy, warm, homey, sophisticated, comfortable, friendly, cheery, happy, bright, well located, accommodating. My spirits lift every time I walk in the front entrance.
I've stayed here solo and with my family several times since 2012. I stayed for an extended period in Dec 2022 and didn't get around to writing my review before I returned for a short visit solo in March 2023. In December, it was magical looking out onto the winter wonderland in Bryant Park and was lovely being toasty and warm in my bright and cheery suite when it was icy and miserable out. My trip ended abruptly in December and I had to rush back on account of a family tragedy. Given that I was in a hotel when the news came, there was no other place I would have chosen to be. Scott at the front desk was so kind and understanding, adjusting the dates of my stay and letting me check out very late the day of my departure. 
I was delighted to return in March 2023. Since I was solo, I opted for a basic room. Jo checked me in and was warm and welcoming. When I asked, she said the room I had been assigned did not have a view. So I expected what I have experienced in other New York City hotels in rooms without views ie, you look out onto the wall of the next building which seems close enough to touch. In one upmarket hotel, my only view of the sky was the reflection in the window of the building I faced. So I was pleasantly surprised by how bright and cheery my BPH room without a view was. As I said to Jo later, a BPH room without a view equals a room with a view in most hotels. The next building was a distance away and I had a nice view of Bryant Park from the side. 
The BPH bathrooms are spectacular by NYC standards—spacious and well maintained. 
It's just lovely being on Bryant Park in all seasons. And there are restaurants, cafes, bars (the bar in BPH—Celon—is delightful), a Whole Foods, the beautiful and imposing New York Public Library, a bookstore and more at the BPH's doorstep. And, while not located in the madness of Times Square, the hotel is very conveniently located for theater going. 
I truly feel like I'm back amongst friends whenever I return to the BPH, which is my comfort zone. Thank you to all the staff and a special shoutout to Scott, Jo, John at the front desk, Ray at the front door, Tenzin, and Lundup in housekeeping for yet another fantastic stay. I can't wait to be back.

title: Great Service, clean rooms and excellent location.
text: A great location and the staff are all friendly and very helpful. I had the pleasure of receiving the great service from Jo who was so friendly and helpful and when I first  got to the hotel Zi acted as my tour guide and was extremely helpful. Rhonan is a real character too.

title: Great location, even better staff!
text: I stay here often when I come into the city for business given its incredibly convenient location and I can't recommend them enough. The staff here is incredible. I had a heating issue with my room during my most recent stay and they were incredibly responsive and moved me to a new room immediately without any issue.

title: Above and beyond service in a busy city
text: What a gem!  In a city this big it can be difficult to find a place to stay where you don’t feel like a number. The Bryant Park hotel is in the middle of Manhattan looking over Bryant park and around the corner from The New York public library.   It’s steps from Times Square but safely tucked away from the crowds.  You’re truly in the heart of Manhattan but the staff will make you feel like you’re at home.  This has been lost in so many hotels in the city.  I was honestly shocked by the warm greetings and above and beyond service I received while at the Bryant park hotel.  The rooms are spotless and spacious and if you call the front desk for something it will be in your room in no time.  It is clear that they want to make your stay as wonderful as possible which is such a special feeling in a busy city!

title: I'll be back soon
text: When I checked in Jo greeted me warmly, and set me up in a room overlooking the park on the 5th floor. The room, the view, the sushi restaurant downstairs, the service, the doorman, the bed, the linens, were all magical.

title: a must stay!
text: There aren't enough words to describe how amazing this hotel is!! Their staff and team are amongst the best people i've come across in my 11 years of living in NYC. We were getting married at BP Grill and they treated not only us but our entire family and friends like the only guests in the hotel. We had 42 rooms blocked and and not one single guest had a complaint. From the day we booked, Matt was an absolute dream to work with. He was prompt, friendly, and really went the extra mile. For example, he set up our. bridal suite with ballons, a card, photos and even a GIFT CARD to where we had our first date. We had our rehearsal dinner of premise and Ronan and the team thought to bring us ladies over umbrellas for the walk back to the hotel. You just don't see that attention to detail these days. We are so so so thankful for the ENTIRE team- from the front desk, the bell hop, the doorman, bar tenders, hostsess etc, thank you for everything. We will be back!!

title: Great service
text: Good quality hotel with excellent customer service.    Jo at the front desk made the extra effort to upgrade my room, suggest a lovely restaurant for dinner and showed me to the taxi on departure.   Excellent location with a great vibe in the evening.

title: Miracle Workers At The Bryant Park Hotel
text: If I could give 10 stars to the team at the Bryant Park Hotel, I would! I was in town for five days for a media book launch campaign that had no shortage of curve balls thrown at it. Every day was a new obstacle that the Bryant Park Hotel team helped me work through each and every day, from needing a last-minute filming location to the greatest miracle, helping me find the lost wallet that I left in the cab-they found the driver and returned it to me! They always cleaned my room, really as they knew I would be back in the afternoon and ALWAYS had a solution to any problem I had. This was single-handedly the BEST hotel, say I have ever had and I am a weekly traveler. A BIG thank you to John, Scott, Shannen, and JO-you were my guardian angel. Oustanding location, a remarkable team, this is truly a home away from home.

title: Best hotel in Midtown
text:
This is my favorite hotel in Manhattan. Perfectly located in Midtown, it is steps away from a prime subway stop, a few blocks from Grand Central Station, minutes walk to Broadway theatres and 5th Avenue shopping, and sits across from the charming Bryant Park.  It is housed in the iconic Radiator Building, made famous by Georgia O’Keefe who painted it in 1927.  

The rooms are modern and very comfortable, with Milton Brown toiletries, fluffy robes and slippers, and luxurious bedding. Coffee and muffins are available each morning and ice cold cucumber water through the fry and evening.  The Celon lounge and Koi restaurant are also on site. 

All that said, the Bryant Park Hotel has the best staff ever.  Very attentive, genuinely friendly and determined to make sure your stay is a happy one.  

I don’t often review hotels on this site but this one is worth writing about!

title: Couldn’t ask for more!
text:
Another great experience at Bryant Park Hotel!! We have stayed there multiple times and are always very happy with the service we receive. The front desk team, Jo and Scott, were very helpful and informative and always treated us like VIP’s whenever we saw them. The room and views were amazing as usual! The suite was large and clean, with a great bathroom that had separate shower and tub.  House keeping also did a good job of keeping things nice and tidy, we were never in need of anything. 
The location is a huge plus!! We were right near all of the Broadway shows and just a short walk from the middle of time square. 
We cannot wait to return this summer (and maybe even bring the kids! :))

title: Emplacement, accueil, vue, chambre monstre classe
text:
Magnifique hôtel, accueil au top, très belle chambre, parquet. Salle de bain très grande douche baignoire. Café et muffins à dispo gratuitement le matin. Chambre 1605 pour nous donnant sur la patinoire vue au top.
Bars à café sur la rue pour les petits déjeuners, entrée métro à 1 minutes, emplacement parfait.
Rue très calme la nuit 
On reviendra merci

title: Outstanding Drinks and Perfect Atmosphere
text:
Very glad I decided to stop by, had some amazing drinks & bites, Date & Scotch (A perfectly balanced & smoky scotch based cocktail) 
The First Word (A classic twist of The Last Word made with Mezcal)  
Dylan (the bartender) was fun to talk to and makes great drinks.
Cant forget the hospitality by Tayfun the manager who got us introduced with the concept and made us feel welcomed.

title: Stay at The Bryant Park Hotel
text: This hotel is very central and very convenient for services.  Bryant park is a very lively and beautiful place, right at the back of the Public Library.  The rooms by New York standards are spacious and comfortable and very clean.  The staff were courteous and helpful to me, especially Josephine and Stephen who solved a small problem I had brilliantly and quickly.  Very nice people. I think I will come back here my next trip.

title: Best hotel in New York!
text: I've been in the hotel/resort industry for 30 years.  I was looking for a unique boquet style property with character and history.  I FOUND THE BEST ONE IN NEW YORK!!!  The staff has old fashioned hospitality anticipating your every need.  The rooms are gorgeous also.  Josephine at the front desk was AMAZING.  She greeted us every day with a huge smile and assisted us in many ways.

title: Another Empire State Stay
text: Always great to return. Clean upscale property and rooms. Welcoming and helpful staff. Enjoyed the corner room with Bryant Park view that we we offered as a courtesy upgrade. Free coffee and sweet snacks in the morning.

title: Pleasure
text: My wife and I totally enjoyed our stay at the Bryant Park Hotel--The rooms were very roomy and clean! The staff was very friendly and helpful with suggestions--A huge shoutout goes to Jo and Scott at the front desk--they were very nice --thoughtful--and helped with our plans in NYC

title: Great Staff, Excellent Stay
text: I had a lovely experience here! Check-in was smooth, and the staff were all so nice. Special shoutout to Jo, who had a pleasant conversation with me while I was clearly stressed about my upcoming meeting and helped me feel a lot better naturally. The room itself was spotless, and there are so many fun amenities nearby (obviously the park is the best one!). Really can't recommend this place enough.

title: Great Weekend Stay
text: We selected the hotel based on its location as we found it on a previous trip. After staying there I know we made the right decision. The hotel was priced just right for the location. The staff was pleasant and helpful and the service was top shelf. Josephine at the front desk was friendly and helpful and exceeded expectations.   The rooms were clean and modern with great views overlooking Bryant St Park. We will definitely stay there again.

title: Excelente Hotel con un servicio destacado
text:
El Hotel está muy bien ubicado y es muy agradable todo.
El personal es muy amable. La gente de frontdesck es increíble la buena voluntad que tienen para ayudarte en todo, especialmente quiero agradecer a john Clutch que está a cargo de la recepción de paquetes

title: A lovely stay..
text:
We have stayed at this hotel many times before. Occasionally we strayed but always return!!
The hotel staff is among the top reasons!!
Veronica made our stay even more lovely as soon as we checked in. An electrical problem in our room easily solved with a room switch and an upgrade. 
The hotel is wonderfully located, rooms lovely and amazingly quiet ( considering Midtown location). 
From the bellmen to the house keeping staff to the front desk CANNOT say enough about their professionalism, helpfulness and smiles!
We will surely be back!!

title: Amazing Stay
text: Friendly customer service super clean rooms and location is brilliant, Big Thank you to Scott, Zaaul, Rey , Veronica and John. Will definitely tell my friends about this and I will tell them to book a room with a view and the views from time square are amazing,

title: Fantastic hotel and guest services
text: The hotel is in a perfect location in NYC which is Ideal for taking in the sights and attractions of the city. The staff were also extremely helpful and Jo was so kind and went above and beyond in making sure that I had everything i needed during my stay.

title: Brilliantly located hotel in NYC with super friendly staff
text: The hotel has an excellent location in NYC. Ideal for taking in the sights and attractions in the city. The staff were also super friendly and helpful. Jo especially was a huge help with directions for nearby attractions, subway info and tips for exploring the city.

title: Amazing stay
text: Absolutely amazing stay in NYC at Bryant Pk Hotel, my cousins first visit to America from Ireland and I can't state enough how amazing the hotel was. Jo (a fellow Irish woman) and John were at the front desk to check us in and were totally amazing with helping us plan our day trips.Jo  without a doubt went above and beyond for us. I will definitely be staying here again. 10 out of 10 for staff, rooms and food.

title: Wonder Experience-
text: The staff was wonderful- warm and accommodating.   The room was quite large, very clean and equipped with all you need including a minibar and cozy robes and beautiful crisp sheets, pillows and large,  thick towels.  The view over the park was unbeatable!  That was one of the main reasons we were looking so forward to being here.  We enjoyed  cocktails at the Celone Lounge and Bar. It was beautifully decorated and inspired a Mediterranean feeling. .  The fresh coffee and muffins in the lobby were appreciated in the morning. As was the late check out. Thank you!

title: a hotel that goes above and beyond.
text:
A truly special experience. the staff made this place very nice. we were confronted with excessive noise from the construction across the street. the front desk undertook a special effort to change our room to a quiet room on. a high floor. 

But what really set the place apart was the convoluted scheme I had to create to surprise my wife for her birthday. the plan was that our daughter would fly in from the west coast to surprise my wife. in order to pull this off, the front desk cooperated at check in and throughout the entire time helped pull off the surprise. 

Scott went out of his way to assist and Veronica was excellent as well.

title: Gem on the Park
text: Fabulous. Located on one of my favorite parks in the city, Bryant Park. The whole experience was wonderful. The staff really makes you feel welcome and taken care of. Jo at the front desk was marvelous as was the doorman, Ray. The room was spacious and airy with lots and lots of light. The bathtub was big, not easy to find in New York City. I being on the park means that you’re not looking out at another building, rather you look down and see trees in park benches, and a carousel and in the winter- ice-skating. I am a writer and I needed a quiet and comfortable room which I got. This is my new favorite hotel.

title: Amazing service and location
text: We had such a great time staying here. Beautiful view of the park. Thank you Scott for making this a great experience. We will definitely be staying here again. Ray was super helpful and friendly. The Celon bar has great drinks, great service, and a great atmosphere. Shout out to our server Sisi. If you're staying in midtown then this is the place to be. Everyone made us feel at home.

title: Great stay!!!
text: What a wonderful time at the Bryant Park Hotel!  Our check in was perfect.  Front desk staff was amazing especially Jo!  Got tight into our beautiful Junior Suite.  So well thought out!  Coffee and muffins every morning was a great way to start the day!  The gym is small but worked perfectly.  The location is ideal!  We walked everywhere.  And…watching the skaters in Bryant Park was lovely.  The staff was so friendly and helpful.  They helped make my birthday trip extra special!

title: One of the best hotels in NYC!
text: One of the best hotels I've found in NYC!  The location is close to tons of activities, theaters, good food, and trains.  But for where it is in Midtown, the street is actually pretty quiet and calm.  The staff is SUBERB (especially John and Jo!), and the accommodations are clean and secure.  I will definitely be staying here again.

title: Bryant Park hotel delite
text: Jo was fab.  I could literally just stand there all day and listen to her beautiful accent.  She was very accommodating.  Great hotel / location.  Rooms are well equipped and not much noise pollution at night.

title: Our family visit during Thanksgiving was made so very special due to the amazing service of your employee Jo.
text:
Upon check-in I knew our stay would be very special after having the great pleasure and experience of meeting Jo.
Jo went above and beyond to attend to all of our needs. She offered great insight on restaurants, helped us secure reservations, advised us on wonderful activities happening in the Park and shared in our excitement of our bucket list trip of watching the Macys Day Thanksgiving Parade.
Jo is so kind and warm. Her genuine personality is such a beautiful asset to your hotel. We wish to thank Jo and hope that she is recognized for her outstanding hospitality!

title: Overall OUTSTANDING EXPERIENCE- BEST FRONT DESK STAFF
text: Thanks to Jo and John and several others at the front desk, MY WEDDING WEEKEND was a huge success. John as the manager, and Jo were amazing. They were friendly, professional, diligent and had awesome overall personalities. They created a very good environment for a stressful couple of days. I would recommend this hotel to anyone because of your staff and amenities. Please pass on my highest appreciation since the hotel was A HOME RUN for so many reasons. The rooms were amazing and every staff member was well trained and a pleasure to deal with. As I said when I was there, "JOHN IS THE MAN" and I was able to build a strong bond quickly with he and Jo. God bless and thank you again for providing a wonderful stay during my son's weekend wedding celebration. Honestly, I have stayed around the world and this was by far the BEST overall experience I ever had with front desk personnel. They went out of the way to make the stay exceptional.

title: A New Go To Hotel when in NYC
text:
Overall, great location, great service, spacious, quiet and comfortable.  
We arrived well before check-in with the intent of checking our bags until later. We were offered early check-in without having to ask which was a really nice touch after a long rainy drive in to the City. 
The room was large, exceptionally large for NYC with an equally spacious bathroom. Both were perfectly clean.  Bed was a bit hard, but not enough to prevent us from a great night's sleep.
The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful to a person, particularly, the charming Jo at the front desk.  The only disappointment was that we were unable to check out the very interesting hotel bar, as it was booked for a private event the night we were there.  We'll have to come back.
Great stay, great value for NYC.

title: Loved the location and place, just liked the bed. BUT recommend highly.
text:
Loved my stay here BUT!!!!
First, downsides:   the bed was pretty darn hard, wasn't a fan of that. Two: they say they have free Wifi, but drop a $30 facility charge (don 't have my receipt in front of me) to cover who-knows-what. NYC is BRIGHT -- the blackout shades didn't help so much, bring your eyeshades.
Now:  great center city location across from Bryant Park; lots of restaurants and food places nearby; requested a high floor with a great view, away from elevator and found myself in a corner room with 3 windows in bedroom and two in a huge (but under-heated) bathroom.  Large room, cool, clean and modern look. And saying "large room" for a NYC hotel is saying a LOT.  A bit too much of a hunt for the multiple outlets travelers need. An elegantly inventoried mini-bar.  
Friendly and professional staff at desk. 
Highly recommend.

title: Great Hotel
text: The staff was excellent. Would like to mention John, Rey, Veronica,Scott, Shannen, Zauul and Dennis. Great service. Everyone was so accommodating and wonderful. The view from the rooms was amazing. Love this property.

title: "Perfect accommodations and location"
text:
It is difficult to imagine better service and more well-thought-out accommodations.  The room was perfect, the bedding was comfortable, and the service was there with everything needed before we had to ask.  John Rey was responsible for the excellent service to our room.
It is difficult to find a better location for a room in NYC.  The Bryant Park Hotel is near everything.  Plus, the view is spectacular.  We woke early to watch the ice skaters.  During the day, the skating rink accommodates everyone, but in the early hours, professional skaters come out to practice their jumps.
Michael Strauss, Director of Finance and Accounting, makes sure that visitors walk away with their money's worth, vowing to come back again.

title: Excellent service
text: I stayed at the hotel for a 3 night business trip in mid-December.  Had the pleasure of working with Jo who was outstanding.  Throughout the stay she went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and stay productive.  Top notch!

title: High Expectations Exceeded
text: This was a "fantasy hotel" for me and my high expectations were actually exceeded. I consider The American Radiator Building to be about the most beautiful skyscraper in Manhattan and it's been a complete dream of mine to stay there! At first we had an 11th floor, Bryant Park view, corner room which we loved. Unfortunately, there was loud construction mandated by NYC happening right outside of our room. We were then offered a generous compensation package. I feared that we would just get an apology, but rather than feeling screwed over that my fantasy hotel had let me down, I truly got the sense that I had rightly placed my trust in the management and stewards of this iconic architectural masterpiece. I felt like an honored and important guest at a first class establishment! We loved our upgraded room even more! Of particular help was JO! She was so kind, gracious, and helpful and really seemed to understand how important it was to me that the Bryant Park Hotel live up to what I was expecting. I was initially upset with the disturbance, but JO "held my hand", made everything better, and I fell even further in love with the hotel.

title: Amazing stay - Cant wait to return
text: I cant wait to return to NYC and my next stay at the Bryant Park Hotel.  From the minute we arrived late in the evening after a long travel delay to the day we left we were overwhelmed by the amazing staff and accommodations.  Special thanks to George Kurth and the entire staff for making our stay a memorable experience

title: a greeting to all the hotel staff in particular to Josephine who took care of us in every detail in our stay
text: I loved everything like every time I stayed here a magical place both in winter and in summer, Bryant Park and the Public Library are the romantic and unforgettable setting and it is my 4th or 5th time

title: Great location and perfect hotel
text:
We spent here 1 week with my 15 yrs Godson. Amazing location an view, big room, perfect bathroom, comfortable beds. We had a suit for 3 people with a sofa bed and separate bedroom and had a fantastic vie on Bryant park. There is no coffee machine in the room but you can grab complimentary coffee at the reception area in the morning. 
My Godson got the trip for his birthday what I mentioned when I made the reservation and he was greeted in the room with a luftballoon + chocolate + nice card signed by the employees of the hotel. We had some issues with the credit card withdrawal by the hotel ut it was sorted out finally. It was my 2nd stay in this hotel and net time I travel to NYC I will choose this hotel again for sure - you cannot e disappointed here.

title: Consistently Excellent Service and Experience
text: Ever since my initial stay at the Bryant Park Hotel in 2019, it has been my first choice and I have returned several times since the Pandemic.  I spent my childhood visits to Manhattan staying at the Waldorf Astoria and the Palace Hotel and whilst those were lovely times, my experience at the Bryant Park Hotel has exceeded any expectations that I have from an upscale hotel in the city. From the check in with Jo to the check out with John, I was greeted with a friendly and warm welcome. Scott C has been a consistent presence and his professionalism and gracious demeanor enhances the experience.  From the bellmen to the individuals working security in the evening; it's the people that really create an exceptional experience.  I have stayed in a variety of rooms and they have always been spotless, spacious and with beautiful views of the park. I'm certain that all of the rooms are to the same standard and look forward to a future family tradition of returning to the Bryant Park Hotel.  Big thanks to all.

title: Amazing experience
text:
I had reached out to the sales team about staying at Bryant Park hotels in January right around the holidays, after new years.  Alex Cintron was so lovely. She ensured my stay was amazing and when I checked in was given a complimentary upgrade by her front desk team. 

The room I stayed in was great. It overlooked the holiday market in Bryant Park, which was so nice, especially at night with all the holiday lights. The location was perfect, very centrally located to Time Square, Rockefeller center and pretty much every subway station is easily accessible from this hotel. I would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone who is coming to visit the city for the first time. Highly recommend and thank you again for a great stay. The amenities are great, especially the bathtub and shower pressure as is the restaurant Koi located adjacent to the lobby. Thank you again

title: Best Place To Stay in Midtown
text: My husband and I stayed here for one night starting New Years Day so we could visit The city and see all the holiday decorations and especially Bryant Park. The hotel is located right across the street from Bryant Park and we had a corner room on the 12th floor with a view of the park which was amazing. It was very clean and had a large updated bathroom.  Everyone at the hotel was extremely helpful and pleasant especially Jo.   She showed us around the hotel and made sure our stay was perfect.  She could not have been more helpful.  This is a perfect place to stay in midtown and we will return.

title: Amazing time
text: We recently stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel for two nights. John and Shannon at the front desk were very accommodating and even sent up a bottle of Prosecco for my birthday. Such a sweet gesture. The location was perfect for the winter village and skating in Bryant park. Just needed to cross the street!  We got in before 3pm and they expedited the room check in so we could get in to the room before our skating time. We had a deluxe view and two queen beds for family of 4 room was very spacious for NYC, very comfortable beds. Room was clean. They had complimentary lemon water and coffee and muffins in the morning by the elevators. Would definitely recommend!

title: Great spot for the holidays!
text: Great hotel literally overlooking Bryant Park. Easy to get to from any train station, walkable to all the main NYC spots. Friendly staff, really cool speakeasy type bar downstairs. Try to ask for a room looking over the park on one of the higher floors!

title: Excellent, boutique, wonderful location, clean rooms
text: Hardly ever stay anywhere else in NYC; the Bryant Park Hotel is clearly our favorite, expecially in the winter when the Christmas Mark opens up in Bryant Park right across from the Hotel:  lots of shops, ice skating enclosed plastic heated igloos to eat and drink, etc.  Locatiion is the best with easy access to Broadway, Fifth Avenue Shopping, 14 minutes walk to Rockefeller Center, very close to Grand Central Station.  Rooms are quite nice, very clean, and kept up very well.  Also the Koi restaurant next door is superb, a bit expensive like everything in NYC.  Highly recommend the Bryant Park Hotel…..terrific rooms, locations, staff!

title: 2nd time here in 2 months and still AMAZING
text:
2nd time for us staying here and AGAIN, everything from A-Z was impeccable.
From Camile (again) being as professional & gracious as they come and really helping us out, to Shannon's cheerful personality checking us in to John C. & Raazu walking us thru our check out & asking if ANYTHING else we can do for you. Once again, the staff at BPH set's the standard ALL luxury hotels should abide by.
Our room, overlooking BP winter theme is wonderful.
Deep soaking tube, outstanding mood room lighting, to the king size bed..
Great work to the entire team. Definitely will return.
Happy Holidays to all.
Our Deepest "THANKS to all".
Kind regards,

title: Date Night with beautiful views
text: We had such a nice experience at the Bryant hotel. At check in I was offered an upgraded room for a small fee, that included a gorgeous view overlooking Bryant park. Picked out by the wonderful concierge Joe, she even took the time to point out some sites and helped me with my luggage. 5 ⭐️

title: Our Forever Hotel
text:
The Bryant Park hotel is in an enviable position. It is close, but not too close to Times Square, round the corner from Grand Central, between 5th and 6th avenues and is steps away from the subway.
The property is very clean. The beds are extremely comfortable. A bath and separate shower was lovely to have. They have Molton Brown toiletries. Housekeeping was excellent.
I particularly enjoyed the extra little touches like free coffee and muffins in the morning and iced water by the lift all day.
The staff are very special and an absolute credit to this hotel. Thank you Jo, John and Scott.
We’ve traveled to NYC many times over the years and always stayed at different hotels - so much to experience right, why keep going back to the same hotel??  I think we’ve found our forever hotel now! Keep doing what you’re doing  Bryant Park, you are amazing….

title: Home away from Home
text: Bryant Park Hotel is my go-to in NYC. I have been staying here for 10+ years. Service is top notch, and you can't beat the location or room views. Comfortable beds and clean rooms make this place feel like home away from home.

title: Always impressive service!!
text:
Once again the Bryant Park Hotel did not disappoint. Thank you for the upgrade to a full suite and helping celebrate my wife’s birthday.  

Christmas in NYC and close access to Bryant Park is an added bonus. Outstanding service and a great property always makes us return to this hotel.

title: Great location! Wonderful People!
text:
Stayed 2 nights for a business function. Hotel is overlooking Bryant Park. Rooms were clean and  great views. Meeting room on the 25th floor had a beautiful view on 3 sides. 
Bar inside hotel is beautiful and cozy with lots of room and couches to sit and enjoy a drink. 
Front desk staff were wonderful. Shout out to Jo who was friendly and helpful with any question or need. She is amazing!

title: Holiday magic performed by The Bryant Park Hotel
text: We arrived early in the morning and while there was a Park view available, John suggested we wait a bit for a better one and he came through in a MAJOR way. Amazing holiday views of Bryant Park from 3 huge windows!

title: Holiday Party at Celon!  5 Stars!!!
text: We hosted our holiday party at Celon. It was wonderful! The team went above and beyond to make the event special. Alex (event manager) and Ozzie (f&b manager) are some of the best contacts I've worked with in the event sector. The hotel rooms are lovely and super clean too.

title: Fantastic as always!
text: We were two girlfriends on a quick Christmas trip on way back to Florida from Ireland. Love Bryant Hotel and consistently Amazing! Location is perfect to everything especially at Christmas time. Winter Carnival and across street.  So much to do! Ice skating, cocktails, delicious food and shopping! Greeted so warmly by JO & John at Front Desk! got our room immediately. JO gave  us a excellent suggestion for a upscale dinner near by. Was disappointed because bar downstairs was closed for a private party. We went to Valbela at the park. We enjoyed it so much! Loved Julio with such a warm welcome also helped made me reservation on phone! Cannot say enough about the wonderful staff! Only disappointed in our room had a damaged door but told them on check out an were very concerned so I’m sure it will be fixed promptly. We did not have a view but was accommodated with two beds which was appreciated! Think actually it’s quieter on side with no view. There elevator is dark and I’m not a fan of elevators anyway so that is a little challenging for me. Will never hesitate to stay at this wonderful hotel! John was so kind to order us taxi early for afternoon pickup because it was raining. Had a quick lovely lunch at KOI Restaurant before leaving. Happy holidays to the wonderful staff and thank you!

title: Xmas at bryant park
text: My family and I went during a busy time of year but luckily had a great hotel to call home during the Xmas season. The suite had an amazing view, and the location in the city was perfect.  John, Rey, and Shannen all stood out and will be remembered as great hosts! Much appreciated. We recommend this hotel!

title: A wonderful stay for a business trip!
text:
I just returned from a wonderful stay at The Bryant Park hotel.  I was organizing a team event in NYC and was put in touch with Matt Pathak at the hotel a few months prior to coordinate the team's stay.  Matt was a pleasure to work with from start to finish and he went above and beyond to make my team feel like VIPs at the hotel.  Everyone received a warm welcome (and cupcakes!) and the entire staff was so friendly - from the front desk to the bartenders. 
I am looking forward to staying here again!

title: Excellent 4 étoiles !
text: Le Bryant Park Hotel est idéalement situé dans Manhattan, directement sur Bryant Park, c'est un hôtel 4 étoiles qui propose des chambres très confortables, avec magnifique vue sur le parc et les immeubles du quartier, nous avions une chambre Deluxe, très spacieuse, ce qui est vraiment appréciable à NY, avec grand salle de bain. L'hôtel propose gratuitement tous les matins du café et des muffins ce qui est un vrai plus.  Le service est efficace et très chaleureux, merci à toute l'équipe et spécialement Jo pour son accueil, nous avons passé un excellent séjour !!!

title: What a pleasant Staff!
text:
The Bryant Inn is so centrally located. The front desk staff Jo and Julio were outstanding in hospitality and knowledge! I thank you for your kindness and Hospitality!! A rare gem to find in this day and age!  Thank you!
Ann Deppe Queensbury NY !

title: All you need
text: Shennan & Team were excellent. Staff is very friendly and welcome. Rooms were clean and comfortable beds for a good nights sleep. Can recommend for anyone going on a business trip. Good connections and walking distance to other parts of town.

title: Macys Thanksgiving Parade
text: We stayed at the hotel for the Macys Day Parade.  The location was very good, the room were very clean and comfortable, and the people there were the best part.  Everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful.  We would like to mention Jo specifically - at check in we had a lot of questions about the location, the room, and the parade and she was very patience with us, she went out of her way to show us our rooms, answer all our questions in a friendly way, and she gave us several good suggestions on where to eat and where to go for the parade.

title: What a genuine reception
text:
The reception at the hotel by Zamil was superb.   We arrived from the UK at around 0330 am local time to a great reception and very easy check in.  He quenched our thirst with a coupe of bottles of water - a kind thought! 

Furthermore, the breakfast staff were charming and helpful,  making ours a stay to be remembered

title: Magical trip!
text: Amazing staff! Really was a magical trip! We visited to celebrate our son’s fifth birthday and they actually gave him a birthday present and sang happy birthday to him. We also watched the Macy’s day parade and the location was perfect. Loved every minute! They treated us like family ♥️

title: John listens.
text: John made sure we had the right rooms for our stay! He took the time to listen to my needs when booking the reservation. Check in was easy and very accommodating. Always nice to be right outside Bryant park during holiday season. Thank you again John.

title: Wonderful hotel with incredible staff!!
text:
Our trip to New York was extra special thanks to our stay at Bryant Park Hotel.  The staff was extremely helpful and very accommodating to our requests. 

Every morning we woke up to smiling faces and fresh muffins near the lobby. Our room faced the park with breathtaking views from every window. 

We loved how prepared the property was to making our experience in New York unique. The staff made sure we knew where we were going and were happy to help us with arranging taxi's when needed.  

Koi is such a fun atmosphere with a exclusive menu including fun shareables and entrees. The food leaves your taste buds curious for more. From the dumplings to the steak, everything was perfectly cooked. 

The room had a cute mini bar and offered additional items that you might have accidentally left behind. The restroom is the perfect size and the huge soaking tub is perfect for relaxing after a long night around the town. 

I'm officially obsessed with this property and cannot wait to return.  

Thank you to everyone on the BPH team for making our stay amazing.

title: Made Our Elopement Unforgettable!
text: My fiancé & I eloped in Manhattan and stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel - Jo & John made our special day unforgettable! They upgraded us to a suite with breathtaking views and a bottle of champagne! We can’t thank them enough. ♥️

title: Great Hotel, Perfect Location
text: Great hotel, central location. Staff couldn't have been more accommodating, including the restaurant. Nice bar in the cellar. Across from Bryant Park, which has several pop up shops and ice skating.

title: Wonderful stay
text:
Great location, very nice front desk staff, clean room, very nice bathroom and great aesthetic! Will return for future visits to NYC.  We did a combination of business and fun and this works well for both. I’ve stayed at many nyc hotels in this price point ang this has been the best.

Also great to have free Wi-Fi and coffee in the am. 

Thank you!

title: Another Great Stay
text: Stayed here for the 3rd time and the Bryant has become our favorite in NYC.  Great location,  clean, classic building, and staff is always friendly and helpful (Zaaul one of the friendly ones on this visit).  We also like that the rooms are very quiet.

title: Welcoming Staff
text: The staff at BPH are outstanding making my stay such a delightful experience! I must add that Huichen in Housekeeping was so accommodating for me when I needed some extras with a smile! Jo and the staff really give a warm welcome!

title: A superb hotel very well located to discover Manhattan
text:
We love this hotel. It's the 2nd time we've been there, and for sure, we'll be back for another trip.
First of all, it is magnificent from an architectural point of view. We never tire of watching it from Bryant park. It is very well located and allows you to visit NYC very easily, by foot or by metro.
Everything was perfect : the rooms are superb with a park view or the city, bright and warm.  Bedding is very good. The staff is adorable, smiling and attentive. There is a bar in the basement which is also very good.
Many thanks to Josephine and John for their welcome. Their kindness and smile brightened up our stay.

title: Great hotel, Great Location, Great Staff
text: Hotel is nice and comfortable, rooms are big and spacious, very clean, service is excellent. Location is amazing! walking distance from almost anywhere - Broadway shows; shopping; Central Park...  public transport just a few steps from the hotel. Staff very welcoming and very helpful and friendly - thanks John, Aaul, Rey and Jo for an outstanding experience!!

title:
Perfect  New York hiotel
Friendly staff, excellent service and magnificent view of Bryant Park
text:
This old but very well kept building overlooking Bryant Psrk at 40th street between 5 and 6 Ave is a great place to stay  when visiting New York.
Friendly staff , spacious roons, great locarion.
John at the front desk is always finding ways to help in whatever need you may have.
Wallking distance to Penn and Gran Central plus on the block subway access  .
Close to Brosdway and Rockefeller Center tops the pluses of this very special hotel

title: Hôtel parfait et très bien placé
text: Nous avons passé une semaine à l'hôtel et avons été très satisfaits ! Jo nous a extrêmement bien accueillis, la chambre était spacieuse et l'emplacement idéal pour visiter Manhattan. Nous recommandons vivement cet hôtel 👍🏻

title: Excellent!
text: For the first since covid I visited New York City and it was great to experience that the quality of the Bryant Park Hotel has been fully remained! Spacious room and bathroom, great bed, cool furniture, clean, excellent location (close by everything), helpful staff at the front desk.. you simply can’t go wrong with this hotel. (Nice quality detail: brand of the bathroom amenities is Molton Brown.) This hotel, with it’s unique character, is my top favorite in NYC. Highly recommended!

title: Sept 23 NYC  visit
text:
First time staying at Bryant Park hotel. Great location and charming clean hotel. My room was spacious and modern clean room. Bed was comfortable and really liked this midtown location. 
Koi Japanese restaurant down stairs is convenient not to mention delicious food.  I definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Corporate Retreat
text: Our group had a fantastic experience. Matt, the Sr Sale Mgr, made everything simple and accommodated changes up to the last minute. He even went above and beyond providing our group customized gifts! The entire staff was welcoming and friendly, the service great, and the rooms clean. The location is perfect and they were helpful with some ideas in the neighborhood. All in all, I couldn't have asked for a better hotel experience.

title: Great boutique hotel overlooking Bryant Park in Midtown
text: We are repeat guests. Love the corner rooms with the huge floor to ceiling windows overlooking the park.  Fantastic friendly, professional staff.  We are big fans of John!  Clean, light, airy high ceiling room, comfy bed, great shower and separate bath.  Location can't be beat if you want to be in Midtown.

title: Not a good experience
text:
No water pressure in the sink. Cold water only. They have plumbing issues. I had to open a tap an a bathtub to get warm water in the sink to wash my face. Three of us. 21 CENTURY Center of NY. One piece of soap for 3 days for 3 people. Cleaning is poor. Asked extra towels of each type, got two only. Everything from housekeeping you have to call 3-4 times. Nobody listen you
I have been in that hotel many times before. Worst experience

title: Great spot
text: Friendly staff, clean hotel, great location. Super close to Broadway shows, and right on Bryant Park which was adorable. Great food nearby.  We were really happy with this choice, and we would stay here again for sure.

title: Exceptional Service!
text: What an incredible team at the Bryant Park Hotel! They made our stay so lovely from the moment we arrived to the moment we left. Big thank you to Jo and John at the front desk who provided truly outstanding service. It was my husband's 40th birthday and the staff provided us with complimentary treats and bubbly, whih we were waiting for us in our room upon arrival. And, of course, you cannot beat the location of this hotel, which is right across the street from one of the most beauitful spaces in the city. Thank you, we will be back!

title: Irish Jo was lovely
text: Really nice hotel and was well placed to get to places. Irish Jo on the desk was amazing. Always saying hello everytime we went past - such great customer service from her. Hotel was nice even gave us free ear buds to help sleep, as the city doesn't. Thanks guys would stay again.

title: Great spot. Better staff!
text: I stayed here for a night and Veronica was very welcoming and informative. I'm shy, but Veronica made me feel welcome and comfortable enough to ask her for advice and help. She is also very knowledgeable. Her security staff was also wonderful.

title: Not worth your money
text: Mediocre facility and being next to park means loud noise throughout the night. Rooms are so so, feel very basic and you can find better rooms at a better price. Exercise room is not great and overall just feels like a standard hotel. Also, outlets were broken in my room and I had to call and ask for ice, an iron / ironing board.

title: Wonderful NYC Hotel
text: This was the second time we have stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel while visiting New York City.  Excellent staff and terrific Manhattan location.  Rooms are nice sized, quiet, and updated.  Highly recommend!

title: Great visit, great rooms and welcoming staff
text: Can't say enough good things about this hotel! Fabulous service by Veronica, Jo and Noel. Rooms are large and super clean. Very comfortable and beautiful updated. I will stay here whenever possible. Best in NYC to me!

title: best hotel in town
text: great hotel ,  great rooms,,   super clean,,  best location - a lot of option near the hotel and very convenience to go to other places by walking or train.      helpful and professional staff.   easy check in and out .  highly recomended

title: This is a feel good place!
text: Holy moly--what a great experience. We picked a trip to The Big Apple to celebrate our  25th anniversary, combining it with me meeting my agent and publisher for the first time (since COVID happened soon after I signed with them). I'll start with the staff: Jo, Dwight, Veronica, Scott, and Zaaul were all terrific. They set us up in a corner room with an awesome view of Bryant Park, a comped bottle of chilled champagne, and a Happy Anniversary card. They knew our names when we came down for coffee and muffins or needed directions to anywhere.  The room itself was perfect for us: spacious, minimalist, big towels, super-comfy robes, and a bed that didn't kill my back. The neighborhood was centrally located and a joy to explore. And did I mention the staff was great? Good, because they really were. This will be our go to place to stay in NYC.

title: Très belle hôtel avec un super emplacement
text: Nous étions 4 adultes et 2 enfants lors de notre séjour. L’hôtel est très bien situé à côté de Bryant Park. La chambre est très spacieuse et fonctionnelle. ( 2 grands lits) Grande salle de bain. Le style est moderne. Propreté de la chambre impeccable. Le personnel de la réception est très accueillant et sympathique. C’est l’un des meilleurs hôtels que nous avons fait sur NYC. Vivement conseillé

title: If you're going to be in NYC..
text: Then the Bryant Park Hotel is just the place; the convenience to anywhere you need to go in the city, but mostly the great staff...professional, attentive. The rooms are on the smaller side, but very comfortable. An the bathrooms are well lit for makeup for a big evening out. I will definitely return...

title: A wonderful weekend in NYC
text: The location is ideal, with easy access to public transportation, the attractions and shopping within walking distance. Rooms are very clean, spacious with high ceilings, comfortable bedding and amenities. The staff is exceptional, extremely professional, knowledgeable and go above and beyond to make your stay perfect. I will certainly be back to stay here again.

title: Great Place to Stay
text: Bryant Park Hotel is a great place to stay in NYC. It's clean, trendy, and centrally located, and the staff are super friendly and helpful. On a recent trip, I found that this was a great "home base" for walking around the city. It's close to Times Square and Broadway, but quieter walks through Chelsea and on the High Line are also within reach. Two thumbs up!

title: Janette
text: The Bryant Park Hotel was amazing! Such lovely,  roomie accommodations with an amazing view!  There were 4 of us and our Junior Suite was perfect! Scott, the hotel manager was such a super host and made our stay exceptional! I highly recommend this hotel. I’ve been to NYC many times and this is by far the nicest, most spacious place I’ve stayed! Ask for Scott! He’ll treat you right!

title: Love this hotel.
text:
Brilliant área to be in.  Bryant Park is lovely, especially Christmas time.  Do try their restaurant, superb food and excellent service.
Great cocktail lounge, although it was a bit quiet when we were there

title: Wedding Weekend Stay
text:
My husband and I stayed at The Bryant Park Hotel from a Thursday - Monday.  We were married in The Loft at the hotel during our stay.  Our time spent at the Bryant Park Hotel was an amazing experience.  From our suite on the 17th floor with a view of Bryant Park to The Loft for our ceremony to the amazing design/architecture for our pictures, all the way down to the cellar bar for the informal after-party, we could not have hoped for a more perfect way to celebrate our wedding weekend.  Matt Pathak, Senior Sales Manager, was communicative before our visit and went the extra mile in making us feel welcome and special.  All members of the hotel staff were kind and accommodating.

Room itself:  The only thing missing from the room is more hooks - like for bath towels or the fluffy robes.  The shower had amazing water pressure and both the bathroom and the suite were spacious.

The Bryant Park Hotel will always have a special place in our hearts.  We will be back!

title: Perfect stay
text: The location is fantastic! The staff at the Bryant were so accommodating and nothing was too much trouble, great service. The room was spacious with a nice bathroom, it had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. If there is one tiny thing thing I would say is the room needs a bit better lighting, had 3 lamps. The king bed was super comfortable. Would highly recommend this hotel, we picked a great choice in this hotel!

title: An amazing stay!
text:
We stayed at The Bryant Park Hotel when we went to New York to elope! It was a fantastic stay and we loved the location.

Dwight helped us during check-in and was friendly and helpful. He allowed us to pay in advance for a room for my sister, who was checking in the next day, and found a very important package that had been delivered earlier that day.

Jo helped us during checkout and went out of her way to make sure we were taken care of. She was friendly, helped secure us a cab to get to JFK later in the day, and even sent us on our way with bottles of water.

We also very much appreciate the card, balloon, and pretzels that were in our room upon arrival. The entire team helped make our wedding weekend one to remember. :)

title: Brilliant hotel, amazing staff
text:
Myself and my husband stayed at the Bryant Park for a weekend. It is a fantastic hotel, super clean and very convenient for Times Square and broadway. All the staff were so friendly but we must give a special mention to Jo Kinsella, who went above and beyond to make our stay so comfortable and memorable. She is an absolute star!! 

Can’t recommend this hotel enough and we will definitely be booking again.

title: Another stay, another great experience.
text:
Another stay, another great experience. We just completed what has to be our 15th or so stay and it remains excellent. Walking in, I saw John and it was like a warm hug. He greeted us, walked over to check us in and secured our favorite room in hotel. Following our two day stay, Veronica checked us out and asked if we'd like the same room for our stay in November. It wasn't available, but its twin was so she reserved it. 

Fast elevators, great water pressure, large bathrooms, comfy robes and slippers, clean and well maintained rooms in a perfect IMO location. Can't be beat in the city. 

They are beginning some room refurbishments I believe, which will be nice - the furniture is in good shape but starting to show its age. I will always complain about the lack of outlets and the outlets there are ... our chargers don't stay well. I hope adding USB outlets is in the plans! :) 

See you all again in November!

title: Great location and accommodations
text:
I always enjoy staying at the Bryant Park Hotel. 
It is near everything and a far better experience than 
staying in the middle of Times Square. Just a short walk to see Broadway shows. Quiet at night. Park is beautiful, day or night.

title: Once Again an Amazing Stay
text:
The Bryant Park Hotel and Staff are the best in the city! Hands down. I have stayed at many hotels throughout my 46 years and I will continue to come back. The rooms are BIG and the beds are super comfy. Love the bathrooms! Very clean, pretty and big bath tubs too! 
I can't say enough about the staff and how kind and helpful they always are. This trip I came with my daughter for her 16th bday and they put balloons and treats in our room upon arrival. Jo and Scott at the front desk are the sweetest and so kind and Paul the reservation manager too! 
The location is wonderful adjacent to Bryant Park and the library and super convenient for anywhere you want to go and very close to the subway too. Koi restaurant is connected which is always yummy! There are also lots of options near by to eat as well as Wholefoods across the street! They do provide coffee and muffins in the morning. 
Lastly try to reserve room 1901 it has a large balcony and view of the park. Our favorite room now. 
It's just all around a wonderful hotel 5 stars from us! 
To the staff Thank you for making our trip that much better again and for your amazing hospitality. 
We will always come back!

title: Perfect location, excellent service
text: Loved this stylish hotel overlooking the beautiful Bryant Park. Our room and bathroom were huge by NYC standards. We had three giant windows overlooking the park. The front desk staff was wonderful, especially John who sent up a complimentary bottle of wine when there was just a slight delay in our bags being brought up to our room, and who got us checked in early. The furnishings are not exciting but the bed was comfortable. Quick walk to Broadway, Times Square, 30 Rock and 5th Avenue/Madison Avenue shopping. The ONLY downside was that with a view of the park came a lot of street noise, so as a light sleeper I had a hard time getting and staying asleep. The blackout shades worked very well, though. Great value for the price.

title: "Exceptional Hotel with exceptional staff"
text:
LOOK NO FURTHER!. First time visit to BPH after staying at many other high-end hotels in Manhattan & they move to the top of my list. From making  our reservations via Camile, to speaking with Scott to reconfirm, checking out with John & our bell hop Ray (I think) ... A special THANK YOU!!
They truly understand "customer service". A pleasant process from start to finish..
The minute I walked in the ultra "urban chic" look/vibe immediately caught my attention.
The lemon water & fresh brewed coffee/pastry at the elevator entrance is a classy touch.. The relaxing "red" ambient interior of the elevator starts putting you in a great mood of more to come. Our room was nothing short of "amazing".
Spacious with almost every conceivable desired amenity at your disposal!
We don’t always spend a lot of time in our room, this was the exception!!
Do yourself a favor and stay here...You won't be disappointed.
To the ENTIRE staff at BPH....Keep up the good work...you set the standard for excellence...
See you all again soon..

title: Wonderful stay at Bryant Park Hotel, NYC
text:
3 nights at the Bryant Park Hotel was the perfect end to a 5 week road trip across the US. The staff was very helpful, friendly, and just made us feel at home, from Ray at the door to Wyatt, Scott and John at the front desk. Really excellent service at all hours of the day and night. 

The room was very comfortable, the bed had a a firm mattress, and the bathroom was large and spotless, with really comfortable robes.  The morning coffee and muffins in the lobby were a great way to start the day (our breakfast in the park just across the street).  We also needed a late check out and were given an extension without any problems.

I have 2 qualifications:  the lights in the room were not as bright as I like, but I've found this to be the case in almost all the hotels we stayed at in the US during our 5 week trip.
